In particular, we’ve nailed two key areas the last year - manufacturing and logistics.  We're now ready and confident that all touch-points from ordering to delivery will live up to expectations. Our goal is set. Let’s reach it together.We’re done with prototyping  and are currently optimising parts, configurations and logistics. To start up the production, we have set a goal of $50,000 for this campaign. We want to take this bike to the next level and get even more people out on the saddle.With this said, everyone who helps us in the making of the next MATE eBike, will get it at less than 1/2 the retail price – and will be the first to be offered exclusive, premium perks as well as VIP access to the upcoming webstore. We are MATE familySince the last campaign, we’ve worked very hard on improving every aspect of our company. We’ve built an order- and customer service system from scratch. We are training our support team to handle the huge demands, as well as preparing them for future challenges. We have learnt our lessons (dearly!) and have employed help in most areas. Our Mate family now totals 10 full-time members, all pulling their weight and making things happen. We’ve invested in a MATE Lab, where we test the bikes, including components, to work on improvements. Adding an in-house mechanic has certainly helped as well as providing valuable feedback for MATE moving forward. You're much more than a customerWe’re not only building a bike or a brand, but rather seeding a community of encouragement while we grow our company along with our backers. We’re constantly improving both the bikes and our own performances, listening to and seriously taking in feedback.In essence, our bikes are made by each one of you! THIS is and always will be our fundamental mission to accomplish - making the best MATE’s for everyone. What our customers are saying about usMATE is the biggest crowdfunding success ever in bike-crazy Denmark, with people from all over the world continuing to support the project. There are currently close to 10,000 MATE Bikes in circulation, helping to make traffic cleaner, cooler and run more smoothly. Through the community of MATE backers, we have received loads of feedback that’s made it possible to create the next generation of eBikes.In the last 3 months, 70% of our Trustpilot reviews were 4 and 5 stars. We expect our ratings to continue to improve! Now that our growing pains have all been worked out through our original MATE series production (which caused long delays in delivery), it's smooth sailing from here on out. Others are talking about us too Spread the love. Let's make MATE X happen! The Cycling Embassy of Denmark was founded in 2009 to make it easy for poli­ticians, planners, engineers, architects, journalists, NGOs all over the world to access our know-how and help cities around the globe make cycling an important part of their urban transporta­tion.The members of the Cycling Embassy of Denmark represent the latest knowledge of all areas related to cy­cling. Frequently Asked Questions The price is very low for an e-bike. How is that possible? Our extensive experience in product sourcing and manufacturing helped us a lot to secure and develop excellent supplier and shipping partnerships so we can offer a high quality product for the lowest possible price. Crowdfunding certainly helps us to keep the costs down so we can work together with the factory to product the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related expenses Can I order MATE X 750 even though I do not live in US? We deliver MATE X 750S anywhere in the world as long as local laws permit us to import MateNB: It is not officially legal to drive MATE X 750S on public roads in the EU. You are allowed to own it and drive it on private property.NB: We have not obtained an import permit for MATE X 750S in Australia. We advise Australian backers to get a MATE X 250 or MATE X 250+ How much weight can MATE X handle? MATE X is built strong enough to easily handle riders of up to 150 kg. Does MATE X come in different sizes? MATE X is designed to fit everyone from 150 cm /4’9” to those over 215 cm / 7’0” with ease. Just adjust the saddle and handlebar height to match your measurements and off you go. I can't see the battery - where is it? Batteries are not something that should be felt, not seen. That’s why ours is hidden nicely within the frame, protected by a locking mechanism. Can I still ride my MATE X if the battery runs out of power? Of course! If you run out of power, you can ride it as you would a regular bicycle. Can the battery be removed? Yes. The battery is designed in such a way that you can change it or replace with 2 easy steps that take less than a minute. Simply fold the bike frame at the middle, pull out the battery and you’re done. How is MATE X delivered and is it easy to assemble? MATE X is delivered with instructions in a securely packed box and requires minimal assembly. However, if you don't have much experience with bikes, we strongly recommend that you visit your local bike shop to get all parts tightened and thoroughly checked for the best experience. How much does shipping cost? Shipping is set to $200 due to the fact that we ship worldwide directly from our factory in Asia. It is also one of the reasons its possible to keep MATE X prices so competitive, as there are no intermediaries between you and the factory #MATEaffordable.NB: Application of extra shipping costs:  if you are in a “difficult to ship area”, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that some destinations, such as remote islands, can prove simply impossible to ship to. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, then please contact us before placing your order. My bike box arrived damaged. What should i do? If there is visible damage to your MATE box that appears to have damaged the bike and/or its other contents, please notify the courier immediately as they are held responsible for all damage caused in transit. Request documentation from them stating that you have received a box with visible damages. You will need this for insurance purposes to qualify for a replacement MATE X.  I live in Denmark, can I pick it up myself? No. MATE X eBike is ordered in bulk and will be shipping to individuals directly from our assembly in Asia, as well as to regional commercial warehouses that is not setup for walk-in or local pickup.All MATE X’s will be shipped via ground shipping to your address we have on file. Why is my bike spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your site? MATE X is still in its prototype stage, so some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable replacements. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones equal or higher in value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best value bike for the price. What kind of warranty do you offer? All MATE bikes and batteries come with a 2 year limited manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter some production related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty. As many elements of a bike may get damaged due to normal cycling use/natural ware, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, chain, brake pads, etc. For more details, please contact our customer service department. What is your returns policy? This is the "MATE-promise": We are so confident that you will love your new MATE so much, that we offer you a 14 days money back guarantee after you have received it, if you are not satisfied.However, if you decide to do so, your MATE bike must be in new and re-sellable condition. #MATEpromiseReturns shipping to our nearest regional warehouse must be covered by you. What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?We are soon offering a more powerful battery for MATE X 250+ and MATE X 750S only, as an upgrade or as spare battery. We are currently working to develop  a GPS, rear-rack with brake lights and more accessories and modifications, that we will introduce during the campaign.Stay tuned for more information. Feel free to let us know what kind of accessories you’d be most interested in seeing.  What about spare parts? Can any bike shop assist me?The MATE X battery is custom built for our frame. These batteries you can buy directly from us. The rest of the components are fairly standard, so you can upgrade/repair/customize your bike as you wish with other parts either from us or your local bike shop. Is it really true I can get up to 80 miles on a single charge with "BOOSTER"?In ideal conditions and in ECO+ mode = Assist level 1, this can be done.Keep in mind, though, that other factors can also influence your reach such as power assist setting, terrain, total bike/rider weight, weather and riding conditions (city vs countryside). City or country side riding On "BOOSTER" battery, you can get anywhere between 20-100 miles, depending on your riding style. For maximum range, it certainly helps to add a bit of human power - especially on steep climbs and when accelerating.**All MILES/KILOMETERS listed on Indiegogo are "UP TO" and not guaranteed.** Do I need a licence to ride MATE X?No. Our bikes are made 100% street legal. We offer two distinctive versions of MATE: MATE X 250 / 250+, with a 250W motor which is legal in the EU, and MATE X 750S, with a 750W motor for the US.MATE X 250 and 250+ with 250W motor, is by default limited according to EN15194 to the top speed of 25 km/h (15,5 mph). This means that the motor will only help you up to 25km/h. MATE X 750S, with its 750W motor, is limited to 20 mph (32 km/h), which is the legal limit in US. It will be possible to change these settings with some reprogramming which we will make available after the campaign through MATE.community. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. It is currently 0% in the US and varies internationally. Duties/VAT/GTS is to be paid before we can deliver your MATE X. We will send payment links, invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship your MATE X.  Can I test ride a MATE X bike?At this stage, test rides are only available in Copenhagen. Contact us by email for a test ride. Can I get a refund?Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.In the event we are unable to deliver your MATE X to your location due to any legal restrictions on the import or delivery of your bike, we shall refund you 75% of the amount on your indiegogo campaign contribution. You are responsible for determining whether its legal to import, deliver, and operate the MATE X at your location. In the even you cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made, we will assess an administration fee of 25% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder.  Can I change my order?Yes, it is possible to upgrade or downgrade your product. If we are still in the campaign period, the best way is to ask for a refund is through your profile on Indiegogo where you’ll find a “refund” button. And then “back” a new perk/make the order again. If the order is locked and you are transferred to our database, we charge an additional fee on 50 USD in administration fees.
MATE X is Design Registered with the European Intellectual Property Office Additional questions? Contact us at hello@mate.bike PRESS & PR: Hotline +45 9197 2643 // Mail: PR@mate.bike

story:
A BETTER BIKE IS POSSIBLE

For the past 8 years Bike Pirates has been providing a community bicycle workspace for cyclists in Toronto.  Our Do-It-Yourself workspace provides tools, volunteer assistance and new and used parts for patrons to learn how to fix and build their own bicycles.

Bike Pirates is an autonomous organization whose mission is to empower cyclists and make bicycles more accessible. Volunteer-run and volunteer-organized, Bike Pirates provides a Do-It-Yourself workspace to the members of the community and supports the concepts of bicycle re-use, collective decision making, and social justice.


Bike Pirates also partners with other local and grassroots organizations for community projects, events, outreach and fundraising. We provide our space at no charge to other organizations looking to host community events including movie nights, dance parties, dinners, socials, book/magazine launches, and speaking events. Our space has become an in-demand venue for grassroots fundraisers and is one of the few accessible venues in West-End Toronto.

Our organization's structure is unique - we are run completely by volunteers, we organize ourselves by consensus, and we run 100% on the donations made by our participants. That means we are completely autonomous and we spend more time getting our hands greasy rather than writing grant applications.

Donations are what fuel Bike Pirates 

The used parts and bicycles that we receive come from individuals in our community as well as local bicycle shops who value our work. The few dollars that folks donate to use our tools are what keep our rent paid and our lights on. Now that we are facing a big change and assessing our future we need to reach out to our community to donate to build a better Bike Pirates.

We have called the Bloor and Lansdowne neighbourhood home for 6 years, filling up a Bloor Street storefront with 9 repair stands, lots of tools, piles of used parts, and so so so many bicycles. Thousands of people (and bikes) have come through our door and been helped over the past 6 years. The time has come for us to move to a new space in which we can continue to grow our workspace and our programming. We are excited for a new start in our new space in PARKDALE, located at 1416 Queen Street West!

One of our goals is to improve our storage and organization, as well as building an even more open and accessible space. This space is much larger which will allow us to build a more physically accessible space, and to have (gasp) more than one toilet! Being able to better utilize our food, craft and event resources is also key to improving how the Bike Pirates space functions as a community hub.


Why do we need your support ($$$)?

As a not-for-profit organization we depend on support from individuals for our day-to-day operating costs. A move is a big project, and we have some big plans to improve how we operate in our new space.

Our goal is to raise $20,000 to be able to launch a bigger and better Bike Pirates. First though we will need to cover the costs of physically moving our entire shop (and all of those many, many bikes). It is also likely that we will lose 2-3 months worth of income during the moving and renovating period. We are also taking into consideration the period of time it may take community members to find out where we are and come find us at our new home.


SPECIFIC COSTS
The largest cost for us will be renovating the new shop. This would include costs of materials for:

- Laying durable flooring in our workshop space $2000-$3000
The current floor is tile and concrete which can be hazardous and slippery in a workshop where soap and oil are commonly present. Concrete is also difficult to clean and can be problematic for folks with physical/joint pain. In order to avoid a slippery or dangerous workspace, we will lay new flooring and/or use industrial mats.

- Building and replacing storage for parts (cabinets, hooks, shelves) and bikes (racks, hooks, lofts) $2000

- Building a new kitchen: installing flooring, countertops, cupboards, shelving, new        sink, $1500

- appliances $1000

- painting everything! $800

- building and plumbing up a second small bathroom $600

- Rewiring and installing lighting in our basement $400

- Rebuilding our tool workspace (tool boards, durable tool storage, signs) $400

- installing a workshop sink $200

- wiring and electrical installs for a stove and for welding capabilities $200

- Security including doors, locks, metal gates, cash boxes $500

We will also need to update our website and promotional materials (business cards, flyers, stickers, signage and branding) $800


The more money we raise the better materials we can access, including prioritizing ethically sourced or environmentally friendly resources where possible. We also have stretch goals of improving access and use of our art materials (screen printing, sewing, welding), and purchasing new computers and a POS system for improved operation at our front of shop.

Goals beyond renos:
- New computer(s) $500
- Device for POS/accepting Paypal and Square on site $300
- button-maker $300
- projector for movie nights $600
- Automatic door installation (approx $5000)

PERKS!
We have some perks available if you need incentive to donate - Bike Pirates swag like patches, t-shirts and zines, and some bigger stuff like the opportunity to have a "private" workshop session run by our volunteers. Check out what we have to offer, bearing in mind that "service" or "event" type perks are only available in Toronto. There are some photos in the "Gallery" section, and some new perks being donated by our bike allies!
Our Silk-Screened T-Shirts sold out after less than a week, so we are going to add more! When we contact you after the campaign you can let us know what design you prefer OR you can come to our screen-printing night and make your own T-Shirt!


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP!
If you are a retailer or maker of goods bike-related or not, consider donating a reward to this campaign!
Please be assured that physical help is as valuable to us as money!
We would love assistance from our community in the heavy parts of this project:
Sorting, scrapping, packing and moving our stuff.
Designing and laying out our new space for accessibility and functionality.
Cleaning and renovating the new space - especially if you have any specific reno skills (flooring, electrical, carpentry, etc.)
Spread the word!
Share this campaign with any folks you think might support us!
Keep your friends and community up to date on our progress and accomplishments (we moved all the bikes YAY!). Tweet about us or share our updates on social media.
Quash any rumours and misinformation that might be circulating.
Give us high fives!

story:
"The Picquest Mobile App is Like Uber, Only Instead of a Ride You Find a Photographer" - Patepixel

For the last two years we have been working on a solution for a personal pain. Apparently that pain is shared by many photographers and people:

  • Photographers are busy shooting, making photos, less time to socialize.
  • People aren't aware of the photographer around . 
                                                 No communication. No connection. 

Few prototypes and tests, we came up with a fast and Easy communication channel to get people and photographers connected: 

                                     Meet Picquest 

How does it work:

"Featuring a simple design with an intuitive layout for both the profile pages and the browsing experience, Picquest offers a unique marketing platform for photographers who are looking to stand out and get their name and services recognized in a simple and effective method." - Petapixel

"It seems Picquest has the potential to be both a location- and image-based social network and a business development tool for professional photographers." - DP CONNECT

We got covered by Petapixel.com, dpconnect.com, geektime.com, Megapixel.co.il and many more in German, Spanish, Italian and even one covered pooed out in Taiwan! 

        Find photographers around you. Connect!


Cool. It's working. Now we need your help!

We created a fast and cool communication channel and a way to find and connect with the photographer you need, when you need him.

Based on beta testing, with more than 4000 users and 2000 world photographers, we need to enhance the service. We must make it GREAT!

       Our plan:

  • Fester messaging enhancement. 
  • Add attachment to messages (In case the photographer want to share photo, file or address)
  • Real-Time web to App to web messaging. 
  • Enhance photo upload options so photographers can post their photos ASAP, and photos will be streamed to apps/web around the globe. 
  • Post request for photographer service. Just pick the date/location. Post
  • Finish the Android app version development. Post it for free on Google play. 
                                      

                            

The Impact

So far the response from both world photographers, people and media groups is great. With the new enhancements, we are about to change the way people, Photographers and photos are connected.  

  • More photographers online and available around the globe.
  • More photos taken.
  • Happy people. 
                                Enjoy photography! Get to the photos you need:

            

Get people interested in your photos. People can reach you for Print, Copy or commercial usage interest. They can contact you directly!


What people say? They are happy...We need to make them connected. Available. 

      

  

Challenges
  • We still have the Android people and photographers out there, waiting for the Android version.  That version app under development and we need it ASAP. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Download the app and start searching for the right photographer.
  • Tell a friend!
  • Spread the word. 
  • If you are a photographer, Join the growing community. Get connected.

story:
REWARDS:

First, we were planning to create a safe pedestrian crossing through which drivers could see a pedestrian from long distance and take measures to prevent the accident. We were planning to create something like this:


After analyzing the existing technologies, we realized it would be difficult to implement these devices at the present stage of development of 3D projections. Besides, the manufacturing and installation of such structures would be extremely expensive for the city budget. We have dramatically changed the view of the problem and realized that it is possible to install the projection device in the car, so the information would be reflected on the windshield, just like head-up speedometers:


Later we decided to expand our idea and not be limited only to pedestrian crossings, but also include the rest of the road signs and traffic lights as well.

While driving on a road, a driver is forced to look at road signs located on a shoulder. So drivers either take their eyes off the road or do not always notice the road signs. Windshield Pprojected signs will be in front of the driver's eyes and will be more noticeable. When a person comes to a pedestrian crossing there will be warning animated picture displayed on the projection. As known, human eye catches moving objects better. A similar effect will occur to traffic signals too.

We believe that in the future this technology can be extended, so information of status on the road will be displayed on any car windshield. It could include crossroads indication, dangerous proximity to another car, bike, humans and pets. All this can become a reality, if we use extended interface and special microsensors.

Our main goal is to reduce accidents on the roads worldwide.

The number of such tragedies can be avoided by using the IRSD system.

WARNING! This video is not recommended for people under 18 years of age, pregnant women, the elderly, as well as people with unstable mentality.


Statistiqcs

In 2011, 4,432 pedestrians were killed and an estimated 69,000 were injured in traffic crashes in the United States. On average, a pedestrian was killed every two hours and injured every eight minutes in traffic crashes.

Based on the data NHTSA’s National Center for Statistics and Analysis

More than 270 000 pedestrians lose their lives on the world’s roads each year accounting for 22% of the total 1.24 million road traffic deaths. WHO is calling on governments to take concrete actions to improve the safety of pedestrians.

Based on the data World Health Organization (WHO)

The system Immediate road sign display (IRSD) 

Transmitter signal. Type A - standalone transmitter.

Transmitter signal. Type B - Transmitter powered by electricity.

Projector receiver.

When a car is approaching a sign or a traffic light, the projector receives the signal emitted by the transmitter and displays the picture.

When a car is approaching a sign or a traffic light, the projector receives the signal emitted by the transmitter and displays the picture.

Project Plan

On the website www.irsd.info you can ask questions and participate in the improvement of the IRSD system.

Risks and challenges.

We realize that our way will be challenging and we will have to handle some issues that might occur to every start-up project. However we believe that our commitment to making the world safer and help of the society will allow us to develop our ides to the maximum.

At the beginning, we expect that technical adjustment of the system to be needed,  starting with the design of signal broadcasting antennas and robust construction of the transmitter as well as attachment to the sign.

Our main challenge is the development of an infrastructure of the road signs equipped with transmitters. For this, we have to receive financial support from the city administration.

Therefore, we hope for your generosity and help with the project. We welcome any criticism, advice, knowledge and contacts to the persons or organizations who might help us with further development.

 We would like to discuss contentious issues, add innovations in our project. We intend to go all the way and showcase the final product able to make our world better. This is only may become a reality with your help. Let’s make roads safer together!  

Visit our forum www.irsd.info if u have any questions.

Thank you!
story_txt: REWARDS:First, we were planning to create a safe pedestrian crossing through which drivers could see a pedestrian from long distance and take measures to prevent the accident. We were planning to create something like this: After analyzing the existing technologies, we realized it would be difficult to implement these devices at the present stage of development of 3D projections. Besides, the manufacturing and installation of such structures would be extremely expensive for the city budget. We have dramatically changed the view of the problem and realized that it is possible to install the projection device in the car, so the information would be reflected on the windshield, just like head-up speedometers: Later we decided to expand our idea and not be limited only to pedestrian crossings, but also include the rest of the road signs and traffic lights as well.While driving on a road, a driver is forced to look at road signs located on a shoulder. So drivers either take their eyes off the road or do not always notice the road signs. Windshield Pprojected signs will be in front of the driver's eyes and will be more noticeable. When a person comes to a pedestrian crossing there will be warning animated picture displayed on the projection. As known, human eye catches moving objects better. A similar effect will occur to traffic signals too.  We believe that in the future this technology can be extended, so information of status on the road will be displayed on any car windshield. It could include crossroads indication, dangerous proximity to another car, bike, humans and pets. All this can become a reality, if we use extended interface and special microsensors.Our main goal is to reduce accidents on the roads worldwide.The number of such tragedies can be avoided by using the IRSD system.WARNING! This video is not recommended for people under 18 years of age, pregnant women, the elderly, as well as people with unstable mentality.StatistiqcsIn 2011, 4,432 pedestrians were killed and an estimated 69,000 were injured in traffic crashes in the United States. On average, a pedestrian was killed every two hours and injured every eight minutes in traffic crashes.Based on the data NHTSA’s National Center for Statistics and AnalysisMore than 270 000 pedestrians lose their lives on the world’s roads each year accounting for 22% of the total 1.24 million road traffic deaths. WHO is calling on governments to take concrete actions to improve the safety of pedestrians.Based on the data World Health Organization (WHO)The system Immediate road sign display (IRSD) Transmitter signal. Type A - standalone transmitter.Transmitter signal. Type B - Transmitter powered by electricity.Projector receiver.When a car is approaching a sign or a traffic light, the projector receives the signal emitted by the transmitter and displays the picture.When a car is approaching a sign or a traffic light, the projector receives the signal emitted by the transmitter and displays the picture.Project PlanOn the website www.irsd.info you can ask questions and participate in the improvement of the IRSD system.Risks and challenges.We realize that our way will be challenging and we will have to handle some issues that might occur to every start-up project. However we believe that our commitment to making the world safer and help of the society will allow us to develop our ides to the maximum.At the beginning, we expect that technical adjustment of the system to be needed,  starting with the design of signal broadcasting antennas and robust construction of the transmitter as well as attachment to the sign.Our main challenge is the development of an infrastructure of the road signs equipped with transmitters. For this, we have to receive financial support from the city administration.Therefore, we hope for your generosity and help with the project. We welcome any criticism, advice, knowledge and contacts to the persons or organizations who might help us with further development. We would like to discuss contentious issues, add innovations in our project. We intend to go all the way and showcase the final product able to make our world better. This is only may become a reality with your help. Let’s make roads safer together!  Visit our forum www.irsd.info if u have any questions.Thank you!

story:
The idea

Hi everyone! Who has never had any problems on the safety of their own files? Easy, nobody! Your files need to be protected everyday from different threats, from the most common to the most unusual. But how can you do it? Only by renting space from us! We are the first virtual depot! We'll keep files safe and always available, you'll be protected against failures of the computer, theft or snoopers!  Our files are in costant danger. Virus, hacker are just some threats with wich we have to fight. But also sharing a computer with our family or in a community could put our privacy at risk! There's one solution of course, rent a space in our database is the most easier solution. We use already the self storage centres to protect our goods, our files are precious as our goods, isn't it? So don't waste your time, don't lose your mind! Just keep one's head! Net storage centre is good for you! 

We need your support for the start up!

 

What we need to start 

25000 dollars? What to do with it?

Check this!

-Database 3000 $

-Advertisment 5000 $

-Start up costs 2500 $

The services

We offer three main services:

ideal for individuals

ideal for families, communities and small businesses

the complete package, ideal for large companies

enter in our website

choose which files you want to upload

Step 3

upload it using our software

Step 4

wait for confirmation and that's it!!

When would you like to receive back a file just send us the request!

 

Thanks for your support

We need your help, togheter we can do everything, please support us also on twitter and facebook!

story:
We are shipping now!

The World’s Most Portable and Powerful Long Range Personal Electric Vehicle

The Backfire Mini was born for the city, with a top speed of 42kmh/26mph and standard range of 15-18km/9-11miles per charge. It is built with supercar-grade carbon fiber and weighs only 5.8kg/12.8lbs.

✅ Weight: 5.8 kg / 12.8 lbs
✅ Dimensions: 79 * 22.5 cm / 31 * 8.85 inches
✅ Top Speed: 42 kmh / 26 mph
✅ Range: 18 km / 11 miles
✅ Max Load: 110 kg / 240 lbs
✅ Battery: Samsung 21700 40T

Check out what our users have to say about Backfire Mini:

 
 

Why Backfire?

We are aware that there are many other lightweight electric skateboards on the market, soooo... Why choose Backfire?

 
✅ Long Range
The biggest problem for most mini boards on the market is their short range. Backfire Mini, despite being a true mini board, provides a 15-18km/9-11miles long range per charge.
 
✅ Carbon Fiber Deck
Backfire Mini is built with 100% pure aerospace grade carbon fiber to significantly reduce the weight of the board to 5.8kg/12.8lbs and greatly increase the strength of the board.
 
✅ 1.5h Fast Charging
Don't worry about running out of battery. Backfire Mini offers 1.5h fast charging. Within the period of a lunch or coffee time, the board is fully charged for your next adventure.
 
✅ 10 Years Experience
Backfire Skateboards has been established for over 10 years now and launched two very successful campaigns on Indiegogo with more than 65,000 fans worldwide.

How Backfire Mini Works

What's Inside The Package

01 Take it anywhere

You can take this 12.8lb baby into the subway, jump on the bus, and carry it in a small bag. Just pick it up and go. I mean you can even take this sucker on an aircraft, legally.

02 Super Power System

Two 450W direct drive hub motors provide you with enough power to climb 25% grade hills quickly and easily and desend them confidently, so you can get where you need to go without breaking a sweat.

03 Long Range Up To 18 KM/11 Miles

A battery pack consisting of 12 Samsung 21700 40T cells provides up to 18km/11miles range, which makes Backfire Mini perfect for your daily commute.

04 Super Quiet

Instead of the belt drive system commonly seen on the market, Backfire Mini is equipped with two hub motors which are super quiet and will not attract attention while you are shuttling in the crowd.

05 Safe and Smooth Brake System

The Backfire Mini provides a responsive braking system that is powerful and smooth, allowing you to quickly brake to a stop without throwing you off the board, and the brakes can be fully controlled.

06 Ultra-Concise Design

Full carbon fiber deck reduces the weight by 1KG and makes the whole board tougher and stronger. 

There is no extra battery compartment at the bottom, which makes the board look concise and elegant. And the professional concave design at the top gives you greater stability and control.

07 Water Resistant

There is no slot at the bottom, so you can ride through any small pool without problem.

The motor is water resistant. The battery is protected by the case. The ESC is wrapped with glue. All these measures ensure an excellent water-resistant performance of the board.

08 Removable TSA-Approved Battery

You can carry the board wherever you go and even on a plane with our removable TSA-approved battery.

Comparision Chart

Model Backfire Mini Brand B
　
Price $499 $749
Range 18km/11miles 11km/7miles
Top Speed 42kmh/26mph 30kmh/18mph
Weight of Board 5.8kg/12.8lb 7kg/15lb
Dimensions 79*22.5cm 75*25cm
Dimensions 31*8.85inch 29.5*10inch
Hill Climbing Up to 25% Up to 20%
Remote R2 OLED Display Remote Controller
Standard Wheels 85mm 80mm
Charging Time 1.5h /

1. Backfire's roots were a traditional skateboard company, so they know what a skateboarder expects from their ride... The Mini has a great concave deck to give you a planted ride, yet it has a kickable nose and tail, which gives you the freedom to ride in more confined spaces... curb jumps, transcending steps, tik tak, 180 degree static kick turns are all a doddle... unlike other boards that CALL themselves "Mini boards"...

2. Despite being a true Mini Board, its range is still 15-18km, that's 10miles per charge, amazingly it can also be ridden at high speeds, a ground breaking 42km/h, that’s 26mph... Plus... with it’s torquey hub motors, hill climbing is not an issue...

3. There is also a smaller, easily switchable, optional battery available, 99wh, which means you can easily take it on plane and go around the world

The right choice is Backfire... you know it makes sense right!

We Are Already In Production!

We have completed the production of the mold and entered the mass production stage. It is expected that the first batch of 200 sets of Backfire Mini will be produced on October 25, 2019.

Local Customer Service and Local Shipping

Our warehouse in Hamburg, Germany and the customer service center in the UK serve customers in Europe. The warehouse in Los Angeles and the customer service center in Richmond serve all North American customers. The customer service center in Shanghai, China and the factory in Shenzhen serve customers from other regions.

story:
A few days ago I found out that freeloading gallbladder of mine decided to completely stop working. The nerve, after all I have done for that little guy. Well after 32 long years together I've decided It’s time for us to part ways.  Ah the memories we have had. Well everything comes to an end sometime.

My work is asking (read: telling) me to take off two weeks of work. I am fortunate to have a very caring job that provides me with great benefits. However due to a bureaucratic technicality, I won’t be getting paid for most of the first week.

In the last few months I have moved and stated a new business (stay tuned.) I spent all of my savings with between both those endeavors. 

Oh hindsight, why must you be so 20/20?

So I need to make some quick cash. And I am willing to sing for my supper.

Check out all the sweet perks. All of which will be delivered to your deserving mits by September 1st.

I will also gladly accept encouragement and/or soup...

story:
Backfire Team

Randy and Jerry have been skateboarding lovers since early 2000's in college. In student age, they were troubled to spend their money for the expensive or even over-priced skateboards.  Therefore, Randy and Jerry co-founded Backfire Skateboards in 2009 with a mission for the company to deliver high quality, affordable skateboards and fun to all skateboarders in the world.  Backfire entered the electric skateboard field in later 2014 and introduced Backfire G1, then in 2016 started the project for Backfire G2, and come production in later 2017.  Randy leads the major R&D and lives in China. As a skater, Randy did a lot of testing on his own during R&D stage to make sure the board performs the best for the users.   Jerry came to the United States to get his Master degree in business and lived in Richmond Virginia with his family; currently leads the company's strategic planning and marketing.  

Backfire G2 Project Mile Stones

  • 2016/04,  The project started
  • 2016/09,  The initial phototype board finished
  • 2017/01,   First 1000 Km road test finished
  • 2017/05,  Small production for testing samples started
  • 2017/07 to 2017/08,  BMS issue and non-brake issue on full charged battery were fixed

  • 2017/10, Wheels vibration issue were identified and fixed
  • 2017/11,  Plan to go on Indiegogo Campaign and continue mass production
  • 2017/12,  Containers with the boards will sail from China 
  • 2018/01, Containers will arrive U.S. and Germany warehouse and we will start sending the board out to customers. 
  • 2018/02, Formal distribution with U.S. and Germany warehouse stock for local customers. 

WHERE WE SHIP

We are able to ship majority of the counties worldwide except certain countries with very strict import limitation of electric skateboards.  VAT and GST are also Included.  Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you. 

WHEN WE START SHIPPING

We plan to ship the product in Dec. 2017 via container to U.S. and Germany warehouse, also via small package forwarding to other regions and countries.  We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 

*There are certain facts like Customs Hold are out of our control in International shipping process，which might add 7 to 10 days to the whole lead time. 

WHY ORDER NOW

By backing us now, you will get the best deal of Backfire G2 Board at the low prices only available to backers on Indiegogo.  We pass the savings on the freight to you as customers.  There will not be such a good deal after the U.S. and European distribution distribution.  

WHY ORDER FROM BACKFIRE

High Flexible Deck

Trucks

Replaceable Wheels:

The package includes:

A full assembled board, the remote , the battery charger ,a USB remote charger, tools and user's manual.

Production Stage:

Just to confirm with some questions from customers and for the review of Indiegogo ：Is Backfire G2 fully in production?  Yes, it is. 

 

 

 

Reviews:

FAQs

About the Backfire Products:

  • What is the Backfire G2s Used for?  Economy and fast way to cut the traffic, travel from point A to point B.  Pure fun and enjoyment.
  • How far can I go before recharging the battery? 20Km(12 Miles) Maximum Range. Test condition: 75Kg (165 lbs.) rider , 30kph average speed, on flat and smooth road.
  • How long to fully charge the battery?  3 hours
  • What are the dimensions and weight? The deck size is 37.5 Inch by 8.25 inch.   Total weight for the board is 14.5lbs or 6.5KG
  • What kind of braking system do Backfire boards have? Backfire G2s feature hub motors with regenerative braking. While traveling downhill and braking, you'll get some energy back into the battery.
  • What is the maximum weight of user can the board load?   260 lbs. (However, please do not try to jump on the board or break it with additional strength).  
  • Is it water resistant? Backfire's IP55 water resistant rating enable riders to use the board in some conditions like after rain on the wet ground. You cannot use the board during the heavy rain or sink the board into the water.  Even though, we recommend you maintain the board in good dry condition always, which will extend the life of it much longer. 
  • Where is it manufactured?  China
  • What are the recommend ages? We recommend the user's age to be 14 years and up. Children under 14 years needs to be under the Adult's supervision.  Please make sure you always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear just in case. Do not ride the board out of your skills and always care about your surroundings.

About shipping:

  • What is the shipping time?   When the order ships from China, it takes about 7 to 20 days depending on the different countries you are in.  More details, please check our shipping instruction page. https://www.backfireboards.com/shipping

When we have stock in California warehouse again, the shipping will be using FedEx Ground or Home delivery service domestically, the transit time is generally 3 to 5 business days.

Germany warehouse is currently out of stock until further notice.

  • How much is shipping? Please see the shipping at the checkout page based on your country.  Some countries are free of shipping, and some countries require a shipping fee.
  • Do I have to pay VAT / GST to Europe? No, it is included in the price and shipping total if you buy the board. 

Return and Warranty Policy:

  • What is your return policy? We only accept return within 7 days under the Brand New condition with all accessories in the original package,  customer needs to pay for return shipping cost to our closest facility advised by our support team. Company will provide a refund for the Product(s) not including any shipping charges. Follow below steps to return the Product(s) purchased through our Website within seven (7) days of the date that we deliver the applicable Product (s):
    • Contact our Support team ( In China or U.S.) to initiate the return process and obtain authorization to submit the Products for return.
    • Create a shipping label addressed to “Backfire Returns”.
    • Pack the Products in the original packaging to ensure the Products will be returned without damage.
    • Once the package is received by us and confirmed in brand new condition, we will issue the refund less the shipping charge in Three (3) business days with an email confirmation.
  • What is the refund policy?  We do NOT refund once board is shipped except the return as brand new condition within 7 days. Customer has to pay for the return shipping cost. No shipping fee will be refunded.
  • What is the warranty? We offer 6 months (180 days) warranty on parts from the date when you receive the board. If a defect arises during the Warranty Period, Company will, at is options: 1). Send the new parts to replace the defect parts.  Most of the parts are fairly easy to be replaced with our design with our YouTube video instructions.  2). exchange the affected Products with functionally equivalent Products that are new or formed from new and/or previously used parts that are equivalent to new in performance and reliability. This warranty excludes normal depletion of consumable parts (grip tape, wheels & bears) unless due to a defect in materials or workmanship, and damage resulting from abuse, accident, modifications, unauthorized repairs, neglect, abuse, water damage, or other causes that are not defects in materials and workmanship.

For warranty repairs in United States, here are the processes :

  1. Contact our Support team to Tech@helloskate.com to provide your order No and detail information of the defectiveness,  some photos or a short 15 seconds video will be helpful.  A pre-paid return label will be provided to you via email once the case of warranty is confirmed .
  2. Pack the Products in original packaging or mail in a sturdy box to ensure the Products will be returned without damage.
  3. Once the Products are received and fixed, you will receive an email detailing the warranty service along with the return shipment’s tracking number.

Risks and Challenges

Safety 
Please make sure you always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear just in case. Please make sure you get used to the board before you speed up. Do not ride the board out of your skills and always care about your surroundings.

Warning:

1. Be sure to wear professional skateboard protective gears and skateboard helmet when using this electric skateboard.

2. There are risks of serious or fatal injury from collision, loss of control and unexpected falls while using this electric skateboard. It is your sole responsibility to learn safely ride this electric skateboard to reduce the risks: please read our user’s manual carefully and learn how to turn, accelerate and brake this electric skateboard. Backfire recommends you start with the beginner’s (low speed) mode first before using the sports (high speed) mode. Please use this electric skateboard reasonably within the control of your own abilities. Do not use this electric skateboard on dangerous road sections or big downhills. Do not use this electric skateboard in the night or poor visibility environment to avoid accidents. Backfire will not be responsible for any loss or damage caused by user in accidents.

3. Children under 14 years old must use this electric skateboard under adult’s supervision; or please place the product where children can't reach.

4. Please abide by local traffic regulations and laws to ride this electric skateboard; please respect other drivers and pedestrians on the road.

5. Please do frequent maintenance checks: before riding make sure screws are tight and wheels are in good conditions.

6. Please do not open the battery or controller cases without the direction from Backfire tech support, please do not modify the wiring or controller, please do not install the electric parts from other supplier to Backfire electric skateboard, which will terminate the warranty immediately.

LEGALITY 
Please check your local legal requirement of the electric vehicles and electric skateboards before you use it, the lows and regulations vary by countries, states or counties

 

Contact us:

China

Building 5, 3rd floor, No. 76 Jinma Road, 
Songjiang District，Shanghai 
Tel: +86-21-57863320 
After Sales Support: Adi@helloskate.com

International Distributors: Sales@helloskate.com

 

United States

4860 Cox Rd,Suite 200, 
Glen Allen,Virginia 23060 
Tel: 1-804-935-8525 
After Sales Support: Tech@helloskate.com   

Marketing and Dealers:  Jerry@helloskate.com
story_txt:
Backfire TeamRandy and Jerry have been skateboarding lovers since early 2000's in college. In student age, they were troubled to spend their money for the expensive or even over-priced skateboards.  Therefore, Randy and Jerry co-founded Backfire Skateboards in 2009 with a mission for the company to deliver high quality, affordable skateboards and fun to all skateboarders in the world.  Backfire entered the electric skateboard field in later 2014 and introduced Backfire G1, then in 2016 started the project for Backfire G2, and come production in later 2017.  Randy leads the major R&D and lives in China. As a skater, Randy did a lot of testing on his own during R&D stage to make sure the board performs the best for the users.   Jerry came to the United States to get his Master degree in business and lived in Richmond Virginia with his family; currently leads the company's strategic planning and marketing.  Backfire G2 Project Mile Stones

2016/04,  The project started

2016/09,  The initial phototype board finished

2017/01,   First 1000 Km road test finished

2017/05,  Small production for testing samples started
2017/07 to 2017/08,  BMS issue and non-brake issue on full charged battery were fixed

2017/10, Wheels vibration issue were identified and fixed
2017/11,  Plan to go on Indiegogo Campaign and continue mass production
2017/12,  Containers with the boards will sail from China 
2018/01, Containers will arrive U.S. and Germany warehouse and we will start sending the board out to customers. 
2018/02, Formal distribution with U.S. and Germany warehouse stock for local customers. 
WHERE WE SHIPWe are able to ship majority of the counties worldwide except certain countries with very strict import limitation of electric skateboards.  VAT and GST are also Included.  Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you. WHEN WE START SHIPPINGWe plan to ship the product in Dec. 2017 via container to U.S. and Germany warehouse, also via small package forwarding to other regions and countries.  We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *There are certain facts like Customs Hold are out of our control in International shipping process，which might add 7 to 10 days to the whole lead time. WHY ORDER NOWBy backing us now, you will get the best deal of Backfire G2 Board at the low prices only available to backers on Indiegogo.  We pass the savings on the freight to you as customers.  There will not be such a good deal after the U.S. and European distribution distribution.  WHY ORDER FROM BACKFIREHigh Flexible DeckTrucksReplaceable Wheels:The package includes:A full assembled board, the remote , the battery charger ,a USB remote charger, tools and user's manual.Production Stage:Just to confirm with some questions from customers and for the review of Indiegogo ：Is Backfire G2 fully in production?  Yes, it is. 

 
  Reviews:





FAQs
About the Backfire Products:


What is the Backfire G2s Used for?  Economy and fast way to cut the traffic, travel from point A to point B.  Pure fun and enjoyment.

How far can I go before recharging the battery? 20Km(12 Miles) Maximum Range. Test condition: 75Kg (165 lbs.) rider , 30kph average speed, on flat and smooth road.

How long to fully charge the battery?  3 hours

What are the dimensions and weight? The deck size is 37.5 Inch by 8.25 inch.   Total weight for the board is 14.5lbs or 6.5KG

What kind of braking system do Backfire boards have? Backfire G2s feature hub motors with regenerative braking. While traveling downhill and braking, you'll get some energy back into the battery.

What is the maximum weight of user can the board load?   260 lbs. (However, please do not try to jump on the board or break it with additional strength).  

Is it water resistant? Backfire's IP55 water resistant rating enable riders to use the board in some conditions like after rain on the wet ground. You cannot use the board during the heavy rain or sink the board into the water.  Even though, we recommend you maintain the board in good dry condition always, which will extend the life of it much longer. 

Where is it manufactured?  China

What are the recommend ages? We recommend the user's age to be 14 years and up. Children under 14 years needs to be under the Adult's supervision.  Please make sure you always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear just in case. Do not ride the board out of your skills and always care about your surroundings.

About shipping: 

What is the shipping time?   When the order ships from China, it takes about 7 to 20 days depending on the different countries you are in.  More details, please check our shipping instruction page. https://www.backfireboards.com/shipping

When we have stock in California warehouse again, the shipping will be using FedEx Ground or Home delivery service domestically, the transit time is generally 3 to 5 business days.
Germany warehouse is currently out of stock until further notice. 


How much is shipping? Please see the shipping at the checkout page based on your country.  Some countries are free of shipping, and some countries require a shipping fee.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST to Europe? No, it is included in the price and shipping total if you buy the board. 

Return and Warranty Policy:

What is your return policy? We only accept return within 7 days under the Brand New condition with all accessories in the original package,  customer needs to pay for return shipping cost to our closest facility advised by our support team. Company will provide a refund for the Product(s) not including any shipping charges. Follow below steps to return the Product(s) purchased through our Website within seven (7) days of the date that we deliver the applicable Product (s):
Contact our Support team ( In China or U.S.) to initiate the return process and obtain authorization to submit the Products for return.
Create a shipping label addressed to “Backfire Returns”.
Pack the Products in the original packaging to ensure the Products will be returned without damage.
Once the package is received by us and confirmed in brand new condition, we will issue the refund less the shipping charge in Three (3) business days with an email confirmation.




What is the refund policy?  We do NOT refund once board is shipped except the return as brand new condition within 7 days. Customer has to pay for the return shipping cost. No shipping fee will be refunded.

What is the warranty? We offer 6 months (180 days) warranty on parts from the date when you receive the board. If a defect arises during the Warranty Period, Company will, at is options: 1). Send the new parts to replace the defect parts.  Most of the parts are fairly easy to be replaced with our design with our YouTube video instructions.  2). exchange the affected Products with functionally equivalent Products that are new or formed from new and/or previously used parts that are equivalent to new in performance and reliability. This warranty excludes normal depletion of consumable parts (grip tape, wheels & bears) unless due to a defect in materials or workmanship, and damage resulting from abuse, accident, modifications, unauthorized repairs, neglect, abuse, water damage, or other causes that are not defects in materials and workmanship.


For warranty repairs in United States, here are the processes :

Contact our Support team to Tech@helloskate.com to provide your order No and detail information of the defectiveness,  some photos or a short 15 seconds video will be helpful.  A pre-paid return label will be provided to you via email once the case of warranty is confirmed .
Pack the Products in original packaging or mail in a sturdy box to ensure the Products will be returned without damage.
Once the Products are received and fixed, you will receive an email detailing the warranty service along with the return shipment’s tracking number.

Risks and Challenges
Safety Please make sure you always wear a helmet and your personal protective gear just in case. Please make sure you get used to the board before you speed up. Do not ride the board out of your skills and always care about your surroundings.
Warning:
1. Be sure to wear professional skateboard protective gears and skateboard helmet when using this electric skateboard.
2. There are risks of serious or fatal injury from collision, loss of control and unexpected falls while using this electric skateboard. It is your sole responsibility to learn safely ride this electric skateboard to reduce the risks: please read our user’s manual carefully and learn how to turn, accelerate and brake this electric skateboard. Backfire recommends you start with the beginner’s (low speed) mode first before using the sports (high speed) mode. Please use this electric skateboard reasonably within the control of your own abilities. Do not use this electric skateboard on dangerous road sections or big downhills. Do not use this electric skateboard in the night or poor visibility environment to avoid accidents. Backfire will not be responsible for any loss or damage caused by user in accidents.
3. Children under 14 years old must use this electric skateboard under adult’s supervision; or please place the product where children can't reach.
4. Please abide by local traffic regulations and laws to ride this electric skateboard; please respect other drivers and pedestrians on the road.
5. Please do frequent maintenance checks: before riding make sure screws are tight and wheels are in good conditions.
6. Please do not open the battery or controller cases without the direction from Backfire tech support, please do not modify the wiring or controller, please do not install the electric parts from other supplier to Backfire electric skateboard, which will terminate the warranty immediately.
LEGALITY Please check your local legal requirement of the electric vehicles and electric skateboards before you use it, the lows and regulations vary by countries, states or counties
 
Contact us:
China
Building 5, 3rd floor, No. 76 Jinma Road, Songjiang District，Shanghai Tel: +86-21-57863320 After Sales Support: Adi@helloskate.com
International Distributors: Sales@helloskate.com
 
United States
4860 Cox Rd,Suite 200, Glen Allen,Virginia 23060 Tel: 1-804-935-8525 After Sales Support: Tech@helloskate.com   
Marketing and Dealers:  Jerry@helloskate.com

story:
Fly home fast and tackle the toughest hills without breaking a sweat. Volta is packing a 40 mile range to get you where you need to be, quickly and easily - just like riding a bike. 

 

 

 

 

 

Bonus Stretch Goal Colorway

 

 

VOLTA's in the news! 

 

 

Get to you need to be

From Palo Alto to San Francisco, from Brooklyn to the Bronx and back, with 40 miles of power your rides are no longer limited by your legs. Let your imagination plan your route and see where it takes you.

The uphill test:

 

 

Integrated headlights and taillights activate at the first sign of low-light, and the automatic brake light helps keep you visible on the road, in traffic, and wherever your adventures take you. No hassle, no headaches, just illumination when you need it.

 

 

Anti-theft GPS tracking so you’ll never lose your ride.

Theft is one of the worst things that can happen to a bike (and its rider). We integrated GPS tracking into the Volta so even when it’s out of sight, it’s never out of mind and, if the unthinkable happens, you’ll be able to point the cops right to your ride.

 

 

Power how you want it, belt-drive or chain.

Whether you prefer the timeless look and feel of a chain or you’re ready to take the leap into the hassle-free world of belt drives, there’s a Volta set-up just for you. Belt drives are low-maintenance, mess free, and super durable so you can focus on the ride, not repairs. Chains are a bit more work, but if you’re a competent wrench, you might prefer the classic feel and knowing exactly what to expect on your maintenance calendar. It’s up to you!

 

 

 

 

Power where you need it

No complicated crank-drive, no clunky-transmission, just effortless power right where you need it. First we built a crank-drive motor, but weren’t happy with the bike’s performance. We test rode some front wheel motors currently on the market and couldn’t stand the way it affected steering and traction. Our rear-mounted motor keeps the bike balanced and delivers performance directly to the rear wheel, so it’s all “grip” and “go”, no hiccups or falsestarts.

Your bike, your way. Volta has 4 power modes, so you can get exactly as much assistance as you want.

Power: When time matters and you want to get from A to B, fast.
 
Eco: With 40 miles of range before a recharge, Eco mode is designed to stretch your horizons.
 
Smart:The perfect balance between power and battery life, no math required.
 
Bike: Powered by the classic “all-you” engine. Just like riding a bike.
 

Heavy on power, light on weight - only 35 lbs!

An e-bike is not really convenient if you can’t carry it up the stairs when you get back home. We spent weeks refining the Volta, shaving off weight everywhere possible and developing the sleekest, slimmest, lightest ride we could, without sacrificing range or power.

 

 

Room for everything

The integrated front basket lets you load up your bike without sacrificing stability. With plenty of room for a briefcase, a case of beer, or all the stuff for setting up Steve’s surprise party – you can keep your back free of packs and still arrive with everything you need.

 

 

 

An e-bike that looks like a bike.

40 miles of charge packed neatly into the frame so your ride doesn’t scream “e-bike,” it just delivers.

No big, ugly battery. No clunky add-on systems. Just pure power in a sleek package. Heck, your friends might not even notice it’s an e-bike (until you casually blast past them uphill).

 

Track your performance and fit riding into your fitness.

We designed and developed health tracking in the Volta app, so you can keep an eye on your workout details, calories burned, track your trips, and more. Make riding part of your regimen, track your fitness goals, and become the you you’ve always wanted to be.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pure Cycles was founded with one mission in mind: to get more people on bikes. For 6 years we've been designing, developing, and delivering the coolest bikes on the market and it's been a blast to watch our brand and our bikes spread around the world. Now, in 2017, we're ready to take the next big step for our company - Volta. We hope you'll join us in opening up the two-wheeled world to even more people through the magic of electricity, engineering, and excited supporters just like you.

After 4 years of studying Computer Science at Columbia, Jordan returned home ready to launch the bike business with his buds. Since then he’s overseen the tech side of things, building the website, turning Pure Cycles into one of the premier web-retailers in the bike space, and ensuring that our customer service is always the best in the industry. 

 

It was during Michael and Austin’s college career at UW Madison that they realized the shortage of cool, affordable bikes available on the market. When they returned to LA and launched Pure Cycles, Michael took the reins on all things fiscal. Crunching numbers, forecasting financials, and oiling the machine that would become the best bike company in the country has kept him busy (and happy) for the last 6 years.

With an eye for quality and an instinct for international relations, Austin is responsible for our production relationships, assembly facilities, and the logistics of running a worldwide enterprise out of a dorm room. We’ve come a long way since those early days and Austin’s been scaling up our operations with every new development to keep us on the top of our game.

Timeline:

 

Bicycle Specs:

 

Warranty

Sweet new bike, same amazing warranty.
 
Just like the rest of our rides, Volta's a bike we're proud to stand behind and know that you'll be proud to own. We're confident in our construction, design, and engineering - and you'll share that confidence with our 18-month warranty on all the electrical components, including the battery. This is a bike that'll keep you rolling for years, and if not, we'll make it right. Ride easy, we've got your back.

We hope you'll join us in opening up the two-wheeled world to even more people through the magic of electricity, engineering, and excited supporters just like you.

Since then he’s overseen the tech side of things, building the website, turning Pure Cycles into one of the premier web-retailers in the bike space, and ensuring that our customer service is always the best in the industry.

Bicycle Specs:

 

Warranty

Sweet new bike, same amazing warranty.
 
Just like the rest of our rides, Volta's a bike we're proud to stand behind and know that you'll be proud to own. We're confident in our construction, design, and engineering - and you'll share that confidence with our 18-month warranty on all the electrical components, including the battery. story:
Short Summary

She is my wife's grandmother. She and her family are victims of the strongest typhoon in recorded history, typhoon Haiyan. After a year, she is still living in a make shift house made of light materials gathered from her old house. 

Me and my wife want to help her as she is already almost 100 years old. Although me and my wife are working in Singapore, we don't have enough money to help her rebuild her house. 

This is her actual house after the typhoon.


Extent of the damage to the community.

What We Need & What You Get

We will need at least $10,000 to rebuild her house from scratch. This is only the start of our help to them as the whole community really needs all the help they can get. The excess funding that we will get from this campaign will be donated to the local non-profit organisation that helps in rebuilding houses in the community.

The Impact

This will change her remaining days as she needs a comfortable house to stay due to her age. 

As most of us knows, Philippines is hit by at least 20 typhoons every year and a good and strong house will not only make her comfortable but also provide protection to her and her family.

Risks & Challenges

The real obstacle in this campaign will be the logistics of the materials and manpower in building the house. I am currently in contact with the family members and we are already looking for people who are willing to do the labor intensive job if not for free, will accept far cheaper labor cost than usual.

Other Ways You Can Help

I am not asking for so much. Only a dollar for every view and sharing this campaign to people you know will go a long way. If you feel generous, please feel free to donate as much as you can.
