story:
Eon converts any skateboard or longboard into an electric board in minutes.


Simply bolt on our Power-train and you're off! 



Just check out these stats! 

The Options:
Convert Board Or Go Complete?

Want to know which perk is right for you? Let's start with an overview. 


 

Converting Your Current Board

The Eon Power-train's modular design allows for multiple configurations and flexibility to fit almost any deck or any trucks you currently own.

Step 1: Though compatible with almost all types of skateboard decks and trucks, you should have a reasonably flat and smooth underside. 

 

Getting The Complete

If you're not interested in converting your board, no problem! We're offering a Limited Edition set of complete boards made to our specs. Each Complete Board comes pre-assembled right out of the box. Just turn it on and begin riding in seconds!   


Pre-Tuned & Custom Modes

Both our Kits and our Completes come with the Unlimited mobile app enabling three riding modes which can be fine-tuned to your preferences.

With our custom options, you can further tune each aspect to create special scenarios for max range, max speed, and more... Simply open the Eon Smartphone App and start adjusting while you ride to find the setting that fits best. 

It's All In The Features 

Loaded with features for performance, durability, safety and so much more.

 

 
  • Progressive Brakes: just by slowing down, our regenerative braking automatically adds an average of a 10% range. 
  • Weather resistant: motor and electronics are weather proof so you can ride through puddles (heavy rain or submerging not recommended)
  • Carbon plate: Our mounting plate is made from carbon fiber to keep the weight low and performance through the roof!  
  • Optimum Field-Oriented Control: advanced control algorithms for a smooth, stealthy ride with direct drive motors for natural torque.  
  • Nitro Button: shhhh...it's your secret weapon and extra power that’s active for a few seconds and will let you edge out in any race!
     

So Which Is Right For Me? 

The Power-Train Electric Kits

If you're considering converting your current board, our Kit option may be best. 
Remember, each one is simple to install and lets you keep your own board and trucks. Just slide the mounting plate under your rear truck, attach the power pack and bolt on the motor as if it were a standard wheel.

It's seriously that easy... 

The "SOLO" Power-Train Kit

The lightweight option so you can still shred. Great for short trips around town.

 

Comes with everything you need: single motor, single battery, matching 3x81mm 79a wheels, handheld remote, 2A charger, carbon plate & all mounting hardware.

 

The "CRUISER" Power-Train Kit

The traveler option that doubles your range with an additional battery,
while only adding an extra 1.6lbs.

Comes with everything you need: single motor, double battery, matching 3x81mm 79a wheels, handheld remote, 2A charger, carbon plate & all mounting hardware.

The "R" Power-Train Kit

It's our top of the line kit! Dual battery, dual motors and zooms up nearly any hill.

Comes with everything you need: double motor, double battery, matching 3x81mm 79a wheels, handheld remote, 2A charger, carbon plate & all mounting hardware.

 

The Complete Boards  

Just want to get on a board and start riding? No assembly required here. Take a look at our three options below: 

 

The "BRUTE" Deck Complete Electric Skateboard  

Our shortest, stiffest deck like the old-school boards you're used too.

 

Comes with everything you need: Spacer, ABEC7 bearings, reverse Kingpin trucks, grip-tape and everything specific to each power-train.

The "DROP" Deck Complete Electric Skateboard  

This is our longboard setup that's built with some flex, allowing you to cruise the boardwalk with ease...

 

Comes with everything you need: Spacer, ABEC7 bearings, reverse Kingpin trucks, grip-tape and everything specific to each power-train.

    The "KICK" Deck Complete Electric Skateboard 

    Slightly longer than the "BRUTE" but with added flex and kick-tail.

     

    Comes with everything you need: Spacer, ABEC7 bearings, reverse Kingpin trucks, grip-tape and everything specific to each power-train.

    Have A Question?

    Click the link to contact us: Facebook Messenger

    See What's Inside The Box

    *Designs seen below will change as we approach our launch date

     

    • Fine tune your board: power delivery, top speed, NITRO 
    • Share your rides and discover new riding spots 
    • Update the firmware to include the latest updates and upgrades
       

     

     

    • Motor: High efficiency in-wheel making smooth, stealthy and drag free 
    • Wheel: 81mm 79a Urethane wheel/liner 
    • Fits most Trucks: almost all TKP (traditional skate trucks), most RKP (reverse kingpin / most longboards) like Paris, Atlas, Caliber, Bear, Randal, Gullwing. 
    • Contact us: before pledging if you have a truck with a very big hanger end (where the axle starts) at be@unlimited.engineering

     

    • 99 Wh Lithium-ion cells (10S - 37 V)  
    • Meets IATA air travel regulations and includes a travel safety bag
    • Charge time at 2A = 75min  
    • Swappable: UNLIMITED range!
       

    Product Roadmap

    After more than a year and countless prototypes we are excited to get our product into the public. Below you'll find our product roadmap for the coming months. 

    The Unlimited Engineering team is formed by Carlos Kübler, Juan Pablo Viera and Alejandro Veloz, a group of engineers passionate about riding, racing, and extreme sports.

     

     

    An Agency 2.0 Certified Campaign to ensure quality and fulfillment.

     

     At Agency 2.0, our commitment is to the backers by vetting every crowdfunding campaign to ensure the quality product designs, fulfillment practices and the team behind the campaign.  

    When backing an Agency 2.0 Certified Partner Campaign, you can rest assured we did our homework so you do not have to. Our certified campaigns far exceed the industry in quality and in on-time delivery.

     

     Laws and regulations pertaining electric longboards or electric skateboards vary by country, state, county, and municipality. You are responsible in making sure that it is legal to ride in your area, so please make sure you investigate your local regulations.  

    Skateboarding, and especially on electric powered boards, is an inherently dangerous sport and safety equipment should be used at all times, especially a helmet. Don’t be too cool for safety equipment and risk your life. Even the pros use a helmet and pads. Always watch out for cars while riding on surface roads open to traffic and follow all local rules. Always skate within your abilities and use common sense while riding.  

    Your board can become unresponsive and loose power and brakes at any moment due to many factors like: dead remote battery, unintentional release of the throttle, radio interference, dropping the remote control, regenerative overcharging of a full battery, or other. This will turn the board into an unpowered skate without brakes, so learn how to slow down by sliding and only ride your board at speeds that where you would be able to stop without power or brakes.  

    Unlimited Engineering accepts no liability should you injure yourself using any products sold under our brand names.  

     

    A Special Thanks 

    To all of our friends and family who have supported us along the ride: Andres Sosa, Jose Galvez, Alberto Viera, Ilse Lugo, Viviana Abricot, Julio Viera, Jose Enrique del Rey, Luigi Rodriguez, Ani Subbarao, Marcos Valencia, Arturo Prieto, Lucas Mestre, Juan Antonio García, Nicolas Veloz, Cristina Fes, Bumbum, Marta Santamaria, Bea Cuca, Michele Bardi, Alessandro Fedeli, Raul Payri, Alberto Sheinfeld, William Torrealba, Alberto Lopez, Andrés Blank, Inaki Berenguer, Amanda Von Goetz, Alvaro Perez-Segnini, Nelson Fong, Leo Walder, Mauro Figueroa, Krloos Rivera | Las Naves
story_txt:
Eon converts any skateboard or longboard into an electric board in minutes.
Simply bolt on our Power-train and you're off! 

Just check out these stats! 

 
The Options:Convert Board Or Go Complete?
Want to know which perk is right for you? Let's start with an overview.  
Converting Your Current Board 
The Eon Power-train's modular design allows for multiple configurations and flexibility to fit almost any deck or any trucks you currently own.
Step 1: Though compatible with almost all types of skateboard decks and trucks, you should have a reasonably flat and smooth underside. 
 
 
Step 2: With (3) power-train options, you can build the ultimate long-distance cruiser, a lightweight shredder, or any combo you can imagine. Pick a type and start building! 

Getting The Complete
If you're not interested in converting your board, no problem! We're offering a Limited Edition set of complete boards made to our specs. Each Complete Board comes pre-assembled right out of the box. Just turn it on and begin riding in seconds!   
 

Pre-Tuned & Custom Modes
Both our Kits and our Completes come with the Unlimited mobile app enabling three riding modes which can be fine-tuned to your preferences.

With our custom options, you can further tune each aspect to create special scenarios for max range, max speed, and more... Simply open the Eon Smartphone App and start adjusting while you ride to find the setting that fits best. 
It's All In The Features 
Loaded with features for performance, durability, safety and so much more.

 

 


Progressive Brakes: just by slowing down, our regenerative braking automatically adds an average of a 10% range. 

Weather resistant: motor and electronics are weather proof so you can ride through puddles (heavy rain or submerging not recommended)

Carbon plate: Our mounting plate is made from carbon fiber to keep the weight low and performance through the roof!  

Optimum Field-Oriented Control: advanced control algorithms for a smooth, stealthy ride with direct drive motors for natural torque.  

Nitro Button: shhhh...it's your secret weapon and extra power that’s active for a few seconds and will let you edge out in any race! 



So Which Is Right For Me? 
The Power-Train Electric Kits
If you're considering converting your current board, our Kit option may be best. Remember, each one is simple to install and lets you keep your own board and trucks. Just slide the mounting plate under your rear truck, attach the power pack and bolt on the motor as if it were a standard wheel.
It's seriously that easy... 
 

The "SOLO" Power-Train Kit
The lightweight option so you can still shred. Great for short trips around town.
 
 
Comes with everything you need: single motor, single battery, matching 3x81mm 79a wheels, handheld remote, 2A charger, carbon plate & all mounting hardware.
 
The "CRUISER" Power-Train Kit
The traveler option that doubles your range with an additional battery,while only adding an extra 1.6lbs.

Comes with everything you need: single motor, double battery, matching 3x81mm 79a wheels, handheld remote, 2A charger, carbon plate & all mounting hardware.
The "R" Power-Train Kit
It's our top of the line kit! Dual battery, dual motors and zooms up nearly any hill.

Comes with everything you need: double motor, double battery, matching 3x81mm 79a wheels, handheld remote, 2A charger, carbon plate & all mounting hardware.  
The Complete Boards  
Just want to get on a board and start riding? No assembly required here. Take a look at our three options below: 

 
The "BRUTE" Deck Complete Electric Skateboard  
Our shortest, stiffest deck like the old-school boards you're used too.

 

Comes with everything you need: Spacer, ABEC7 bearings, reverse Kingpin trucks, grip-tape and everything specific to each power-train.
The "DROP" Deck Complete Electric Skateboard  
This is our longboard setup that's built with some flex, allowing you to cruise the boardwalk with ease...

 

Comes with everything you need: Spacer, ABEC7 bearings, reverse Kingpin trucks, grip-tape and everything specific to each power-train.



The "KICK" Deck Complete Electric Skateboard 
Slightly longer than the "BRUTE" but with added flex and kick-tail.

 

Comes with everything you need: Spacer, ABEC7 bearings, reverse Kingpin trucks, grip-tape and everything specific to each power-train.
Have A Question?
Click the link to contact us: Facebook Messenger
See What's Inside The Box
*Designs seen below will change as we approach our launch date
Core Components
 


Fine tune your board: power delivery, top speed, NITRO 
Share your rides and discover new riding spots 
Update the firmware to include the latest updates and upgrades 

 

 

 



Motor: High efficiency in-wheel making smooth, stealthy and drag free 

Wheel: 81mm 79a Urethane wheel/liner 

Fits most Trucks: almost all TKP (traditional skate trucks), most RKP (reverse kingpin / most longboards) like Paris, Atlas, Caliber, Bear, Randal, Gullwing. 

Contact us: before pledging if you have a truck with a very big hanger end (where the axle starts) at be@unlimited.engineering

 
 


99 Wh Lithium-ion cells (10S - 37 V)  
Meets IATA air travel regulations and includes a travel safety bag
Charge time at 2A = 75min  
Swappable: UNLIMITED range! 


Product Roadmap
After more than a year and countless prototypes we are excited to get our product into the public. Below you'll find our product roadmap for the coming months. 

 
The Unlimited Engineering team is formed by Carlos Kübler, Juan Pablo Viera and Alejandro Veloz, a group of engineers passionate about riding, racing, and extreme sports.

 

 
 
An Agency 2.0 Certified Campaign to ensure quality and fulfillment.
 
 
 At Agency 2.0, our commitment is to the backers by vetting every crowdfunding campaign to ensure the quality product designs, fulfillment practices and the team behind the campaign.  
When backing an Agency 2.0 Certified Partner Campaign, you can rest assured we did our homework so you do not have to. Our certified campaigns far exceed the industry in quality and in on-time delivery.
 
 
 Laws and regulations pertaining electric longboards or electric skateboards vary by country, state, county, and municipality. You are responsible in making sure that it is legal to ride in your area, so please make sure you investigate your local regulations.  
Skateboarding, and especially on electric powered boards, is an inherently dangerous sport and safety equipment should be used at all times, especially a helmet. Don’t be too cool for safety equipment and risk your life. Even the pros use a helmet and pads. Always watch out for cars while riding on surface roads open to traffic and follow all local rules. Always skate within your abilities and use common sense while riding.  
Your board can become unresponsive and loose power and brakes at any moment due to many factors like: dead remote battery, unintentional release of the throttle, radio interference, dropping the remote control, regenerative overcharging of a full battery, or other. This will turn the board into an unpowered skate without brakes, so learn how to slow down by sliding and only ride your board at speeds that where you would be able to stop without power or brakes.  
Unlimited Engineering accepts no liability should you injure yourself using any products sold under our brand names.  
 
A Special Thanks 
To all of our friends and family who have supported us along the ride: Andres Sosa, Jose Galvez, Alberto Viera, Ilse Lugo, Viviana Abricot, Julio Viera, Jose Enrique del Rey, Luigi Rodriguez, Ani Subbarao, Marcos Valencia, Arturo Prieto, Lucas Mestre, Juan Antonio García, Nicolas Veloz, Cristina Fes, Bumbum, Marta Santamaria, Bea Cuca, Michele Bardi, Alessandro Fedeli, Raul Payri, Alberto Sheinfeld, William Torrealba, Alberto Lopez, Andrés Blank, Inaki Berenguer, Amanda Von Goetz, Alvaro Perez-Segnini, Nelson Fong, Leo Walder, Mauro Figueroa, Krloos Rivera | Las Naves

story:
Short Summary

The CryptX2 is a hardware encrypted storage device. If you have data you want to secure and you want the highest level of security you can get, you want the CryptX2.

  • Open source - verified secure, no backdoors, upgradeable
  • Upgradeable - add new features, or customize to your needs
  • Micro SD cards - easily upgradeable, and inexpensive storage
  • Highly Secure - AES 256bit hardware encrypted

Watch the video for more details and a demonstration of the CryptX2 in action.

Additional Info

The CryptX2 video gives a great overview of the basic features of the CryptX2, so here we will give some of the more specific information you may want after seeing the video.

While the CryptX2 is extremely secure, it is also simple to use. Each firmware version will have its own specific directions included with it, however the default firmware directions are listed below for the most common features. For a complete user manual for the default firmware click here.

CryptX2 Button and LED ID

To reduce the size of the indiegogo page we have limited the directions posted here.

For a complete user manual for the default firmware click here.

**Device ID**
The Device ID feature will help you make sure the device is yours and that it hasn't been switched with another one.
(This feature is not required to unlock the device, you can skip it if you choose)

1. Press and hold the OK and #4 buttons for 2 seconds, the LED will light up blue.
2. Enter your device id password (not your unlock password) then press the OK button.
The CryptX2 will flash the series of LEDs that you previously programed into the device. If the LED sequence matches what you programmed into it, then you know the device is yours and it is safe to use.
(entering the wrong Device ID password will show a random LED sequence)

**Unlock the CryptX2**
1. Press and hold the OK and #2 buttons for 2 seconds, the Mode LED will light up blue.
2. Enter your password (4-128 button presses) then press the OK button. The CryptX2 will show green LEDs if the device is unlocked correctly, or red LEDs if you entered the wrong passkey. (warning, entering the wrong passkey 10 times will cause permanent loss of your data and require you to reformat the CryptX2)

You have 15 seconds to plug the CryptX2 into the computer or it will auto lock. The CryptX2 will show up on your computer as 2 regular USB Mass Storage drives, you can use them the same as any other flash drive or hard drive.

**Locking theCryptX2**
The device will automatically lock when removed from the USB port or if the OK button is pressed.

**Read Only Mode**
You can enable/disable read only mode to prevent writing to the sd cards by pressing the 1 or 2 (for sd card 1 or 2) button after the device is unlocked. When the device is in read only mode the SD1 or SD2 LED will be red. The led will be green when in normal (read/write) mode.

**Panic Mode**
The panic mode is used to destroy your data when you are forced to give your
password by an attacker.
The panic password is a different password than your normal unlock password or Device ID password. The panic password is entered in the same way as a normal unlocking of the CryptX2, except when you enter this panic password the CryptX2 will delete the current salt and generate a new one, so your current data will be lost and the device will appear to be freshly formatted. There is no indication that you have used a panic password VS your normal password. The data you previously had on the CryptX2 will be permanently lost, and the device will continue to work with the panic password as a normal CryptX2 so your attacker will not know for sure if the panic mode was used or if the CryptX2 just hasn't been used with the sd cards loaded in the CryptX2 yet.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have parts for 100 CryptX2 beta units here, many of which have been assembled and tested. And while the design is good and works well, we are making some upgrades and design improvements for the final version. The most important change is going from the AT32UC3A464S microcontroller which offers 64k of program flash to the AT32UC3A3256S which offers 256k. While the 64k is way more than enough for the CryptX2 in its current use, however since we are developing this to be open source and the firmware is upgradeable we want to make sure we offer the greatest flexibility as possible. To make this change we have updated the schematic. We are currently redesigning the pcb to fit the new, slightly larger microcontroller. By the time you are reading this we will have the new pcb's for building the final prototypes before we order in bulk for the final production run for the indiegogo orders.

 The firmware is functional, but not quite worthy of release for general use. We still need to do some optimization, clean up and commenting to make it easier to work with. We are also testing a the KDA (Key Derivation Algorithm) to find the best solution for this device in terms of speed and computational cost. The only real difficulty we are having with the firmware is perfecting the hidden data feature. This feature is an additional feature very similar to Truecrypt's hidden volume feature which unlocks an alternate set of data with a different password. Currently this feature is under development. The panic mode and normal encryption modes are working fine.

Some of our first alternate firmware versions are under development and will be launched at, or near the time of the CryptX2 release. The alternate versions currently in progress are:

Color Blind - This version will use alternate led display methods developed with color blind members of the community.

Custom Salt - This version will let you create the salt that is used. This will allow you to back up and duplicate CryptX2 devices that can decrypt the same data, however there is an added risk of knowing/saving this salt.

Raid0 - This version will use both sd cards combined in a Raid 0 (striped mode) to show as 1 device in your computer. This will provide faster speed.

Raid1 - This version will show only 1 drive in your computer, the additional sd card is used as a redundant backup in case of data failure on the primary sd card.

CDROM - This version will emulate a USB CDROM from any .ISO file named disk.iso in the root of the sd card on slot 1. The cd/dvd is bootable and is read only. Support for multiple .iso selection will be offered in the future.
 
CryptX2 3D Render of Case

 We have a stretch goal of about $50k so we can work on development of a case for the CryptX2. We have been working on the 3d renderings of the case and have tested a few of the designs on the 3d printer at our local hackerspace (HeatSync Labs in Mesa, AZ). Once we perfect the design we plan to do plastic injection molding for the finished cases. The cases will be snap fit to allow you to open and close it to access the jtag, gpio and battery solder pads. The buttons will be flush with the top of the case so accidental key-presses will be minimized. The SD cards will stick slightly out of the side of the case so they can be removed, but will remain securely in the CryptX2 during use. We will also make all the files available for the 3d printing of the cases in case you want to make or modify your own cases and have access to a 3d printer. The costs for getting the molds made for plastic injection molding are very expensive, and the skill of the mold maker is important to be sure you end up with nice looking parts. Once the molds are made, it is only a few cents each to make the cases.
 
The funds we raise will be used to purchase the parts, assemble and test the CryptX2 units to ship to indiegogo supporters as well as support the future of the CryptX2 project and develop additional firmware upgrades.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please support the CryptX2 project in any way you can. Helping spread the word about the CryptX2 on facebook or twitter or anyplace else and telling everyone you know about it will be a great help to the project. We will also be giving a few CryptX2 units FOR FREE away to random people that we see contributing to the project by spreading the word. We would rather give to people that are passionate about our project than advertisers, so show your support!

story:
We love riding our bikes! And if you feel the same, then TReGo is fot you! Our trolley upgrades your bike unlike anything you have seen and adds a unique transportation dimension to your ride!

Fun meets Functionality

TReGo is a trolley, made to carry heavy things anywhere you go. But what makes it unique is that it's the first trolley that turns YOUR bike into a practical cargo bike in seconds.

It's that simple: no tools needed, no permanent modifications to your bike and never get your hands dirty, thanks to our patented FAST-connector.

 

 

TReGo is a true door-to-door solution! It's a practical way to transport heavy loads or bring groceries home on your bike.

 AND use it as a standalone trolley to take it with you where your bike can not go.

Not limited to the front of the bike, TReGo can also be used with our towing cart kit. Connect it to the rear axle and tow it behind you for long travels and bulky, heavier loads.

 

Once TReGo is attached to your bike, your new riding experience begins. The two tilting wheels make turning corners a blast.

 We've made sure you'll enjoy your ride, whether you're in a rush...

 

or have time to play around...

Check out TReGo in the skate-park here.

 

The FAST-Connector

It's never been easier to upgrade your ride. The innovation of TReGo is our FAST-Connector. Our patented connecting system allows you to connect & disconnect the trolley to just about any adult bike. No greasy hands, no tools needed and no permanent modifications to your bike neither.

Once attached to the fork the FAST-Connector has three functions:

1. Enables you to connect & disconnect the TReGo trolley in seconds. Connect to just about any adult bike (26" or bigger)

2. Functions as a bike stand. The bike stands firmly when the trolley is not connected and the fork is protected from any damage

3. Enhances Bike security. When the trolley is disconnected, no one will be able to drive off with your bike. The FAST-Connector is securely locked to the fork of your bike. A special screwdriver is provided so only you can take it off when necessary

 

 

Don't buy another bike, just utilize the bike you already have, upgrade it and start carrying. TReGo has the benefits of traditional Cargo Bikes, but offers the following key advantages. TReGo

  • is smaller, easier to store
  • is multi-functional
  • adds theft security
  • is fun to ride
  • costs less 

TReGo is compact in size and is easy to store.

  • Folds easily into a compact size (telescope handle bars)
  • Small enough to be stored at home
  • Even when fully loaded, your bike dimensions don't change much

 

TReGo has undergone extensive test rides on different terrains. We set the highest safety standards for ourselves and guarantee TReGo will live up to them. Our trolley will be certified in the US and the European Union and abide by all safety standards.

Disc Brakes

We have equipped TReGo with two hydraulic disc brakes, one on each wheel. The brakes are part of the trolley and can be controlled by a separate brake lever.

The hydraulic brakes provide high braking power when connected to the bike for safely controlling a fully loaded trolley

Just move the brake lever from the trolley to the handlebar, using our adapters and you're ready to go. The brake lever also includes a locking button that locks TReGo's wheels whenever you are parked.

 

In choosing manufacturers it was important for us to know that our partner breaths and lives bicycles. We have therefore partnered with professional bicycle manufacturers who master the technology and understand the engineering which will guarantee the highest quality.

The TReGo Trolley

TReGo is equipped with an aluminum rack (made in Canada). The big loading surface is the base to carry your heavy loads.

 

Carry up to 25 kg/ 40 lbs on the rack and enjoy a new transportation dimension on your bike. 

We will offer the rack in different colors.

Up-Cycled TReGo Bag

We have designed a special bag for our trolley. It fits right onto the rack and is big enough to fit 40 L/ 10 Gallons.

The bag is made of up-cycled materials and will be produced in the US by ECOLOGICDESIGNS, Colorado. Using up-cycled materials will ensure that every bag will end up with a unique design, no two bags will look alike.

The bag can also be used without TReGo, thanks to the added shoulder strap.

Bag Features:

  • Size: 20x33x80 cm / 8x13x30 in
  • Volume: 40 liters/ 10 gallons
  • Materials: reclaimed billboards
  • Adjustable size shoulder strap
  • Velcro closure for weather resistance 
  • Reflective light patches for nighttime visibility
  • Made in the USA

Towing Cart Kit

TReGo is truly multi functional and is not limited to being connected to the front of your bike. We developed a special aluminum box that attaches to the trolley. The cart easy hooks up to the rear wheel of the bicycle.

This allows you to transport heavier loads up to 40 kg / 88 lbs on different terrains with greater ease and comfort.

 

Towing Cart Features:

  • Box size: 74x42x10 cm / 29x16.5x4 in
  • Load capacity: 40 kg / 88 lbs
  • Material: Powder coated Aluminum
  • Made in CANADA
  • We will offer the box in different colors

COLOR OPTIONS:

TReGo's Rack and Box come in five different colors:  red, blue, white, gray and black. Before manufacturing we will contact you to ask for your choice.

 

 

 

Bicycle fitting:

TReGo is compatible to just about any adult bike. As long as they have a standard fork (forks with and without suspensions), made of steel or aluminum and have a standard dropouts. TReGo fits bikes with all kinds of brakes.

TReGo will NOT fit:

  • Forks made of Carbon fiber
  • Lefty forks (forks with only one blade)
  • Bicycles with small wheels (less than 26'' or ISO-559 mm)
  • Forks with through axle (if you don't know what it is you don't have it)
  • Fat bikes (forks with hub-spacing of more than 100 mm)

Still not sure? Learn more


Ofir Yadan: The Inventor

Portfolio

Rafael Yahlomi: The Finance Guru

 

Zak Friedrich Wesche: The Marketeer

Portfolio

 

 

 

Tax and Customs:

Please keep in mind that you may be charged to pay extra tax and customs depending on your country. This is beyond our control and can vary from one country to another

Balancing assistance:

During the past few years we had many people with balancing difficulties approaching us and asking if TReGo will help them get back on their bicycles. We had several such test rides and found out that there is no conclusive answer- Some found it easier and helpful while others did not. We think It depends on the severance of the balancing difficulty.

We do not have any scientific results and unfortunately can not guaranty that TReGo will help you balancing while riding.

 

 2017:
story_txt:
We love riding our bikes! And if you feel the same, then TReGo is fot you! Our trolley upgrades your bike unlike anything you have seen and adds a unique transportation dimension to your ride!Fun meets FunctionalityTReGo is a trolley, made to carry heavy things anywhere you go. But what makes it unique is that it's the first trolley that turns YOUR bike into a practical cargo bike in seconds.It's that simple: no tools needed, no permanent modifications to your bike and never get your hands dirty, thanks to our patented FAST-connector.  TReGo is a true door-to-door solution! It's a practical way to transport heavy loads or bring groceries home on your bike. AND use it as a standalone trolley to take it with you where your bike can not go.Not limited to the front of the bike, TReGo can also be used with our towing cart kit. Connect it to the rear axle and tow it behind you for long travels and bulky, heavier loads. Once TReGo is attached to your bike, your new riding experience begins. The two tilting wheels make turning corners a blast. We've made sure you'll enjoy your ride, whether you're in a rush... or have time to play around...Check out TReGo in the skate-park here. The FAST-ConnectorIt's never been easier to upgrade your ride. The innovation of TReGo is our FAST-Connector. Our patented connecting system allows you to connect & disconnect the trolley to just about any adult bike. No greasy hands, no tools needed and no permanent modifications to your bike neither.Once attached to the fork the FAST-Connector has three functions: 1. Enables you to connect & disconnect the TReGo trolley in seconds. Connect to just about any adult bike (26" or bigger)2. Functions as a bike stand. The bike stands firmly when the trolley is not connected and the fork is protected from any damage3. Enhances Bike security. When the trolley is disconnected, no one will be able to drive off with your bike. The FAST-Connector is securely locked to the fork of your bike. A special screwdriver is provided so only you can take it off when necessary  Don't buy another bike, just utilize the bike you already have, upgrade it and start carrying. TReGo has the benefits of traditional Cargo Bikes, but offers the following key advantages. TReGo
is smaller, easier to store
is multi-functional
adds theft security
is fun to ride
costs less 
TReGo is compact in size and is easy to store.
Folds easily into a compact size (telescope handle bars)
Small enough to be stored at home
Even when fully loaded, your bike dimensions don't change much
 TReGo has undergone extensive test rides on different terrains. We set the highest safety standards for ourselves and guarantee TReGo will live up to them. Our trolley will be certified in the US and the European Union and abide by all safety standards.Disc BrakesWe have equipped TReGo with two hydraulic disc brakes, one on each wheel. The brakes are part of the trolley and can be controlled by a separate brake lever.The hydraulic brakes provide high braking power when connected to the bike for safely controlling a fully loaded trolleyJust move the brake lever from the trolley to the handlebar, using our adapters and you're ready to go. The brake lever also includes a locking button that locks TReGo's wheels whenever you are parked. In choosing manufacturers it was important for us to know that our partner breaths and lives bicycles. We have therefore partnered with professional bicycle manufacturers who master the technology and understand the engineering which will guarantee the highest quality.The TReGo TrolleyTReGo is equipped with an aluminum rack (made in Canada). The big loading surface is the base to carry your heavy loads. Carry up to 25 kg/ 40 lbs on the rack and enjoy a new transportation dimension on your bike. We will offer the rack in different colors.Up-Cycled TReGo BagWe have designed a special bag for our trolley. It fits right onto the rack and is big enough to fit 40 L/ 10 Gallons.The bag is made of up-cycled materials and will be produced in the US by ECOLOGICDESIGNS, Colorado. Using up-cycled materials will ensure that every bag will end up with a unique design, no two bags will look alike.The bag can also be used without TReGo, thanks to the added shoulder strap.Bag Features: 
Size: 20x33x80 cm / 8x13x30 in
Volume: 40 liters/ 10 gallons
Materials: reclaimed billboards
Adjustable size shoulder strap
Velcro closure for weather resistance 
Reflective light patches for nighttime visibility
Made in the USA
Towing Cart KitTReGo is truly multi functional and is not limited to being connected to the front of your bike. We developed a special aluminum box that attaches to the trolley. The cart easy hooks up to the rear wheel of the bicycle.This allows you to transport heavier loads up to 40 kg / 88 lbs on different terrains with greater ease and comfort. Towing Cart Features:
Box size: 74x42x10 cm / 29x16.5x4 in
Load capacity: 40 kg / 88 lbs
Material: Powder coated Aluminum
Made in CANADA
We will offer the box in different colors
COLOR OPTIONS:TReGo's Rack and Box come in five different colors:  red, blue, white, gray and black. Before manufacturing we will contact you to ask for your choice.   Bicycle fitting:TReGo is compatible to just about any adult bike. As long as they have a standard fork (forks with and without suspensions), made of steel or aluminum and have a standard dropouts. TReGo fits bikes with all kinds of brakes.TReGo will NOT fit: 
Forks made of Carbon fiber
Lefty forks (forks with only one blade)
Bicycles with small wheels (less than 26'' or ISO-559 mm)
Forks with through axle (if you don't know what it is you don't have it)
Fat bikes (forks with hub-spacing of more than 100 mm)
Still not sure? Learn more  Ofir Yadan: The InventorPortfolioRafael Yahlomi: The Finance Guru Zak Friedrich Wesche: The MarketeerPortfolio    Tax and Customs:Please keep in mind that you may be charged to pay extra tax and customs depending on your country. This is beyond our control and can vary from one country to anotherBalancing assistance:During the past few years we had many people with balancing difficulties approaching us and asking if TReGo will help them get back on their bicycles. We had several such test rides and found out that there is no conclusive answer- Some found it easier and helpful while others did not. We think It depends on the severance of the balancing difficulty.We do not have any scientific results and unfortunately can not guaranty that TReGo will help you balancing while riding.   2017:

story:
People use bicycles for different reasons. For some of us, it’s our passion, our lifestyle. For others, it’s a form of commuting, exercise or sporting equipment. No matter what reason it is, we share the same needs: Freedom and Safety, which align parallel to one another. If we look at it from a different perspective, it’s actually our freedom which needs protecting. 

Bike riding is a lot of fun but accidents happen. We all have a right to share the roads although it’s our duty of care to increase our visibility to others.

 

Cyclists must take extra precautions when they ride. We often share roadways with vehicles, other cyclists and pedestrians, which can cause a host of incidents.

There are a disproportionate number of cycling accidents caused primarily from two contributing factors. Firstly; motorist distractions allow people to lose focus with dangerous and reckless driving. Secondly; Motorists have trouble seeing bicycle riders.

This is where having a high quality bike light is important

Bicycle lights increases your visibility to others using the roads, reducing potential accidents.

 The most common front bike lights are placed on the handlebars or stem, while rear bike lights are placed on seat posts or saddles.These lighting types might be insufficient for cycling safety as they create blind spots and are not vividly seen from each angle.

Interactivity and visibility are the key aspects to creating safe bike lighting. Our design team developed a more effective lighting solution, which maximizes visibility.

Designed to illuminate the extensive surface areas of the wheels. 

Wheely™ gives 360º visibility in horizontal and vertical planes, creating unique spherical and stylish lighting to enhance visualization.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Timeline

APRIL - Kickstarter Launch

JUNE - Successfully funded on Kickstarter

JULY - Moulding processes, production run & certifications

AUGUST - Testing, quality control & Assembly/Packing

SEPTEMBER - Shipping out all Kickstarter rewards

OCTOBER - Shipping out all InDemand rewards

Like us on Facebook.com/wheelybikelight

Follow us on Instagram.com/wheely_bikelight

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have developed our Wheely™ bike light and secured our manufacturing partners and component suppliers. Our production is ready to go. What we need is your help to reach our campaign target to initiate our first production run post final stage sign off that we have already accomplished.

Your support allows us  to create a high quality bike light and begin our production.

 

Risks & Challenges

If any issues arise, we'll communicate them as timely and openly as possible so you never feel left in the dark.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this project via social media and email, to tell your friends and family about our campaign. Click the share button at the top of the page!

Anyone who shares this project will receive a free Wheely™ Reflective Badge!Once you share, just message us to let us know you have shared. Thank you in advance!

story:
When cycling, there’s not much worse than rough pavement, potholes, cracks, and the vibrations from dirt and gravel roads. Numb hands, sore wrists, tight neck and shoulders! 

We’ve experienced the same aches and pains. So we built on the success of our Kinekt Suspension Seatpost, using the same patented parallelogram design, and created the Kinekt Active Suspension Stem. It smooths out every ride. You get more comfort, better control on your bike, and less fatigue. It’s a total game changer. 

BUT WE NEED YOUR HELP TO BRING THIS REMARKABLE PRODUCT TO MARKET. BE A FAN! GET THE ULTIMATE COMFORT UPGRADE BY SUPPORTING OUR CAMPAIGN!

It's a great ride. Add a Kinekt Active Suspension Stem to your bike, and you’ll immediately feel the difference. It’s amazing. Our proven parallelogram spring design helps eliminate high frequency vibrations that cause common cycling complaints. You’ll be a lot more comfortable, with less pain and less fatigue when you ride. 

 

Recent studies have shown that these are the most common upper body complaints by cyclists. It was determined that rough roads decrease cycling power, increase stress levels, and even cause lack of control and diminished vision. In fact, vibrations from 1 hour of cycling was found equal to 4 hours of heavy tractor use.* Ouch!

*The Impact of Vibration on Comfort and Bodily Stress While Cycling by John Parkin, PhD and Sainte Cluque, and Influence of Vibration on Work Performance during Ergometer Cycling by Björn Samuelson, Lennart Jorfeldt, and Björn Ahlborg.

 

We’ve taken our tried-and-true Active Suspension System and engineered it to work seamlessly with your handlebars. The Kinekt Stem will smooth out gravel grades, chip seal roads, cracked pavement, and all rough riding surfaces. Our engineers used our patented parallelogram design to deliver vibration isolation. It will keep you both comfortable and in control. You get precise steering for the confidence you want to tame any terrain.

The Kinekt Stem spring system absorbs uncomfortable bumps and jolts and actually improves the way your bike handles. You get a more comfortable ride and better handling, and you DON'T need proprietary damper cartridges, heavy and expensive fork upgrades, or complicated wheel and tire modifications. It's simple and it works!

 Now you can handle all sorts of challenging roads, trails, and terrain with confidence. The Kinekt Active Suspension Stem effectively isolates your body from all sorts of jarring bumps and vibrations, improving comfort, control, and traction. You get 20mm of active travel, and the patented parallelogram design ensures torsional rigidity for optimal control. 

 

PERFECT FOR:  GRAVEL • E-BIKE • COMMUTER • TANDEM • PERFORMANCE ROAD BIKES

 

Bike parts shouldn't be complicated to use--we want every cyclist to enjoy our stem. So we designed it to be super easy to install and adjust. All it takes is a 2.5mm Allen wrench to swap out springs. Every Kinekt Stem comes with three spring options (soft, medium, and firm), so you can quickly tune your ride based on the terrain, your bike, and your preferred riding style. 

 

SPECIFICATIONS 

The Kinekt Stem is designed around a standard 1 ⅛” bicycle steerer tube with a 31.8mm handlebar clamp diameter. Our 7° rise stem is available in three lengths: 90mm, 105mm, and 120mm. Our 30° rise stem comes in a 100mm length. All 4 stems are made with:

  • Lightweight 6061-T6 aluminum
  • High-quality IGUS bushings
  • Stainless steel hardware

FEATURES

Each Kinekt Stem provides 20mm of active travel in a durable, maintenance-free package.

  • Significantly reduces high-frequency vibration on rough and uneven terrain
  • Comes with 3 springs (Soft, Medium, Firm) so you can adjust your ride
  • Compatible with most handlebars (shims maybe required for some bars)
  • Control and steering are not compromised
  • Much lighter than a suspension fork
  • Adaptable for your current bike

 

We need your support to bring our Active Suspension Stem to market. With the Kinekt Seatpost, we've proven that our patented parallelogram design works and that riders love it. We've also proven we can deliver the highest quality products on time. This campaign will help us with final production tooling and component inventory.

With your support, we can ALL make the Kinekt Active Suspension Stem a reality, And add comfort to the cycling world.

SUPPORTER REWARDS!  

SHIPPING INFORMATION: We offer FREE shipping within the United States for all product combinations. We ship all our products anywhere in the world for a nominal charge. For our international supporters, please note that import duties and taxes are not included in the shipping cost. Those charges will be collected by the carrier at delivery. Backers will be contacted after a successful campaign regarding their preferred product specifications. Thank you SO much for supporting the Comfort Cause! 

Thousands of riders have enjoyed our Kinekt Seatpost. It has proven performance on rough pavement, gravel, dirt roads and trails alike. Like our Seatpost, our new Stem is perfect for gravel, e-bike, commuter, tandem, and performance road cyclists.

 

E-bikes are becoming more and more popular. But e-bikes are often more rigid than other bikes, and can transmit more road shock directly to the rider. The Kinekt Stem helps alleviate this issue.

 

The Kinekt Active Suspension Seatpost has been available for over six years, and cyclists love it! Happy customers have ridden many thousands of miles on our world-renowned Seatpost. We used the same patented design and obsessive engineering to build the Kinekt Stem. When you support our Kickstarter campaign, you can be one of the first riders to enjoy the comfort of our new Stem. You can ALSO pick up one of our Kinekt Suspension Seatposts at a discount. That's the Ultimate Comfort Upgrade!

 

We've been working on our patented parallelogram design for a long time, and we successfully launched both our original and second generation Kinekt Suspension Seatposts, which riders LOVE. Riding is in our DNA, and making cycling more comfortable is our passion. 

We're happy to tell you more. Our co-founder Paul Barkley was serving in the Peace Corps, riding the rough roads of Uganda day after day. He wanted to improve his endurance so he could travel longer distances. That’s when the idea for our company was born. Using his skills as a bike mechanic, frame designer, fabricator, and bike shop owner, Paul invented a revolutionary seatpost isolation system. It reduced the bumps while he rode, which meant he was more comfortable riding and a lot less tired when he got to his destination.

Cirrus Cycles Inc, our small company located in the Pacific Northwest, was formed to bring his invention to every rider—and we did that with a successful 2014 Kickstarter campaign, thanks to passionate folks like you. Over the past six years, we've sold tens of thousands of seatposts and gained fans across the globe. But we realized that the seatpost was only half the battle.

That’s why we’ve spent the past few years perfecting our patented technology for the front of the bike. Today, we’re proud to offer a complete vibration isolation system that ups your comfort without sacrificing control or that bike feel you love. Even better, our products work for any type of bike and for any sort of rider.

But it's not just our happy customers--our partners love Kinekt products as well. These companies trust our Seatpost enough to spec it on their own custom products and recommend it to their customers.

PRESS KIT

If you want to know more about the Kinekt Active Suspension Stem or any of our Kinekt Products, send us an email requesting our Press Kit: Kickstarter@cirruscycles.com.

By the way, we're friendly and happy to answer questions any time. Thanks again for your interest and support in our efforts to bring comfort to the cycling world.

story: I am a single mom and an EMT Basic in South Carolina for almost a decade. My 20yo son, Sky needs a vehicle now that his truck engine locked up 2 weeks ago. Sky is autistic and works at the ASPCA. This fundraiser is to help him be more independent and feel like he is contributing something to his world. The local shelter he attends is a no-kill shelter and he takes precious care of all the cats and dogs. Today we paid half down on an almost fully restored 78 El Camino. Looking to raise the rest of the funds before 8/3/2021. Thanks for your helpful contribution or sharing with friends!

story:
From dreams to action.

YKS1 is ready for the prototyping phase. We are geared up to take the step from paper to engineering. A step that brings green, clean cities into view and a future of energizing and sporty urban transport a bit closer.

A future we would love to head towards with you. One can change the world. Are you the one?

An inviting and stylish design...

A powerful but clean propulsion system. A slim and sporty electric car with a compact shape that requires only half of the road. Grey and drab are things of the past. I see green and clean cities with central hubs where everyone can easily unlock a car using their smartphone. I see world cities, companies and knowledge centres combining their knowledge and power. I see the future of mobility and urban transport.
 


 

Stylish & Charming

One look is enough. Her sleek lines and smooth forms are seductive. The perfect balance between style and sport. The golden ratio between synthetic material and glass. You want to drive this thing. Zooming through the city centre heading to your appointment. Or back to the train station after visiting a business park on the outskirts of the city. You do not have the power or desire to resist the YKS1's charm. You want to be seen with her. And she with you.
 

Clean & Sporty

Fast, sporty and agile. You feel the blistering clean power under your pedal. An electric drive with a modern range and sexy acceleration. Quietly float across Manhattan or head for the Coolsingel. YKS1 is being developed for speeds of at least 80 kilometers per hour, making it extra safe for areas with a 50 kilometer per hour speed limit. Turn corners with the self-assurance of a race car driver. Lean in and glide through with control and stability thanks to the flexible swing suspension. YKS1 makes urban driving into an experience.
 

 

Slim & Spacious

Alone time with YKS1 is something to savour. Give her your attention and she'll give you energy in return. You're at the steering wheel, so you're in control. Another advantage of a single-seater is that you only need half of the road. Capacity problems and traffic jams in cities will become a thing of the past overnight. And despite her slender shape, she offers plenty of space for a suitcase, package or groceries. And rest assured: a comfortable seat.
 


 

Green & Fresh

Fine particles, nitrogen and CO2. We are sick of it. And so are our lungs. Our cities must and can be cleaner. It is no accident that we chose YKS1 as the name for our first vehicle of the future. YKSI = one in Finnish. And look at that: Finland has been the European number one in the field of sustainability for years. Driven by renewable energy sources, Finland has become a leader in CO2 reduction. A shining green example and inspiration for our own YKS1.

With YKS1, we are heading in a new direction. A direction that helps cities fulfil their environmental and reduction promises. This has become more relevant than ever after the NGO ‘Environmental Defense’ sued the Dutch state and the judge ordered the Dutch state to do more to combat air pollution. We want to contribute to this with YKS1. Green HUBs on logistical nodes with clean, electric transport that is accessible to everyone. No oversized, three-quarters empty, polluting cars clogging up the city, but perfectly sized, flexible and clean passenger and freight transport.
 

 

Knowledge & Power

Sharing is the new having. We’re not developing YKS1 for ourselves, but for everyone. Our main goal is to make the YKS1 a reality, which is why we will embrace every idea, initiative or advice that gets us closer to our goal. Help is welcome and knowledge = power. That's why we are happy to work with companies, governments, investors and knowledge centres in the Netherlands and abroad. Together we will pave the way to the right future.
 

 

YKS1

We are a passionate platform and partnership for progressive transport innovation. A club of enthusiastic friends, interested associates and creative acquaintances. Designers with guts, unsuspecting car enthusiasts, accidental technicians, thinkers, doers and dreamers. YKS1 has only one goal: to drive (sail and fly) towards the future in a clean, sporty, solid, stylish and sexy manner.
story_txt:
From dreams to action.
YKS1 is ready for the prototyping phase. We are geared up to take the step from paper to engineering. A step that brings green, clean cities into view and a future of energizing and sporty urban transport a bit closer.
A future we would love to head towards with you. One can change the world. Are you the one?

An inviting and stylish design...
A powerful but clean propulsion system. A slim and sporty electric car with a compact shape that requires only half of the road. Grey and drab are things of the past. I see green and clean cities with central hubs where everyone can easily unlock a car using their smartphone. I see world cities, companies and knowledge centres combining their knowledge and power. I see the future of mobility and urban transport. 
 

Stylish & Charming
One look is enough. Her sleek lines and smooth forms are seductive. The perfect balance between style and sport. The golden ratio between synthetic material and glass. You want to drive this thing. Zooming through the city centre heading to your appointment. Or back to the train station after visiting a business park on the outskirts of the city. You do not have the power or desire to resist the YKS1's charm. You want to be seen with her. And she with you. 

Clean & Sporty
Fast, sporty and agile. You feel the blistering clean power under your pedal. An electric drive with a modern range and sexy acceleration. Quietly float across Manhattan or head for the Coolsingel. YKS1 is being developed for speeds of at least 80 kilometers per hour, making it extra safe for areas with a 50 kilometer per hour speed limit. Turn corners with the self-assurance of a race car driver. Lean in and glide through with control and stability thanks to the flexible swing suspension. YKS1 makes urban driving into an experience. 


 
Slim & Spacious
Alone time with YKS1 is something to savour. Give her your attention and she'll give you energy in return. You're at the steering wheel, so you're in control. Another advantage of a single-seater is that you only need half of the road. Capacity problems and traffic jams in cities will become a thing of the past overnight. And despite her slender shape, she offers plenty of space for a suitcase, package or groceries. And rest assured: a comfortable seat. 
 

Green & Fresh
Fine particles, nitrogen and CO2. We are sick of it. And so are our lungs. Our cities must and can be cleaner. It is no accident that we chose YKS1 as the name for our first vehicle of the future. YKSI = one in Finnish. And look at that: Finland has been the European number one in the field of sustainability for years. Driven by renewable energy sources, Finland has become a leader in CO2 reduction. A shining green example and inspiration for our own YKS1.With YKS1, we are heading in a new direction. A direction that helps cities fulfil their environmental and reduction promises. This has become more relevant than ever after the NGO ‘Environmental Defense’ sued the Dutch state and the judge ordered the Dutch state to do more to combat air pollution. We want to contribute to this with YKS1. Green HUBs on logistical nodes with clean, electric transport that is accessible to everyone. No oversized, three-quarters empty, polluting cars clogging up the city, but perfectly sized, flexible and clean passenger and freight transport. 

 
Knowledge & Power
Sharing is the new having. We’re not developing YKS1 for ourselves, but for everyone. Our main goal is to make the YKS1 a reality, which is why we will embrace every idea, initiative or advice that gets us closer to our goal. Help is welcome and knowledge = power. That's why we are happy to work with companies, governments, investors and knowledge centres in the Netherlands and abroad. Together we will pave the way to the right future. 

 
YKS1
We are a passionate platform and partnership for progressive transport innovation. A club of enthusiastic friends, interested associates and creative acquaintances. Designers with guts, unsuspecting car enthusiasts, accidental technicians, thinkers, doers and dreamers. YKS1 has only one goal: to drive (sail and fly) towards the future in a clean, sporty, solid, stylish and sexy manner.

story:
Destined for Greatness

Style to make ‘Em WAU! Whether you are new to eBikes or an experienced daily rider WAU provides everything you want, need and love in an eBike: Superior Performance, Style, and Affordability. Ready, set, GO!
 

Like an eBike. Unlike any eBike

100% Guaranteed - Every WAU Bike and perk backed by you is 100% Satisfaction GUARANTEED.

In addition 14 days no questions asked return and money back. 

 

<a href="http://www.waubike.com">WAU BIKE
 

WAU Family 

(NO Anti-Dumping Tax to Pay).

Choose the perfect one for you. 
ALL listed below comes as standard for your WAU Bike model (per color column).

   *Please note, all WAU bikes are complied with UK/EU regulation of maximum 15.5mph, overriding the factory speed limit will immediately void your warranty. 

 

Meet The Creators Crystal and Linas

"Biking is our passion, it's an exciting way of life! It gives you flexibility, speed, exercise, and ultimate freedom. 

It is our absolute dream to make people fall in love with biking and love every ride. Creating the perfect, affordable eBike that would make you want to ride it anywhere you go.

 

Meet Tony - The 'Eagle' in the Sky

After living in California, Tony gained extensive management experience in international manufacturing powerhouses in the lightweight automobile industries, clients including Tesla, Porsche, Mercedes, BMW, Audi, and Ford.

Tony has developed expertise, knowledge, and experience in strategic management and overseeing all manufacturing process control and international logistic. In a way, Tony is the eagle in the sky overseeing all operations and making sure that every backer is completely over the moon with their new WAU.

Tony loves the vision of WAU and believes that everyone should have absolute freedom and the wheels to take them there. (MORE about WAU Team Experts at the bottom of the page).

 

 

With Great Power Comes Great Capacity

 

WAU is designed with what at first glance seems to be a minimalist approach in design. But look a little closer and you will find a sparkle of magic. 

WAU patented high-grade case allows the high-capacity lithium-ion battery cell, computer chips, controller, wiring, glowing logos, and all security units to all to sit perfectly flush in the center of the bike frame in an ultra slim case without any bulky add-ons.

Ideal weight distribution allows WAU not only to remain fairly lightweight but also improves on the aerodynamic performance, power distribution and overall provide great riding control on the bike while on the road.

 

Maybe Size Does Matter

WAU welcomes every rider. The frame is lowered to give a sporty angle and allow riders to get on and off easily. Seat drops down to 83cm and all the way up to 110cm. Adjustable handlebar height easily adjusts 90-degree angle. You can customize your ride how you prefer. For long, low, aerodynamic rides or upright, relaxed cruising, you will always feel good. To put it simply, perfect comfort for riders anywhere between 5.1 feet (155cm) and 6.7 feet (204cm) in height. 

All part built with high precision, high strength aluminum.

 

The Vision Is Brighter Than Ever

WAU bike comes equipped with a large daytime and night-time LCD Display that shows battery life in %, distance covered, speed, has built-in USB charger, 5-speed settings, anytime access to advanced personal setting and much more. 

 

Be Bright, Be Bold

Our unique Super-lights have a few tricks up their sleeves. Automatic color change technology changes color immediately upon your request. Turning lights, braking lights, running lights and hazards if needed, all for you in a sexy, fully water & shatter-proof package. 

Bettering your journey just that little bit more.

 

Make it your own - Color Coats

WAU Bikes are available in a variety of uniquely bold, cool colors such as: 

  • Cherry Red
  • Midnight Black (Matte)
  • Supreme White
  • Deep Ocean Blue
  • Army Green (Matte)

These WAU color coats serve as extensions of what the WAU expresses and embodies: Attitude, Freedom, and Destiny for Greatness. 

 

FOUNDERS LIMITED EDITION – SUPER 80s Upgrade

Fuse your ride with the past and the future for an additional $49. Color coat includes the entire WAU frame and rigid (or suspension) fork. 

(Oh and choosing this color upgrade will secure this color and automatically cancel the previous color selected)
 

 

WAU Full Security System

  1. 24/7 GPS Tracking – Always know where you WAU from your smartphone or computer.
  2. Geo-Fence Protection – Set your virtual security fence when you are not around and you will automatically receive a call/text from your WAU if it leaves the range set. 
    It is like your personal, digital security guard for your WAU bike always ensuring safety and peace of mind.
  3. Active Tamper Alarm – activates the alarm to make sure that no one but you has access to your cool cruiser.
  4. Wake-Up Mode - included personal remote key entry to have your WAU emit a sound to let you know it is on and ready to go. Also, use the remote key entry function to toggle on lights and adjust your settings all from one button.

 

Simply Powerful

All of the powerful features that WAU offers.

 

 

WAU Security

  • GPS, GEO Fence, Anti-tamper Alarm
  • 1 click to lock and quickly secure your bike
  • Easy 24/7 location tracking on your phone
  • GEO Fence capability as your WAU's personal guard
  • WAU Security comes with WAU City and WAU S

 

 

 

 

Super-Lights

  • Custom high efficiency, high output LED lights with automatic color change technology
  • Displaying in red light running lights and braking lights & crisp amber light indicator lights and hazards (if needed)

  • Increasing your visibility and ease of use like no one else

 

 

Shimano Expert Shifting

  • Easy, smooth shifter at the tip of your fingers
  • 8 Speed Shimano Expert Shifting with Shimano Cassette and derailleur

  • Extremely seamless transitions between shifting gears

 

 

 

'Bumpy Package' Front or Seat Suspension - upgrade option

  • Front and seat suspension for ultra-smooth riding
  • Built to handle on road and off road adventures with ease
  • Front and seat suspension: All hydraulic for smooth riding 
  • Extra comfort for the lower back
  • Upgrade is 99 USD extra (199 USD value)

 

 

Large Computer Display

  • Water-and dust-proof  
  • Easy-to-read display with backlit LCD screen
  • 5 speeds from 0 (no assist) to 5 (full assist)
  • On-the-go power-assist level adjustment
  • Displays battery life in %, distance covered, speed, all needed data
  • Configurable for personalized settings
  • Built-in USB charger

 

 

 

Smart Large Color Display

  • Includes all functions of the above original display 
  • Full-color LCD display for easier viewing
  • Any time access to advanced settings
  • Up to 9-speed settings
  • Upgrade is 99 USD extra (149 USD value)

 

     

    Disc Brakes

     

    • Tektro high precision mechanical disc brakes
    • Strong braking power requiring a single finger to engage

     

     

     

     

     

    Hydraulic Disc Brakes - upgrade option

     

    • Even smoother, more reliable braking
    • Less pulling force on lever required – a single fingertip will do!
    • Upgrade is 129 USD extra (199 USD value)

     

     

     

     

    Puncture-resistant, Panaracer Tires

    • Enhanced safety on the road and minimized risk of puncture 
    • 700 x 38c tires (38” wheels) with double wall aluminum rim for ultimate strength and comfort
    • Improved control and handling when gliding on smooth roads or venturing off road
    • At end of the campaign: Easily choose between Panaracer Pasela – city tires or Panasonic Comet HardPack – All-terrain tires.

     

     

    Quick Release Package

     

    • Quick and easy to operate
    • Seat, front wheel adjusted with a simple flip lever
    • Ease when traveling or storing WAU

     

     

     

     

     

    Ultra Clean Cockpit

    • Large computer display place precisely in the center of handlebar
    • Brake levers at a fingertip’s reach
    • Clean design for a fresh, crisp look
    • Quick gear shifter for smooth, seamless gear changes on the go
    • Perfectly designed with long-distance comfort in mind

     

     

     

    Plug and Play Wiring System

    • Allows for easy and simple servicing of your bike anywhere around the globe
    • Makes maintaining/replacing/repairing all electrical parts a breeze
    • Coming soon in our WAU webshop easy connectable other accessories

     

     

     

     

    Adjustable Handle Height - upgrade option

    • For long, low, aerodynamic rides or upright, effortless cruising, you will always feel good. 
    • With a simple twist of a key (will be provided together) set the handlebar at your perfect height and hit the road. 
    • Built with high precision, high strength aluminum.
    • Upgrade available at $49 ($99 in value)

     

     

     

    Color Coats

    • Available in 5 bold color coats: Cherry POP Red, Supreme White, Midnight Black (Matte), Ocean Blue, Army Green and 
    • FOUNDERS LIMITED EDITION special – SUPER 80s

     

     

     

     

     

    All Aluminum Frame

    • 100% forged 6061 aluminum alloy frame  
    • WAU City & WAU S Total bike weight ≈ 46 pounds (21 kg). WAU standard come in a little lighter (as the battery capacity is a little less) ≈ 41 pounds (19kg)

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    FREE ON US!

    • Extremely High-Intensity COB LED Front WAU Light-bar
    • Personal Remote Key Entry with WAKE-UP mode
    • Integrated bottle opener (under the seat)
    • Satin Black Easy-Kickstand
    • Frame Integrated Control Cables

     

     

     

    What is the difference between the two tire options?

     

    Panaracer Pasela - City Tires

      • Expert at city cruising at near silent efficiency
      • Extremely strong road grip
      • Multi-compound tires to provide the perfect longevity of every tire

       

       

       

      Panaracer Comet Hard Pack - All terrain tires

      • Perfect for any off-road and rough terrain adventure
      • Best choice when climbing or descending on loose off-road terrain
      • Provides the best grip on muddy, dusty or even waterlogged roads

       

       
       

       

      What Others Are Saying About WAU

       


      Find The Perfect WAU Bike For You

       

       

       

       

       

      How to Pre-Order Your WAU Bike & Accessories:

      1) Choose the WAU Bike fit for your riding style by selecting the WAU model you'd like and then clicking "Get This Perk"

      2) On the next screen, choose the color of your bike from the 5 different color options. (Cherry Red, Midnight Black Matte, Supreme White, Deep Ocean Blue or Army Green Matte) and choose the tire you'd like your bike to be equipped with (City or All-Terrain Tires).

      3) Click "Continue to Payment" where you will input your payment information and submit payment. Exact worldwide shipping cost ($199) will be collected at a later date in advance of delivery.

      4) Welcome to the WAU family, you'll be enjoying your bike in no time.

       

      Want to add accessories? Read on...

      View the accessories below for additional add-ons that can be added to the WAU model you chose. After buying your WAU, return to the campaign page and click the "Get This Perk" option on the accessory you want. We will fulfill EVERYTHING you order after the campaign

      http://www.waubike.com

       

      WAU Accessories 

       

              

        

         

       

      NO ADD Tax to Pay. $$$

      When you back WAU campaign, you will NOT Pay ADD taxes on top of your order. We have made sure that our manufacturing processes are all based outside of all ADD affected regions, and due to this you will receive your quality WAU eBike and will not have to pay additional ADD, unlike many other eBikes.
      Another reason why we can keep the cost so affordable to so many of you! :)

       

      WAU Team Experts at Work

      A smart man once said –"Creativity is simply connecting things together."


      Linas T. Pozerskis 
      Linas       is a professional entrepreneur. With years of experience in international trade and worldwide logistics. Linas has run a successful consumer goods company and delivered up to 6000+ products per each month all around the world without breaking a sweat. 

      Whilst company grew to high momentum Linas met Tony who worked closely with automotive giants of the world. Linas was quickly exposed to the electric automotive industry and the new possibilities of high-performance electric motors and their new applications. This quickly led to beginning WAU. Making WAU that leaps forward in the biking industry and delivers powerful capabilities without the heavy price tag. 

      After developing the original WAU prototype, Linas used all connections developed throughout running his retail company to begin working with professional manufactures and logistic experts to make and deliver WAU bikes with an extremely affordable label. Making the goal of affordable, fully spec'd bike finally real. 

       

      Tony Lok 
      Tony has years of extensive experience in the management of international manufacturing lightweight automobile industry GIANTS. Working with clients such as Mercedes, BMW, Tesla, Porsche, Audi, Fords and GM, Tony developed world-class skills, experience and knowledge in industrial manufacturing process control, global business strategic management, international logistics to distribute all automotive parts and financial management. 

      Tony has his tight, professional grip on all WAU manufacturing, logistics and future development. 

       

      Crystal Drury
      Crystal       is the all mighty force behind WAU management and development. Absolute expert in problem-solving, there is nothing that gets by Crystal. With experience in managing large sectors of public hospitals and participating in social development projects in Kenya, Crystal has the experience to support people, solve any problem in hand, keep everyone satisfied and putting a BIG smile on their faces.   

      She dedicated everything to WAU and hopes that WAU grows to achieve its mission and provides thousands of people around the world with great bikes, making the world just that little bit better and cleaner place.


      WAU Team 
      To further support the high standard of operations here at WAU, we put the best team together to further improve every aspect of our company. We are training our awesome support team to prepare and smoothly handle the huge upcoming demands, as well as preparing them for any future challenges. Everyone is pulling their weight and making things happen daily here at WAU.

      Visit us at: http://www.waubike.com

      100% Delivery and Satisfaction Guaranteed!


       

       

      Let's Reach Our Goal TOGETHER!

      Clear goal - to make affordable bikes the transport of choice for people across the entire world. 

      We’ve now finished our WAU prototypes and are currently optimizing components and logistics. We have set our goal of $50,000 for our campaign and with your support, we can get it funded and start production, launch and share WAU bikes with all of you, our early adopters – Our family. 

      Current offers are strictly limited as a reward for those who believe in our goal and support the bright vision ahead.  Simply the more we sell, the more affordable we can make WAU in the future, which is achieving our ultimate global goal.
       


      Share the LOVE and make WAU happen!

       

      Go Further. Charge Less

      Powerful 36V battery

      • Extremely powerful climbing and ground speed acceleration capabilities

      • High-grade Lithium-ion battery cell

      • Built-in fuse to protect WAU no matter how tough your adventure

       

      Battery configurations and numbers

      • 36V 10.5 Ah model (378Wh) offers assisted travel of up to 32-40 miles*

      • 36V 10.5 Ah model (378Wh) offers up to 30 miles at full, pure electrical assistance*

                  Standard Charge Time: 5.2 hours with a normal charger

                   Super-Charger Charge Time: Only 2.6 hours with a supercharger

       

      • 36V 15.5 Ah model (558Wh) offers assisted travel of up to 48-60 miles*

      • 36V 15.5 Ah model (558Wh) offers up to 30 miles at full, pure electrical assistance*

                  Standard Charge Time: 7.6 hours with a normal charger

                  Super-Charger Charge Time: Only 3.8 hours with a supercharger

       

      • 36V 24.5 Ah model (882Wh) offers assisted travel of up to 80-100 miles*

      • 36V 24.5 Ah model (882Wh) offers up to 50 miles at full, pure electrical assistance*

                  Super-Charger Charge Time: Only 6 hours and comes with Supercharger

       

      *ALL WAU S - 500w has been upgraded from from 36V to 48V. If you have purchased 100 miles add-on it will also be upgraded to 48V FREE of charge.

       

      *Range estimates are contingent upon riding style, terrain, wind speed, rider and towing weight.

       

       

      Experience Set and Ready


      Timeline
