Quick gear shifter for smooth, seamless gear changes on the go
Perfectly designed with long-distance comfort in mind

 
 
 





Plug and Play Wiring System

Allows for easy and simple servicing of your bike anywhere around the globe
Makes maintaining/replacing/repairing all electrical parts a breeze
Coming soon in our WAU webshop easy connectable other accessories

 


 
 


 



Adjustable Handle Height - upgrade option

For long, low, aerodynamic rides or upright, effortless cruising, you will always feel good. 
With a simple twist of a key (will be provided together) set the handlebar at your perfect height and hit the road. 
Built with high precision, high strength aluminum.
Upgrade available at $49 ($99 in value)



 
 
 



Color Coats

Available in 5 bold color coats: Cherry POP Red, Supreme White, Midnight Black (Matte), Ocean Blue, Army Green and 

FOUNDERS LIMITED EDITION special – SUPER 80s

 
 
 


 


 



All Aluminum Frame

100% forged 6061 aluminum alloy frame  
WAU City & WAU S Total bike weight ≈ 46 pounds (21 kg). WAU standard come in a little lighter (as the battery capacity is a little less) ≈ 41 pounds (19kg)

 


 
 
 



 
 
 


FREE ON US!

Extremely High-Intensity COB LED Front WAU Light-bar
Personal Remote Key Entry with WAKE-UP mode
Integrated bottle opener (under the seat)
Satin Black Easy-Kickstand
Frame Integrated Control Cables

 
 
 


What is the difference between the two tire options?
 
Panaracer Pasela - City Tires



Expert at city cruising at near silent efficiency
Extremely strong road grip
Multi-compound tires to provide the perfect longevity of every tire

 


 
 
Panaracer Comet Hard Pack - All terrain tires


Perfect for any off-road and rough terrain adventure
Best choice when climbing or descending on loose off-road terrain
Provides the best grip on muddy, dusty or even waterlogged roads

 


 
 
 
What Others Are Saying About WAU

 

Find The Perfect WAU Bike For You
 

 

 

 
 
How to Pre-Order Your WAU Bike & Accessories:
1) Choose the WAU Bike fit for your riding style by selecting the WAU model you'd like and then clicking "Get This Perk"
2) On the next screen, choose the color of your bike from the 5 different color options. (Cherry Red, Midnight Black Matte, Supreme White, Deep Ocean Blue or Army Green Matte) and choose the tire you'd like your bike to be equipped with (City or All-Terrain Tires).
3) Click "Continue to Payment" where you will input your payment information and submit payment. Exact worldwide shipping cost ($199) will be collected at a later date in advance of delivery.
4) Welcome to the WAU family, you'll be enjoying your bike in no time. 
 
Want to add accessories? Read on...
View the accessories below for additional add-ons that can be added to the WAU model you chose. After buying your WAU, return to the campaign page and click the "Get This Perk" option on the accessory you want. We will fulfill EVERYTHING you order after the campaign
http://www.waubike.com
 

WAU Accessories 

  

          
   
   
 

NO ADD Tax to Pay. $$$
When you back WAU campaign, you will NOT Pay ADD taxes on top of your order. We have made sure that our manufacturing processes are all based outside of all ADD affected regions, and due to this you will receive your quality WAU eBike and will not have to pay additional ADD, unlike many other eBikes.Another reason why we can keep the cost so affordable to so many of you! :)
 
WAU Team Experts at Work

A smart man once said –"Creativity is simply connecting things together."
Linas T. Pozerskis Linas is a professional entrepreneur. With years of experience in international trade and worldwide logistics. Linas has run a successful consumer goods company and delivered up to 6000+ products per each month all around the world without breaking a sweat. 
Whilst company grew to high momentum Linas met Tony who worked closely with automotive giants of the world. Linas was quickly exposed to the electric automotive industry and the new possibilities of high-performance electric motors and their new applications. This quickly led to beginning WAU. Making WAU that leaps forward in the biking industry and delivers powerful capabilities without the heavy price tag. 
After developing the original WAU prototype, Linas used all connections developed throughout running his retail company to begin working with professional manufactures and logistic experts to make and deliver WAU bikes with an extremely affordable label. Making the goal of affordable, fully spec'd bike finally real. 
 
Tony Lok Tony has years of extensive experience in the management of international manufacturing lightweight automobile industry GIANTS. Working with clients such as Mercedes, BMW, Tesla, Porsche, Audi, Fords and GM, Tony developed world-class skills, experience and knowledge in industrial manufacturing process control, global business strategic management, international logistics to distribute all automotive parts and financial management. 
Tony has his tight, professional grip on all WAU manufacturing, logistics and future development. 
 
Crystal DruryCrystal is the all mighty force behind WAU management and development. Absolute expert in problem-solving, there is nothing that gets by Crystal. With experience in managing large sectors of public hospitals and participating in social development projects in Kenya, Crystal has the experience to support people, solve any problem in hand, keep everyone satisfied and putting a BIG smile on their faces.   
She dedicated everything to WAU and hopes that WAU grows to achieve its mission and provides thousands of people around the world with great bikes, making the world just that little bit better and cleaner place.
WAU Team To further support the high standard of operations here at WAU, we put the best team together to further improve every aspect of our company. We are training our awesome support team to prepare and smoothly handle the huge upcoming demands, as well as preparing them for any future challenges. Everyone is pulling their weight and making things happen daily here at WAU.
Visit us at: http://www.waubike.com
100% Delivery and Satisfaction Guaranteed!

 
 
Let's Reach Our Goal TOGETHER!

Clear goal - to make affordable bikes the transport of choice for people across the entire world. 
We’ve now finished our WAU prototypes and are currently optimizing components and logistics. We have set our goal of $50,000 for our campaign and with your support, we can get it funded and start production, launch and share WAU bikes with all of you, our early adopters – Our family. 
Current offers are strictly limited as a reward for those who believe in our goal and support the bright vision ahead.  Simply the more we sell, the more affordable we can make WAU in the future, which is achieving our ultimate global goal. 
Share the LOVE and make WAU happen!
 
Go Further. Charge Less

Powerful 36V battery
• Extremely powerful climbing and ground speed acceleration capabilities
• High-grade Lithium-ion battery cell
• Built-in fuse to protect WAU no matter how tough your adventure
 
Battery configurations and numbers
• 36V 10.5 Ah model (378Wh) offers assisted travel of up to 32-40 miles*
• 36V 10.5 Ah model (378Wh) offers up to 30 miles at full, pure electrical assistance*
            Standard Charge Time: 5.2 hours with a normal charger
             Super-Charger Charge Time: Only 2.6 hours with a supercharger
 
• 36V 15.5 Ah model (558Wh) offers assisted travel of up to 48-60 miles*
• 36V 15.5 Ah model (558Wh) offers up to 30 miles at full, pure electrical assistance*
            Standard Charge Time: 7.6 hours with a normal charger
            Super-Charger Charge Time: Only 3.8 hours with a supercharger
 
• 36V 24.5 Ah model (882Wh) offers assisted travel of up to 80-100 miles*
• 36V 24.5 Ah model (882Wh) offers up to 50 miles at full, pure electrical assistance*
            Super-Charger Charge Time: Only 6 hours and comes with Supercharger
 
*ALL WAU S - 500w has been upgraded from from 36V to 48V. If you have purchased 100 miles add-on it will also be upgraded to 48V FREE of charge.
 
*Range estimates are contingent upon riding style, terrain, wind speed, rider and towing weight.
 
 
Experience Set and Ready


Timeline

story:
What is Seatylock?

Seatylock is a hybrid product combining a bicycle seat and a lock in one. Basically, it's a sturdy, folding bike lock featuring a unique structure that forms a seat. It connects to the bicycle's seat post with a special universal adaptor. When mounted on top of the seat post it functions just as a normal bike seat. Following a few easy steps, the Seatylock unfolds and turns into a one meter long lock


Featured On:
 

Seatylock is a patent protected revolutionary product aimed at changing the lives of urban cyclists by providing them with a new level of convenience for secure bicycle locking.

It enables the rider to lock the bike to a fixed object. With Seatylock there's no need for carrying a lock or worry about saddle theft. Fixed tightly to the seat post, Seatylock gives a hassle free ride and actually gives the sensation of riding without a lock. 

Seatylock has a universal adaptor that enables easy compatibility with any standard bicycle. After a simple installation it can be adjusted to your preferred saddle position. 

The Seatylock has an automotive standard cylinder enables more than one million different key variations for increased security and better anti-picking resistance

Seatylock has two basic models: Seatylock Trekking & Seatylock Comfort both saddles carefully chosen to fit different riding style and designed for the common & cool urban cyclists. Each model comes in a variety of designs, styles and colors. 


Seatylock Trekking – The natural choice for riding with great comfort while feeling light and agile.



Seatylock Comfort - The best choice for highly comfortable riding. 


Choose your Seatylock from the collection below:

       

Easy installation 

Seatylock installation is as easy as replacing your bike saddle. Each Seatylock comes with a Universal adaptor that enables easy compatibility to any standard bike on the market. The Seatylock adaptor enables the rider to fit the Seatylock to his preferred riding position (Backward or forward & upward or downward). 


Easy operation

From a bike seat to a solid lock, then back, in 10 seconds or less due to its improved new locking mechanism. 


Seatylock Saddle replacement

The Seatylock enables the user to change / replace its saddle in case of wear and tear or simply for changing the style.


How it all began.......

Being metropolitan ourselves, we have been using bicycles as our main means of transportation since we were in our teens, which might explain our enthusiasm about all aspects of urban cycling. 

Like any urban cyclists we were always disturbed by the fact that theft has been on the rise for many years. We have seen cyclists dragging around their heavy locks while riding, and in many cases taking their seat post and saddle with them after locking their bike. We were disturbed by bicycle security and all the inconvenience that comes along with it. 

Seatylock evolved from an abstract idea into a clear vision of what we wanted to create. We decided to go for it and realize our idea. Since we all come from totally different disciplines, each of us brings a different perspective in order to create a unified creative vision. 

From the first spark to a Product

In order to bring the Seatylock to our supporters we have established a detailed production plan.

High standards are essential, in order  for Seatylock to become a cutting edge product. 

These standards require an efficient and comprehensive plan that will guarantee quality and elegance. We believe that our detailed production plan will help us make the Seatylock the amazing product we dreamt of. 

We have sourced out some great suppliers (Steel, Aluminum, Plastic, CNC…) ,each is excellent in his field of expertise, so they will help us guarantee that each part will be manufactured with  great care and precision so it all combines to the great product we envisioned.

Like in nature we fully believe that great parts create an extraordinary whole!

story:
THE REVOLUTIONARY ELECTRIC RIDEABLE

Introducing JYROBALL, the electric rideable that’s re-inventing the hoverboard experience. A simple and stylish approach to self-balancing electric rideables, that’s portable, manoeuvrable, easy to learn and super fun to ride!

 

We have distilled self-balancing micro mobility into its most functional form. Achieved dynamic-stability, manoeuvrability and a compact ball form factor that offers a unique and exciting  e-ride experience.

The ball form factor delivers amazing manoeuvrability and rider agility.  The central ride position ensures an optimal centre of gravity at every turn.

Precision ride and response, delivered through custom software & patented technology. Ensuring smooth, quick turns and a comfortable ride.

The 500W brushless electric motor provides high performance power and a responsive ride experience. Get around in a fun and exciting new way.

Lean in to control your speed and direction, custom self-balancing technology will transport you at speeds of up to 12 mph (20 km/h) over a 15 mile (24km) range.

JYROBALL is super easy to learn and ride. The forward-facing driving position makes riding intuitive, with most able to master the basics within minutes.

Step on and go, speed & direction are controlled through shifts in riders’ body weight, the gyroscopic technology delivers an effortless ride experience.

Charge to full in under 3 hours

Retractable footplates and a built-in carry handle so you can pick up and go.

Perfect for leisure rides, short distance and inner-city travel

Replaceable tire is made from durable rubber composite, suitable for indoor and urban travel alike, providing rider stability, comfort and control.

Style meets substance. Our custom design and hi-tech features gives you market-leading agility and mobility. Electric rideables have never been simpler.

 

“JYROBALL ELECTRIC UNICYCLE IS THE
NEXT BIG THING!”

- EVNerds

Click on logo to read full article

UPDATE : MAY 2019

Note : Prices mentioned above are approximately calculated, subject to actual current currency conversion rate.

AN EXPERIENCED TEAM OF DESIGNERS
& INDUSTRY INNOVATORS

Our team of product engineers, designers and innovators are at the forefront of change, boasting globally successful ride on products & brands. It’s a story which spans more than a decade of innovation.

 We’re micro-transportation pioneers. And Jyroball is proof.

We’ve worked hard over the last year to iterate and perfect our prototypes. We’ve completed our production prototypes, done extensive test testing. But to go to full production we need your support.

Be the first to experience the future, to own and ride JYROBALL. You will be first to receive your JYROBALL when we commence shipping in late summer.

Don’t miss out on our exclusive limited time launch pricing. Pre-order yours now at >50% off expected fall retail price $899. 

WHERE WE SHIP

We currently ship to:  United States, Canada, Puerto Rico, European Union (all countries), United Kingdom,  Switzerland,  South Korea,  Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong & Japan.. Standard shipping fee of $99, some countries may vary and will be calculated on checkout.

 

WHEN WE START SHIPPING

Shipping of Perks is expected to begin in October 2019. We will provide updates on manufacturing completion through Aug / Sep, in advance of fulfilment to Backers. Actual ship dates may vary.

 

WHY ORDER NOW

By backing now,  you'll be among the first to experience the most exciting electric rideable of 2019 first, and over 50% discount on expected in store retail price. 

 

We are proud to stand behind our product. We are confident in our design, engineering and manufacturing standards. You can share in that confidence as we are offering a 12-month warranty on non-wearable parts to all our Indiegogo backers. Should you encounter a production related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we’ll replace or repair it under warranty.

story:
We have all heard the phrase "loud pipes save lives." Its a myth, and simple physics proves that.

Break the paradigm. Try something different. Something silent.

My name is Mike, and I am looking to create a business that would make electric motorcycles a common sight in southern California. But I want to do it in a special way... I want to build them from used motorcycle frames.

I have lived in San Diego for over a decade now, and the weather is nearly always ideal for motorcycle riding. Yet one thing has always puzzled me:

Where are all the electric motorcycles???

I mean, there are motorcycles everywhere, and there is also a large abundance of electric cars, yet I rarely see any electric motorcycles. Why not? The climate doesnt get any better than here. I would think that this place is the ideal place to ride an electric motorcycle. The funny thing is, nearly EVERY time I ride my bike, someone always stops me to check it out. The first words I hear from them are "I never knew anything like this existed!"

For years I have wanted to change this. I even started a website called ElMoto.net, so that people could come from around the globe and share news and information.

Now is finally the time to go a step further

To date, I have hand built 2 electric motorcycles. Funny thing is, out of the handful of electric motorcycle companies out there currently producing street legal models, there is no one building cruiser style motorcycles. You know... the Harley style. Something beautiful and bad ass. Something you can sit back on and enjoy the ride in style. I plan to change that.

The doner bike, purchased from a junk yard for $400.

The design phase for the desired outcome, created in Photoshop.

The 48v final outcome.

Taking it for a test ride.

Making some modifications... new batteries, removing the back end, rewiring, etc...

The goal here is to find old motorcycles that have seen their day, and bring them new life for new riders, but with an all electric rechargeable drive. How much greener can you get?

What's Needed

There are a number of items needed to make this business, as well as the conversions, successful.

- Set up an LLC.

- A place to work out of, to set up shop, even if its a small garage somewhere for the time being. I have been working out of my apartment for too long.

- Tools and various consumables.

- Lithium ion batteries.

- Electrical systems - electric motor, controller, wiring, gauges, etc.

- Rolling chassis - a motorcycle with a bad engine (or none at all). After the frame has been modified for electric use, it will need to be powder coated and painted.

The first motorcycle to be built will be a cruiser, like the picture at the top. It will be 72v, incorporate Lithium Ion batteries, and have a 60mph top speed and around a 40 mile range... great for commuting. The electronics will be housed inside a fiberglass tank with a digital display. Recharging can be done from any standard wall outlet.

What You Get

3x5 Sticker

Hat

Shirt

Hoodie

The Impact

By supporting and contributing to this startup, look at what your donation would achieve:

  • These motorcycles are 100% electric... mean, green, clean energy!!!
  • By using old motorcycle frames, thats just less scrap for the landfill.
  • Helping San Diego's economy, and eventually provide jobs.

Risks & Challenges

Its a small, startup business, and anything can go wrong, but I have been running ElMoto.net since 2007 and it is currently one of the largest go-to websites for the latest news and information regarding electric motorcycles. I have a passion for electric motorcycles, and if this campaign fails, I will simply keep trying.

I have been riding for decades. Bumps in the road or a little road rash wont stop me from trying again.

story:
Hi friends and fans.  It's Violet Hayes, your favorite online camgirl.

I'm raising money to replace my beaten up Jeep with a used 2004-2005 Volvo XC90. 


     So, here is a little story about a Jeep near dead.  I purchased my used 1996 "Jeep of Death" Grand Cherokee back in 2007.  I've definately gotten my money's worth out of it.  However, in the last 6 years, it has been hit by a snow plow in my apartment parking lot, rear ended at 45 MPH (the guy just drove off), and smashed on the driver side door by someone in a grocery store parking lot that kindly drove off also. 

     Within the 1 1/2 years, I've replaced the ignition, the starter, the starter relay, the exhaust pipe, sway bar, tires, alignment and the battery.  The frame of the Jeep is bent from being rear ended at 45 MPH.  The rear passenger door will not open but there is a 1 1/2 inch gap at the top because of the bent frame.  This section is now taped in an attempt to keep rain, snow and wind out of the vehicle as much as possible.  The rear hatch will not open either.  All the rear light casings are smashed and covered with colored tape.  The 4WD does not work.  The rear passenger door panel is gone.  The heat works intermittently and the fan is going out on it.  The A/C condenses water that leaks and seeps into the carpets/floorboards on the passenger front and rear sides.  At least during the summer I can swim in the floorboard of my car.  Anyone else have a pool in their car?  Winning!

     I work, however, every time I get some money set aside for a new car something else on the Jeep of Death breaks.  The front brakes are grinding and in need of new brakes and rotors.  I cannot afford to sink anymore money into it and am currently only driving the car if I absolutely have to.

     The $14,000 would cover the cost of the new used car, taxes, plating, registration and insurance start-up.

    This vehicle will allow me more freedom in my ability to continue to bring you the best possible shows with mobile broadcasts, live vacation trips, foodie trips and fetish and adult related conventions across the country. If we exceed the goal, the funds will be set aside for cross country cam trips this upcoming spring and summer.  I could be cumming in a town near you!

I would appreciate ANY help big or small in freeing me from this deathtrap of a vehicle.  It's time the old horse was put down for good!   Thanks for taking the time to read my campaign page and please SPREAD THE WORD to anyone you think can help, big or small.

Hugs & Kisses XOXOXO

story:
The first-ever smart moped-style ebike by Segway is here. Featuring ReadyGO! system to bring you the most convenient daily commute. The C80 is here to spark a change for your lifestyle.

*The Segway eMoped C80 is a moped-style electric bike. No license is required in most states in the US. Please refer to local laws and regulations for license requirements.

Simplify your ride with the Segway eMoped C80. Convenient and easy to use, it has a top speed of 20 mph and 52.8 miles range. The RideyGo! intelligent system has powerful sensors that detect when you are leaving and automatically locks the vehicle in 3 seconds. Take comfort in knowing your eMoped is always safe and secure after each ride.

The RideyGo! Intelligent System includes an array of new functions such as the Airlock System, NFC Tag, Smart Seat Detection, and Auto-Lock Mode. Get ready for an easy ride with cutting-edge smart features.

Say goodbye to your keys and ride with just your smartphone. With the AirLock system, you can unlock the eMoped C80 with just a tap on your phone via the Segway-Ninebot App.

Once the vehicle is connected to the Segway-Ninebot app, the eMoped C80 will automatically identify its owner by recognizing the app when the smartphone is near the vehicle. Start your journey by sitting on the seat and releasing the kickstand.

The Segway eMoped C80 comes with two NFC Tags. Simply swipe the NFC Tag above the dashboard to lock and unlock the vehicle. It's that simple.

Just sit on the seat and start driving with Smart Seat Detection. Equipped with intelligent sensors under the seat and an electric handlebar lock, the vehicle will lock itself within 3 seconds of leaving the seat.

Like the AirLock System and Auto-Lock Mode, you can lock or unlock the eMoped C80 with Smart Seat Detection. To ensure the safety of our riders, the smart feature will only be activated when the driver is properly seated. Otherwise, if no movement has been detected, the eMoped C80 will not be ready to ride, even if you twist the throttle.

When Auto-Lock Mode is activated, your smart vehicle assistant will automatically lock the eMoped C80 within 3 seconds of you stepping down from the vehicle. You can even customize the Auto-Lock Timer via the Segway-Ninebot app

The newly designed 1152 Wh lithium-ion battery can take you on a long journey of up to 52.8 miles range on a single charge. The detachable battery can also be removed in a snap with a weight of just 13.2 lbs.

Take a break and enjoy your adventures with auto cruise. To activate the auto cruise, simply press the multi-functional button located on the right side of the vehicle and select your desired speed.

Your eMoped C80 will remain at a constant speed without you having to hold onto the handlebar at all times.

If Auto Cruise is enabled via the Segway-Ninebot app, C80 will maintain the same speed after riding at a constant speed for 5 seconds. You can release the throttle when the blue light is on. If Auto Cruise is not app enabled, you can still activate it by pressing the multi-function button.

Aided by GPS, you can track the eMoped C80 at any time and have notifications sent directly to your phone.

With the double security system of GPS and LBS, you can track the location of your vehicle and get the latest travel status.

The eMoped C80’s smart security system detects any irregular movements and sends notifications to your smartphone within seconds to give you peace of mind. After your C80 is locked, any unusual actions such as pushing, moving or accessing the vehicle will trigger the alarm system.

The C80 comes with four built-in anti-theft mechanisms when it’s parked and locked.

1. Visual Alarm

The lights of the handlebars will alternatingly flash red and green;

2. Auditory Alarm

The alarm will sound;

3. Move Obstruction

The wheels will lock after 3 to 4 seconds;

4. Alert Notification

A message will be sent to the rider’s phone reporting the unusual action and its current location.

With disk of light we see as halo, the LED handlebar lights send color coded messages to ensure all communiction between you and your eMoped C80.

The LED dashboard updates all information and the status of your journey at a glance.

The eMoped C80 LED front halo-shaped headlight consists of an inner and outer ring light. An ambient light sensor has been placed in the headlight, which allows it to adjust the brightness to the environment. Starting at dusk, the headlight will light up, providing you better visibility during your ride.

The light defaults on low and then adjusts to the light, so as not to overwhelm the user when it’s first switched on.

With the exception of the left button for the vehicle horn, all other operations can be enabled with the multi-function button on the right side of the vehicle.

The throttle and brake are also located on the right handlebars.

The electric bike is equipped with premium features on the front disc and rear drum brakes to ensure your safety during sudden halts, and elevate your riding experience.

The EABS system (Electric Absorption Braking System) recycles energy from the drum brake. The energy recovery mechanism stores the unused kinetic energy until it is needed, enabling better endurance along the way.

The front suspension fork and the middle-segmented spring suspension provides a cushier ride on rougher roads. Along with the specially designed wide tires, you can ride as comfortably as you like.

When riding, the suspension absorbs all shocks on different types of terrains to ensure a safe and  bump-free ride.

Weighing 121lbs and measuring in at less than 5.3ft, the vehicle can be taken effortlessly into elevators and other small areas.

Monitoring the condition of your vehicle has never been easier. Pair your eMoped C80 with the Segway-Ninebot app in 3 easy steps and control your experience with a simple tap.

AirLock System: Your phone is the key. The C80 will be ready to power on when you get close to the vehicle.

Auto-Lock: Customize the timer between 1,3,5 and 10 seconds to lock your C80. Once the Auto-Lock is activated, the bike will automatically lock within the preset countdown.

Power Assist: With Power Assist, you can use the throttle to release full acceleration power on the road.

Auto Cruise: Auto Cruise can be activated or deactivated via the Segway-Ninebot App. After you have driven at the same speed for 5 seconds, the auto cruise is activated to maintain the desired speed. To deactivate the function, tap the "Auto Cruise" button and as soon as it is off, the button turns grey.

The earth is what we all have in common.

As an electric bike, it can reduce CO2 emissions if you drive the C80 instead of a gas vehicle. The outer shell is environmentally friendly with a 100% recyclable PP material.

The Segway eMoped C80 includes a toolbox with all the accessories you need for easy setup. The eMoped C80 comes assembled, with an additional 10 minutes to put together the accessories.

 

Every backer can get a Free Detachable Child Back Seat with Footrest once we hit our $500K milestone. Please share your love and spread words about the first-ever smart moped-style e-bike. Help us reach the stretch goal and UNLOCK the extra surprises to come with your Segway eMoped C80!

Disclaimer: the prizes are provided by a third party – the Longham Group. Segway reserves the right to replace the prizes with other goods or accessories that have similar and/or equivalent value within its sole discretion without further notice. The child seat is designed without seat belt or restraints. Please use the prizes with precaution and best judgment. Using of the child seat and basket shall comply with law.

Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

story:
Thank you for taking the time to consider supporting AyaMed, Inc

As a single mother there are so many challenges. One of the greatest is when your child faces a health crisis. My daughter Aya was born with Sickle Cell Anemia, a blood disorder that does not have a medical cure however there are many procedures that have addressed this disease including bone marrow transplants. One of the stresses that follows a sickle cell child is pain crisis. My daughter, Aya began experiencing this painful ordeal from the age of three, she would experience pain in numerous parts of her body. Sometimes it would be in her leg, stomach, arm, and chest. The ordeal would start with pain that would escalate and get worse. I would have to take her to the hospital they would  admit her and the process would begin. Generally they would hydrate her and give pain medication to reduce the pain Aya would always require oxygen, because of the pain she would not take deep breathes. The older Aya got the stays at the hospital increased and I was not able to do anything to help my child. Something inside of me charged me to observe everything while in the hospital in detail, One of the things that I noticed over and over was my child inability to breath comfortably through the devices that were used, she hated them! I watched and watched and she complained, there was always a struggle.    It occurred to me that if a device could help, be child friendly and could deliver the necessary and critical oxygen that my child needed, then this would be great. This was the beginning phase of my idea. I was and remain excited to develop this oxygen support device to help patients who must get oxygen to recover. Thus the beginning of the AyaMed support device, although this desire grew out of personal experience with my daughter I am convinced that it would change the outlook for all patients in need of oxygen. The device can be utilized by the common user in a simple and effortless manner with little or no training. It is time for an improved instrument for the delivery of oxygen! Choosing the right type of equipment for you and your lifestyle is very important, the right oxygen equipment can play a major role in improving quality of life and saving lives. I believe that AyaMed, Inc has the innovation to make this happen. It is simple But I believe so effective! On August 1,  2012 Aya went through a bone marrow transplant and now cured of sickle cell anemia. Our mission is develop an improved respiratory device for delivery of oxygen for patients suffering from respiratory disorders and patients that are prescribed oxygen in order to compensate for their inability to breathe normally during periods of elevated levels of pain or discomfort. 

AyaMed, Inc would like to raise funds to donate to children and adults that are going through bone marrow transplants, and to bring more awareness of sickle cell disease. We believe in giving back as well, and would like to donate additional money raised to the ones who have given us so much, Hackensack Medical Hospital has been apart of our lives since Aya was three years old and we could never repay them for everything they have done for us, but we hope to give back to them as much as we can. Thank you for your support!

story:
Go down to English version.


Worum geht es?

Das Internet ist kaputt. Mit der Liveschaltung der Qabel-Alphaversion am 11. Juni 2014 wird ein ernstzunehmender Schritt auf dem Weg zu einem freieren und sichereren Datenaustausch getan. Nicht nur die NSA und andere Spionageorganisationen und Geheimdienste, insbesondere auch der Anbieter der Plattform selbst (also wir und zukünftig andere) haben damit keinen Zugriff mehr auf die Daten der User.

Das Konzept Qabel ist ein schlüsselfertiges Ökosystem mit inhärentem, echtem Datenschutz. Es entsteht die weltweit erste Softwareplattform, die Kommunikation und Datenaustausch im Internet so sicher wie derzeit technisch möglich macht und dabei einfach benutzbar ist. Es handelt sich um eine freie, quelloffene (dies aber nicht im Sinne der OSI), erweiterbare Plattform (open source), die:

  • grundsätzlich jegliche Daten Ende-zu-Ende verschlüsselt,

  • die Kryptographie vollständig clientseitig erledigt und in Nutzerhand lässt,

  • dabei auch komplexe Dienste wie zum Beispiel geteilte Kalender, kollaboratives Office oder Social Networks abbilden kann,

  • Metadaten weitestgehend verschleiert (auch vor dem Provider – es ist nicht ersichtlich, wer mit wem wann von wo nach wo kommuniziert),

  • in der kompletten technischen Architektur davon ausgeht, dass der Provider kompromittiert und somit nicht vertrauenswürdig ist,

  • ein neuartiges und möglichst offenes Geschäftsmodell verfolgt, das sowohl rechtssichere open-source-Entwicklung zulässt als auch die freie Nutzung und das freie Hosting durch nichtkommerzielle Organisationen erlaubt

  • und hoster- und instanzenübergreifend funktioniert.

Qabel hat sich den Herausforderungen auf den Ebenen Technik, Lizenzierung und Monetarisierung gestellt und bietet Privatleuten, Open-Source-Entwicklern und Unternehmen an, sich die Plattform zu eigen zu machen.


Wofür brauchen wir eure Unterstützung?

Qabel wird zunächst als Alphaversion an den Start gehen. Parallel zu den Rückmeldungen und Verbesserungen aus der Community wird ein Code-Auditing in Auftrag gegeben, um Qabel zur 1.0-Reife zu bringen. Etwaige Schwachstellen können so gefunden und Sicherheitslücken geschlossen werden.

Ab der Version 1.0 werden die Betriebssysteme Android, Ubuntu for Phones, FirefoxOS, Linux, MacOS, Windows und Windows Phone unterstützt. Die Benutzeroberfläche ist zudem bisher nur ein Platzhalter, die komplett verworfen und neu gestaltet wird.

Die Weiterentwicklung von Qabel ist mit erheblichen Kosten verbunden. Deshalb unterstützt uns und lasst uns gemeinsam das Internet zurückerobern! Spendet, spread the word und beteiligt euch am Alphatest!


Was sind die Ziele und wer die Zielgruppe?

Ziele: Das Internet soll wieder zur Privatsache gemacht werden. Schluss mit Massenüberwachung auf Knopfdruck, Vorratsdatenspeicherung und Bestandsdatenauskunft.

Zielgruppe: Alle Menschen, die sich im Internet bewegen.


Warum sollte man gerade dieses Projekt unterstützen?

Weil Dinge wie Rechtsstaat, Bürgerrechte, Meinungsfreiheit und das Recht auf freie Meinungsbildung erhaltens- und ausbauwert sind. Darum müssen wir gemeinsam kämpfen.

"Es ist bedenklich, dass kaum jemand weiß, welche Daten über ihn gespeichert sind. Es ist äußerst bedenklich, dass kaum jemand weiß, wer diese Daten gerade besitzt. Bedenklich ist es hingegen nicht, dass sich nur eine Minderheit dagegen wehrt. Das ist dramatisch." (Götz Hamann, Marcus Rohwetter, DIE ZEIT, 48/2004)

"Wer wesentliche Freiheit aufgeben kann um eine geringfügige bloß jeweilige Sicherheit zu bewirken, verdient weder Freiheit, noch Sicherheit." (Benjamin Franklin)


Wer steckt hinter dem Projekt?

Die ursprüngliche Idee für Qabel wurde Anfang 2011 im Rahmen eines Teammeetings des Datenschutzunternehmens praemandatum formuliert.

An Qabel arbeiten derzeit 40 Leute aus den Bereichen Softwareentwicklung, Ethik, Recht, Marketing und Vertrieb. Das Crowfunding-Team besteht aus Meike (Vertrieb), Britta (Marketing), Dennis (Technik) und Peter (the Boss). Bei Rückfragen wendet euch gern an uns: kontakt@qabel.de

Die Qabel GmbH hat folgende Teilhaber:

- praemandatum GmbH 41%

- Peter Leppelt 15%

- Michael Wessel Informationstechnologie GmbH 13%

- hannover innovation fonds GmbH (HIF) 1%

- Weitere stille private Teilhaber (weder aus Politik noch sonstigen Kontrollinstanzen) 30%


Was ist beim Crowdfunding zu beachten?

Damit Qabel unabhängig bleibt, unterstützt uns bitte immer nur als Privatperson und nicht im Namen eines Unternehmens.

Als glühende Verfechter des Datenschutzes müssen wir darauf hinweisen, dass die Bezahlmöglichkeiten bei indiegogo nicht zufriedenstellend sind. Eine Kreditkarte hat nicht jeder und PayPal entspricht nicht unseren Vorstellungen von Datenschutz. Wir haben uns auf Grund der großen Reichweite dennoch für eine Finanzierung über Indiegogo entschieden.

Die Dankeschöns für deine Unterstützung werden dir ein paar Wochen nach Ende der Kampagne zugesandt.

Das Handtuch (42 €-Perk), was es zu ergattern gibt, ist 70x140cm groß und wird so aussehen:


Der Hoodie (100 €-Perk) mit Katze und Logo wird so aussehen:


Oder *NEU* ihr könnt auch einen Hoodie (100 €-Perk) mit kleinem Qabel-Logo wählen:


*NEU* *NEU* hier das Design unseres T-Shirts (80 €-Perk) mit Aufdruck: "Das Internet ist kaputt". Das T-Shirt wird schwarz werden, den Schnitt zeigen wir euch schnellstmöglich.


Wir freuen uns über eure Unterstützung und ein freieres Internet!



ENGLISH VERSION

More digital autonomy with Qabel – from alpha to 1.0

Qabel is a ready to use ecosystem with inherent data privacy – the first software platform that makes communication and data exchange on the internet as technically safe as possible.


The situation

The internet is broken. When the Qabel alpha version is launched June 11, 2014, it will mark a serious step on the path to a freer and more secure data exchange while still being user-friendly. Qabel GmbH, based in Hanover, Germany, will thereby attempt to patch a fundamental flaw of the internet. Not only the NSA and other intelligence organizations and agencies, but especially the platform providers themselves, will no longer have access to user data.


The Qabel approach

The concept Qabel is a ready to use ecosystem with inherent, true data privacy. The world's first software platform is being developed that makes communication and data exchange on the internet as technically safe as currently possible and thus easy to use. It is a free, open-source (not in accordance with the OSI), expandable platform that:

  • always encrypts any data end-to-end,

  • does the cryptography completely on the client side and keeps it in the hands of users,

  • provides the basis for complex services such as shared calendars, collaborative office or social networks,

  • can largely obscure metadata (even from the host – it is not discernible who communicates with whom, when, and from where to where),

  • whose entire technical architecture assumes that the provider is compromised and thus cannot be trusted,

  • pursues a novel and as open as possible business model that not only permits compliant open source development but also free use and hosting by non-commercial organizations

  • and functions across hosts and instances.


Qabel met challenges at the levels of technology, licensing and monetarization and offers private people, open-source developers and businesses to make the platform their own.


Why do we need your support?

Qabel will firstly be launched as an alpha version. Parallel to the feedback and improvements coming from the community, a code auditing will be commissioned to take Qabel to 1.0 maturity.

With release of the version 1.0, also the operating systems Android, Ubuntu for Phones, FirefoxOS, Linux, MacOS, Windows and Windows Phone will be supported. Furthermore, the user interface is a placeholder. It will be scrapped and completely redesigned.

The development of Qabel is associated with considerable costs. So we need your support to conquer the internet back together! Fund, spread the word and participate in the alpha testing!


What is our goal and who is our target group?

Goal: More digital autonomy! Mass surveillance and data preservation need to end!

Target group: Everybody who uses the internet.


Why should you support this project?

Because things like constitutional state, civil rights, freedom of speech and the right for free opinion are worthy of preservation and development.

„It is alarming that hardly anyone knows what data is stored about them. It is extremely alarming that hardly anyone knows who owns this data at this point in time. It is not alarming, however, that only a minority takes defensive measures. This is dramatic.“ (Götz Hamann, Marcus Rohwetter, DIE ZEIT, 48/2004; free translation of the german quote!)

"They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety, deserve neither liberty nor safety." (Benjamin Franklin)


Who is behind Qabel?

The original idea came up in early 2011 during a team meeting of the company praemandatum. – a company specialized in data security.

At the moment, 40 people are working on Qabel. They work in the departments software development, ethics, law, marketing and distribution. The crowdfunding team consists of Meike (distribution), Britta (marketing), Dennis (software) and Peter (the boss). If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us: kontakt@qabel.de

Qabel's shareholders:

- praemandatum GmbH 41%

- Peter Leppelt 15%

- Michael Wessel Informationstechnologie GmbH 13%

- hannover innovation fonds GmbH (HIF) 1%

-Three further private individuals (neither from politicians nor other supervisory authorities) 30%


What to note regarding this crowdfunding project?

To keep Qabel independent, we only ask private individuals – and no companies - to fund this project on Indiegogo.

As passionate proponents of data security we have to point out, that the options of payment on Indiegogo are not satisfying. Not everyone has a credit card, and PayPal does not conform with our opinion on data security. The reason why we still chose Indiegogo is to have a wide reach, because our idea is not only a matter of just a few.

You will receive your ordered Perks a few weeks after the end of the crowdfunding.

The towel (42 € perk) will look like this:


The hoodie with cat and logo (100 € perk) will look like this:


NEW: You also can choose a hoodie with a small logo (100 € perk):


*NEW* *NEW* here is the design of our t-shirt (80 € perk) with the German print: "Das Internet ist kaputt" = "The internet is broken". The t-shirt will be black. We will show you the shirt style asap.


We are looking forward to your support and a freer internet!

Internet ist kaputt. Mit der Liveschaltung der Qabel-Alphaversion am
11. Juni 2014 wird ein ernstzunehmender Schritt auf dem
Weg zu einem freieren und sichereren Datenaustausch getan.
Nicht nur die
NSA und andere Spionageorganisationen und Geheimdienste, insbesondere
auch der Anbieter der Plattform selbst (also wir und zukünftig
andere) haben damit keinen Zugriff mehr auf die Daten der User.Das
Konzept Qabel ist ein schlüsselfertiges Ökosystem mit inhärentem,
echtem Datenschutz. Es entsteht die weltweit erste Softwareplattform,
die Kommunikation und Datenaustausch im Internet so sicher wie
derzeit technisch möglich macht und dabei einfach benutzbar ist. Es
handelt sich um eine freie, quelloffene (dies aber nicht im Sinne der OSI), erweiterbare Plattform (open source), die:
grundsätzlich
	jegliche Daten Ende-zu-Ende verschlüsselt,

die
	Kryptographie vollständig clientseitig erledigt und in Nutzerhand
	lässt,

dabei
	auch komplexe Dienste wie zum Beispiel geteilte Kalender,
	kollaboratives Office oder Social Networks abbilden kann,

Metadaten
	weitestgehend verschleiert (auch vor dem Provider – es ist nicht
	ersichtlich, wer mit wem wann von wo nach wo kommuniziert),


in
	der kompletten technischen Architektur davon ausgeht, dass der
	Provider kompromittiert und somit nicht vertrauenswürdig ist,


ein
	neuartiges und möglichst offenes Geschäftsmodell verfolgt,
	das sowohl rechtssichere open-source-Entwicklung
	zulässt als auch
	die freie Nutzung und das freie Hosting durch nichtkommerzielle
	Organisationen erlaubt


und
	hoster- und instanzenübergreifend funktioniert.


Qabel
hat sich den Herausforderungen auf den Ebenen Technik, Lizenzierung
und Monetarisierung gestellt und bietet Privatleuten,
Open-Source-Entwicklern und Unternehmen an, sich die Plattform zu
eigen zu machen.Wofür brauchen wir eure Unterstützung?
Qabel
wird zunächst als Alphaversion an den Start gehen. Parallel zu den
Rückmeldungen und Verbesserungen aus der Community wird ein
Code-Auditing in Auftrag gegeben, um Qabel zur 1.0-Reife zu bringen.
Etwaige Schwachstellen können so gefunden und Sicherheitslücken
geschlossen werden. 


Ab
der Version 1.0 werden die Betriebssysteme Android, Ubuntu for Phones,
FirefoxOS, Linux, MacOS, Windows
und Windows Phone unterstützt. Die Benutzeroberfläche ist zudem
bisher nur ein Platzhalter, die komplett verworfen und neu gestaltet
wird. 


Die
Weiterentwicklung von Qabel ist mit erheblichen Kosten verbunden. Deshalb unterstützt uns und lasst uns gemeinsam das Internet zurückerobern! Spendet, spread the word und beteiligt euch am Alphatest!



Was
sind die Ziele und wer die Zielgruppe?

Ziele: Das
Internet soll wieder zur Privatsache gemacht werden. Schluss mit
Massenüberwachung auf Knopfdruck, Vorratsdatenspeicherung und
Bestandsdatenauskunft.

Zielgruppe: Alle Menschen, die sich
im Internet bewegen. 


Warum
sollte man gerade dieses Projekt unterstützen?

Weil
Dinge wie Rechtsstaat, Bürgerrechte, Meinungsfreiheit und das Recht
auf freie Meinungsbildung erhaltens- und ausbauwert sind. Darum
müssen wir gemeinsam kämpfen.

"Es
ist bedenklich, dass kaum jemand weiß, welche Daten über ihn
gespeichert sind. Es ist äußerst
bedenklich, dass kaum jemand weiß, wer diese Daten gerade besitzt.
Bedenklich ist es hingegen nicht, dass sich nur eine Minderheit
dagegen wehrt. Das ist dramatisch." (Götz Hamann, Marcus
Rohwetter, DIE ZEIT, 48/2004)



"Wer
wesentliche Freiheit aufgeben kann um eine geringfügige bloß
jeweilige Sicherheit zu bewirken, verdient weder Freiheit, noch
Sicherheit." (Benjamin Franklin)




Wer
steckt hinter dem Projekt?

Die
ursprüngliche Idee für Qabel wurde Anfang 2011 im Rahmen eines
Teammeetings des Datenschutzunternehmens praemandatum formuliert.

An Qabel arbeiten derzeit 40 Leute aus den Bereichen Softwareentwicklung, Ethik, Recht, Marketing und Vertrieb. Das
Crowfunding-Team besteht aus Meike (Vertrieb), Britta (Marketing), Dennis (Technik) und Peter (the Boss). 
 Bei Rückfragen wendet euch gern an uns: kontakt@qabel.de
Die Qabel GmbH hat
folgende Teilhaber:
- praemandatum GmbH
41%
- Peter Leppelt 15%
- Michael Wessel Informationstechnologie GmbH 13%
- hannover innovation fonds GmbH (HIF) 1%
- Weitere stille
private Teilhaber (weder aus Politik noch sonstigen
Kontrollinstanzen) 30% 


Was ist beim Crowdfunding zu beachten?

Damit Qabel unabhängig bleibt, unterstützt uns bitte immer nur als Privatperson und nicht im Namen eines Unternehmens.

Als glühende Verfechter des Datenschutzes müssen wir darauf hinweisen, dass die Bezahlmöglichkeiten bei indiegogo nicht zufriedenstellend sind. Eine Kreditkarte hat nicht jeder und PayPal entspricht nicht unseren Vorstellungen von Datenschutz. Wir haben uns auf Grund der großen Reichweite dennoch für eine Finanzierung über Indiegogo entschieden.Die Dankeschöns für deine Unterstützung werden dir ein paar Wochen nach Ende der Kampagne zugesandt. story:
Gi FlyBike is an electric, smart, maintenance-free, folding bicycle with full size, 26” wheels that we created for the future of urban commuting.

Crafted from ultra lightweight aircraft grade aluminum, Gi FlyBike can be taken anywhere––bus, train, office, elevator, or locker––without compromise. Gi FlyBike gives people exactly what they need. Freedom to ride without excess or restraint.

We have built partnerships with Incutex, Goodwin Procter, Ribcap, Santex and New as well as an incredible mobile app. TUV, the Technical Inspection Association, now ensures that Gi FlyBike complies with European laws for electric bikes.


Now have the option of choosing a black or white frame!

Your Gi FlyBike is now upgraded with mudguards!

                      Your bike is coming with a bicycle bell and 2 USB keys!


“Unabashedly urban-minded, the GiFlyBike is an ideal cruiser for city streets” - Uncrate.com

“The bicycle is one of our best hopes when it comes to alleviating many of the world’s transportation issues” - Fast Company

“An Argentinian team has created a quickly folding electric bike with full-size wheels - one that pretty much knocks out every excuse you've had for not biking to work-” - Cool Hunting

“The bicycle of the future is nothing like your old ten-speed” - Business Insider

“Would you bike more often if you didn't have to worry about what to do with the damn thing once you reached your destination? Then the GiFlyBike might be for you” - Details

"Ditch The Faux Hoverboard And Commute With Gi FlyBike, A Foldable Electric Bike" - TechCrunch

“We are thrilled to announce Gi FlyBike will launch on Amazon Exclusives. We look forward to FlyBike being available to all of our Prime customers.”  - Kyle Walker, Senior Manager at Amazon



Each of the following features are rooted in one simple question: How can we improve your commute?

  • FlyFolding System: Folds in one single second, and in one simple motion. 
  • Electric Flight Assistance: 40 miles (60 km) on a single battery charge. 
  • Locking System: Locks automatically when you are 10 feet (5 meters) away.
  • Sharing Program: Create a personal profile. Share your Gi FlyBike with friends.
  • USB Phone Charger: Stays connected and never runs out of battery.
  • Solid, Anti-Puncture Tires: No more flats. 
  • Belt Drive: Maintenance free riding. No grease. No noise. Your pants are safe.
  • LED Smart Lights: Controlled remotely and automatically with the app.
  • Bicycle navigation system: Choose bike friendly routes.
  • Gi FlyBike App: More details below.

Fly Folding System

Electric Flight Assistance

Smart LED Lights

Solid, Anti-Puncture Tires

Belt Drive

USB Phone Charger

Locking and Sharing System

Click here to download the Gi FlyBike mobile app from the App Store or Google Play. Please keep in mind that it is a work in progress, and that it needs to be synched with a Gi FlyBike to be fully-functional.

The app allows for complete, wireless control of the bike’s features including its electric assistance, smart lock, bicycle navigation system and smart lights. On top of that, it has its own bike sharing program: loan your Gi FlyBike to a friend with a secure request access code; share your favorite routes over social media; and track your personal fitness statistics.


All of these features come together to create an enjoyable commuting experience. Imagine: you get off your elevator with your folded FlyBike; you unfold the bike in one second, choose your route, and start cycling towards your destination; you do not want to arrive sweaty so you increase your level of electric assistance; the sun begins to set so you turn on your smart lights; you've arrived cool, calm and collected, and with a fully-charged phone. As you dismount and fold your bike, it locks automatically; you are finished with your FlyBike... for now, but a friend wants to borrow it so you share it through the app. 

You enjoyed commuting. Now its their turn.


Gi FlyBike is not just a sustainable, technologically-advanced solution to commuting in cities. Gi FlyBike symbolizes our desire to change the world for the better. Commuting can affect our outlook on the day ahead but more importantly, it impacts our perspective, society, and planet. With Gi FlyBike we believe that thoughtful design and technology can take us into the next generation of transportation, to create more effective and eco-friendly cities with happier people.


A few years ago, while we were living and working in Argentina, a national strike paralyzed public transportation across the country. The strike inspired us to delve into the kinds of problems commuters face, and to critically examine alternative forms of transportation.

During and even after the strike, we noticed that commuters wanted the kind of independence that is incompatible with public transit; they also wanted agility that cars cannot offer, with as little environmental impact as possible. This has been the inspiration behind the design of Gi FlyBike.

Our Evolution: Paper to Wood to Plastic to Aluminum!

Please note: Backers are responsible for sales taxes and import duties, which will vary according to the country, state or province to which the reward is being shipped. Please use the following duty calculator to determine the estimated import duties and taxes for pedal assisted electric bicycles in your respective region.

The funds raised will be used for: 

  • Producing factory samples.
  • Running sample testing and homologation. 
  • Finalizing the design of the FlyBike mobile app for Android.
  • Developing an e-commerce platform. 
  • Creating an international network of service stores.
  • Mass production and distribution.

Additional funds will be used for:

  • Broadening our international network of service stores.
  • Designing an environmentally low-impact packaging system.
  • Creating a line of accessories.

We created Gi FlyBike with a minimalistic design, prioritizing the functionality over the aesthetics. After two years of work, we came up with a design specially built with the comfort, safety, and ease of use that daily commuters deserve.

We are proud to announce that Yadea Technology Group is bringing Gi FlyBike's design to market!

Yadea is global leader in the e-bike manufacturing world with over 18 years of experience in the industry. Yadea sells more than 3.2 million units to 5 continents and 66 countries annually, representing 10 to 15% of the e-vehicle global market share. The partnership provides Gi FlyBike access to the highest quality manufacturing capabilities available, as well as world-wide expertise in the e-bike sector. With Yadea as our ally, we can ensure a timely delivery of the product to our backers.

Gi FlyBike's founders in Yadea's factory!

Gi FlyBike’s co-founder and CTO, Agustin Augustinoy, has already relocated to Yadea’s facility and is currently working closely with Yadea’s production team to assemble the first round of Gi FlyBikes.

One hundred and seven parts.

A word from the inventor!

Here is the link he was looking for!

Thank you for your support! Now for some bloopers.

 

 ^ Music courtesy of Vulfpeck

SHARE ON FACEBOOK

Risks and challenges

Our team is fully committed to making Gi FlyBike the best it can be.

We have dedicated the last two years sourcing the best materials and selecting the most experienced suppliers in order to mitigate as many potential risks as possible.

At the moment, we have a fully functional prototype, and have run usability tests, which the bike passed with flying colors. All of the technical aspects of the mobile app have been tested and approved. It is now available for download on the App Store, and the Android version on Google Play.

Gi FlyBike is an ambitious product that will revolutionize and make mobility sustainable. Its innovation and technological development has been supported by institutions such as Incutex, the National Agency for Science and Technology of Argentina with partial funding from the Inter-America Development Bank (IDB). The project was selected from hundreds of projects to receive funding for technological innovation.

Gi FlyBike, like everything else on Indiegogo, is a work in progress. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about any unplanned hurdles or delays.

Running sample testing and homologation. 
Finalizing the design of the FlyBike mobile app for Android.
Developing an e-commerce platform. 
Creating an international network of service stores.
Mass production and distribution.

Additional funds will be used for:

Broadening our international network of service stores.
Designing an environmentally low-impact packaging system.
Creating a line of accessories.


We created Gi FlyBike with a minimalistic design, prioritizing the functionality over the aesthetics. After two years of work, we came up with a design specially built with the comfort, safety, and ease of use that daily commuters deserve.
We are proud to announce that Yadea Technology Group is bringing Gi FlyBike's design to market!
Yadea is global leader in the e-bike manufacturing world with over 18 years of experience in the industry. Yadea sells more than 3.2 million units to 5 continents and 66 countries annually, representing 10 to 15% of the e-vehicle global market share. The partnership provides Gi FlyBike access to the highest quality manufacturing capabilities available, as well as world-wide expertise in the e-bike sector. With Yadea as our ally, we can ensure a timely delivery of the product to our backers.


Gi FlyBike's founders in Yadea's factory!



Gi FlyBike’s co-founder and CTO, Agustin Augustinoy, has already relocated to Yadea’s facility and is currently working closely with Yadea’s production team to assemble the first round of Gi FlyBikes.

One hundred and seven parts.


A word from the inventor!

Here is the link he was looking for!

Thank you for your support! Now for some bloopers.
 

 ^ Music courtesy of Vulfpeck


SHARE ON FACEBOOK

Risks and challenges
Our team is fully committed to making Gi FlyBike the best it can be.
We have dedicated the last two years sourcing the best materials and selecting the most experienced suppliers in order to mitigate as many potential risks as possible.
At the moment, we have a fully functional prototype, and have run usability tests, which the bike passed with flying colors. All of the technical aspects of the mobile app have been tested and approved. It is now available for download on the App Store, and the Android version on Google Play.
Gi FlyBike is an ambitious product that will revolutionize and make mobility sustainable. Its innovation and technological development has been supported by institutions such as Incutex, the National Agency for Science and Technology of Argentina with partial funding from the Inter-America Development Bank (IDB). The project was selected from hundreds of projects to receive funding for technological innovation.
Gi FlyBike, like everything else on Indiegogo, is a work in progress. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about any unplanned hurdles or delays.

story:
Perfectly Balanced Riding Mechanism 

FAQ

1.  Do you ship WideWheel scooter worldwide ?

WideWheel is shipped to United States, Singapore, European and Asian countries.  On the payment menu, you can check if the shipping is available to your country. 

2. Does the price of perk include the shipping charge ? 

The price does not include the shipping charge. If you select your country on the payment menu, you can check the shipping charge based on your country.  

3. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT for international orders?

Import duty tax or VAT may need to be paid if your country requires it.

4. Is there a warranty on my WideWheel scooter ?

Yes. We offer six (6) months limited warranty on all WideWheel purchases. Note this does not cover damages incurred by rider usage. Any alteration, tampering or modification of the electronics, battery, controller, motor or related electrical wiring will not be serviced or supported by Wide Wheel and will void the warranty.

5. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

Approximately 2~3 hours for WideWheel  with 4.4Ah battery and approximately 4~6 hours for Wide Wheel with 8.8Ah battery  if the battery pack is completely empty.

6. What is the maximum weight to ride a WideWheel scooter ?

We recommend under 100kgs (220lbs) for the best riding experience.

7. Where can WideWheel scooter be serviced?

WideWheel scooter is designed to be simple enough for anyone to replace parts on their own. We will provide documentation and video of possible replacement processes.

8. I want to be a distributor or retailer, where do I start?

We are open to distributors and retailers worldwide once our initial crowdfunding campaign ends.

story:
My name is Nick Garzilli. I am licensee #100 and the current COO of ET3 Global Alliance Inc. ET3 is short for Evacuated Tube Transport Technologies (et3.com).

I am the organizer of this campaign to Legalize Transport Innovation. The above video is my BBC World News interview that came on the heels of the world wide media sensation caused by Elon Musk's Hyperloop in August. That was a big day for me, but it won't be nearly as big as the day in 2016 when we open the first 3 mile 375mph demo of ET3, currently in negotiations to break ground this winter somewhere near Las Vegas.

I learned about ET3 three years ago when I attempted to run for congress. I remember asking myself why am I even running for congress? That's what happened. I ended my campaign, bought an ET3 license, and got to work trying to get it built. What I found is the barriers to innovation in transport are all political.

This campaign's main purpose is to raise the the legal funds necessary to draft a California Proposition that will create the legal framework for the spread of the physical internet.  In the future Tube Transport (300 - 4,000mph) will be like fiber optics, and local area Personal Rapid Transit (25 - 55 mph) will be like cell phone towers. It can all be privately funded and solar powered.

There is an art to drafting an initiative and having it properly submitted to the Attorney General of CA, so I have hired an exceptional Sacramento election law attorney  Thomas W. Hiltachk. Below is the Transportation Innovation Act. If you like what you read help out the campaign with a contribution!

Another purpose of the campaign is fill the demand for ET3 logo apparel for all of our licensees and supporters. This is currently the only place where you can get ET3 hoodies, hats, shirts, and stickers. We need our supporters out there wearing the ET3 logo and talking to people. This is grass roots organizing. Get your uniforms here.

If you are interested in one of the higher priced perks ($1,000+) please contact me so I can explain current state of demo project and answer any questions you may have regarding ET3. I have gotten the approval to offer for a limited time small areas on the seats and the outside of the first demo for personalized messages. There is an amazing PR opportunity here for someone that sees this is happening. 

LIKE the ET3 Facebook Page and interact with our community there.


THE TRANSPORTATION INNOVATION ACT

SECTION 1.   STATEMENT OF FINDINGS

A.  California bureaucrats have embarked on a multi-billion dollar project to bring “high-speed” rail to fruition.  The project was just barely approved by the voters in 2008.  Since then, costs estimates have sky-rocketed, the promises made in Proposition 1A have been broke, and initial planning for the system shows that it will be over-budget, overdue, and will not be “high-speed” or energy efficient. 

B.  While California wastes billions of taxpayer funds on old transportation technology, new technologies are being developed and employed in other cities, states, and countries.  These technologies, including hyper-loop, evacuated tube technology, local area personal rapid transit, among others, do not require billions of taxpayer dollars -- they merely require vision and leadership.

C.  As the technology capital of the world, California should be leading the development of energy efficient, high-speed transportation systems.  Yet, California has no regulatory framework to allow for private investment and development of these innovative transportation technologies. The billions the government plans to spend on old technology is creating economic disincentive for competition and innovation.

D.  If allowed to compete, head-to-head, with “high-speed” rail, these innovative technologies, will prove to be:

 

  1) Faster and more reliable:  Hyper-loop and evacuated tube technology can achieve speeds matching or exceeding those of commercial airplanes. 

 

  2) Energy efficient:  Measured by energy consumed per passenger-mile, these new innovative technologies will be significantly more energy efficient than high-speed rail, which is not much more efficient than passenger cars and planes. 

  3) Flexible:  High-Speed-Rail systems are not flexible to allow frequent access points as frequent stops between major cities result in long travel times and/or reduced throughput.  Also High-Speed-Rail track and infrastructure are extremely costly regardless of consumer demand.  New technologies are flexible to offer frequent points of accessibility, and are much less expensive; thus frequent access points can be adapted to fit consumer demand without reducing travel time or capacity.

  4) Less costly:  Rail will cost tens, if not hundreds, of billions of taxpayer dollars to construct and will require taxpayer subsidies to operate.  The construction costs for these new technologies is so much lower, there is NO cost to taxpayers because the private sector will fund construction and operation.  All the government needs to do is provide right-of-way for the systems and inspect the construction and operation of the systems to insure public safety. 

SECTION 2.   STATEMENT OF PURPOSE

The people hereby enact the “Transportation Innovation Act” to:

  1) Suspend the further issuance of bonds and construction of the high-speed rail system beyond the first leg that has been planned, in order to allow for the construction and operation of a pilot project using different technology so the voters can compare the cost, efficiency, and reliability of the two systems;

  2) Empower the state to obtain necessary right-of-way and to provide for the inspection of the construction and operation of new transportation technologies to insure public safety.

SECTION 3.  SUSPENSION OF HIGH-SPEED RAIL BOND ISSUANCE AND CONSTRUCTION

  Section 2705 is added to Chapter 20 of Division 3 of the Streets and Highways Code, to read:

§ 2705(a)  Notwithstanding any provision of this chapter, or any other law, no bonds authorized by this chapter shall be sold to pay the capital costs associated with the construction of any high-speed train system or line, except for any segment of such a system, under construction at the time of the enactment of this section. 

(b) The Authority, with the consent of the Legislature, may continue the construction of a segment of the high-speed train system pursuant to this chapter, for purposes of demonstration and comparison with other transportation technologies to be developed pursuant to the Transportation Innovation Act.

(c) Upon completion and operation of a comparable system, or within eight years, whichever is later, the Legislature, upon a two-thirds vote, may repeal this section.

SECTION 4.  THE TRANSPORTATION INNOVATION ACT

  Division 26 (commencing with section 260000) of the Public Utilities Code is added to read:

§ 260000.  The Public Utilities Commission shall pursuant to this division and regulations enacted by the Commission:

  (1) Within one year from enactment of this section, make existing right-of-way owned or maintained by the state or acquire new right-of-way, for the development of pilot projects using high-speed and/or high-efficient, transportation technologies (“HS/HE transportation technologies”) including, but not limited to, hyper-loop, evacuated tube technology, and local area personal rapid transit technology;

  (2) Within two years from enactment of this section, let competitively bid contracts allowing the use of such right-of-way with private developers for the construction and operation of such HS/HE transportation technologies as pilot projects, at no cost to taxpayers or the state, to compare with high-speed rail systems;

  (3) Establish regulatory, inspection, and safety standards over the construction and operation of HS/HE transportation system pilot projects.

  (4) Impose fees on private operators to recover the actual costs of regulatory and safety oversight of the HS/HE transportation system pilot projects.

  (5) Report to the Legislature the effectiveness of the HS/HE pilot projects in comparison, if any, to high-speed rail including speed, reliability, energy efficiency, taxpayer cost to construct and operate, and flexibility.

  (6) Develop a plan for full-scale implementation of one or more HS/HE transportation technologies that would service major metropolitan areas of the state, similar to the high-speed rail system, within eight (8) years from enactment of this section.

(b) Construction of a pilot project pursuant to this section shall be exempt from the California Environmental Quality Assurance Act (Pub. Res. Code §§ 21000 et. seq.).

(c) For purposes of this section;

(1) “Actual costs of regulatory and safety oversight” includes the Commission’s actual cost to develop any new construction and operation standards as may be required to insure public health and safety, but does not include the costs of acquisition of right of way for such HS/HE transportation technology systems.

(2) “Acquire” means the permanent or temporary acquisition of right-of-way for the purposes of the Act.

(3) “Competitively bid contracts” means that the proposal to use right-of-way by a private developer of HS/HE transportation technology will be based on the following factors:

  (a) No cost to taxpayers for construction and operation of the transportation system.

  (b) Timetable for completion, testing, and operation of transportation system.

  (c) Speed, passenger counts, and energy usage.

(4) “Evacuated tube technology” means any form of a transportation network using magnetically levitated small passenger and/or cargo vehicles operating within an enclosed structure intended to improve energy efficiency and speed by removing more than 99% of the air from the enclosed structure.

(5) “High-Speed, High-Efficiency transportation technology” means hyper-loop, evacuated tube technology, local area personal rapid transit technology, or any other transportation technology that exceeds 250 miles per hour and/or energy efficiencies in excess of 120 passenger- miles per gallon of gasoline or equivalent measure of energy.

(6) “Hyper-loop” means any form of a transportation network using air pressure supported large passenger and/or cargo vehicles within an enclosed structure intended to improve energy efficiency and speed by manipulating, adding, or removing air from the enclosed structure.

(7) “Local area personal rapid transit technology” means any computer controlled transportation network that operates using guideways.

(8) “Pilot project” means construction and operation of a HS/HE transportation technology of a minimum of five miles that transports passengers and/or cargo between two or more end points.

SECTION 5.  GENERAL PROVISIONS

(a) If any provision of this Act, or part thereof, is for any reason held to be invalid or unconstitutional, the remaining provisions shall not be affected, but shall remain in full force and effect, and to this end the provisions of this Act are severable.

(b) This Act is intended to be comprehensive.  It is the intent of the People that in the event this Act or measures relating to the same subject shall appear on the same statewide election ballot, the provisions of the other measure or measures shall be deemed to be in conflict with this Act.  In the event that this Act receives a greater number of affirmative votes, the provisions of this Act shall prevail in their entirety, and all provisions of the other measure or measures shall be null and void.


PERKS

story:
Our campaign is to raise capital for the development of our iOS app. We have an excellent team ready to start designing and building the app, we just needs the funds to do it. Up to this point, we have bootstrapped. Our team has worked long hard hours to make sure our company succeeds! We are using the money we have saved to invest in the first round of development but we are asking for help in order to build the rest of the app and support our growth to new cities!

The app will have tremendous benefits for our customers! Currently, we capture the basic functionality through our website, but as our company grows, we cannot support this growth with our current system. The app will allow us to grow and expand smoothly!

Some of the features that our customers can look forward to with the app include; booking recurring rides, making changes to existing rides, encouraging carpool rides with ride fare splitting, adding a pick up or drop off, adding a kid, tracking a ride, storing child information, routes and payment preferences and having real-time updates from drivers. Plus much more!

Our goal is to raise $25,000. The money is going directly towards our iOS app. The app development costs include design, development and maintenance. Our growth includes entrance to new markets. The money for growth will go directly towards hiring qualified city managers. The funds raised will allow our company to support its current customer base while expanding to new areas so that we can serve more families!

GoKart’s mission is to provide a safe and reliable source of transportation for kids. Our values center around the trust the company has with parents. We know there are many parents out there that could benefit from our service and our vision is to reach parents nationwide. We need your help to get there!

We continue to succeed because parents trust us. We spend a great deal of time and resources on our marketing, but the number one way parents find out about us? Word of mouth. We see this as an extremely positive attribute. Parents trust us and prefer us and they tell their friends and family about us. Parents trust other parents much more than they will ever trust something they see online. We know this to be true and we benefit from from word of mouth because parents believe in us and our company.

We appreciate your time and generosity! We hope you will donate towards our cause so that we can reach our goals and expand our services to new areas with our cutting edge iOS app! Please share our campaign on your social media, tell your friends and coworkers about us! We have high goals and with your support we can make it happen!

story:
This is Drew.  You know why he looks so flumoxed?  it's because some nefarious evil doer has done gone and SNATCHED UP HIS BIKE!  If you know anything about him, you know he is a force for good in the galaxy so now lets be a force for good for him!  

If you love Drew (which if you know him how could you not) and have a monies to spare, why not give it to this big handsome?  For many of us, Drew included, a bike isn't just a ride, it's a lively hood.  Anything will help, $10, $20 even a simple gift of $1,000,000 dollars will ensure Drew gets back on his way.

Be the hero Drew deserves, and may the Force be with you.
