story:
The motor drive for all of your projects

Building a machine with electric motors? If so, ever wanted a motor drive that can control virtually any kind of motor you can come across?

We know that this kind of drive has been hard to find, but luckily not any more! The fearless goal of IONI project is to make an versatile drive that can control most of low voltage electric motors: DC/AC/brushless/linear servo motors and stepping motors.

IONI allows controlling motors in all three operating modes: position control, velocity control and torque control (torque mode only with servo motors). Applications of such control methods include

  • Position control, such as CNC and 3D printing
  • Velocity control, such as spindles or vehicle wheels
  • Force / torque control, such as racing simulator wheel



Commands to IONI drive can be delivered in many formats and from many sources, such as PC, microcontroller (i.e. Arduino,  MBED) or Raspberry Pi. IONI understands several forms of commands:

  • Step & direction digital signals (typical stepper drive interface, good for position control)
  • Analog +/-10V signal (good for speed or torque control)
  • PWM signal (good for speed or torque control)
  • RS485 serial bus (talks SimpleMotion V2 bus protocol, open source library available)

Stretch goals

Devices

IONI Pro

This is the motor controller with similar connector that PCI-Express 8x uses. The electrical interface is not PCI-Express compatible, but a custom interface specified here. IONI Pro differs from IONI (standard) by feature set. At the present moment, features of IONI Pro and IONI are similar, but as time goes on, more features will be added to the Pro model as downloadable upgrades. See product page and  full tech specifications.


IONICUBE

IONICUBE is a motherboard to carry up to four IONI drives and provide user friendly terminals and connectors. The four axis design is especially suitable for multiaxis systems such as PC controlled CNC machines. Features & more info.


IONICUBE 1X

IONICUBE 1X is a motherboard to carry one IONI drive and provide user friendly terminals and connectors. IONICUBE 1X is the choice for the single axis systems such as motorized racing simulator wheels or a distributed motor control. IONICUBE 1X is under development thus it has longer delivery time than the 4 axis model.


Choosing a motor

As motor is not included, make sure that you have, or obtain a motor that is compatible with IONI. Learn more about motor types.

Servo motor requirements:

  • Permanent magnet brush-DC, AC, brushless or linear motor
  • Motor voltage rating 12-60 VDC (IONI supply voltage is 5 - 52 VDC)
  • Motor current rating 0.5 - 15A (IONI maximum output is 15A)
  • Servo motor must be equipped with an incremental encoder (position sensor) with resolution of 100 to 1000000 pulses per revolution.

Stepping motor requirements:

  • Two-phase stepping motor with 0.5 - 10A current rating, no feedback device needed. Can be used in position and velocity control mode. Torque mode not possible. Stepper voltage rating is irrelevant, but generally lower voltage & higher current stepper is better.

Unsuitable/non-optimum motors:

  • Any non-permanent magnet motors: induction AC motor or DC motor with field coil - will not work
  • Cheapest grade DC motor, such as one extracted from power drill - might not give satisfying performance
  • Motor with very high voltage, such as 200 VAC AC servo motor - it will work if it has incremental encoder feedback, but maximum rotation speed is limited due to drive voltage.

Demo

See a short demo of running various motors with the popular Mach3 CNC software:


The IONI advantage

  • Simplified wiring & software configuration work
  • Effortless upgrade from stepper based system to servo motors with minimal changes (utilizing existing step/dir control)
  • Expandability - add more axis as needed, up to 32 by chaining IONICUBES
  • Serviceability - replacing a drive is doable in less than a minute
  • Industrial grade performance - this drive seconds to nothing when it's compared to it's peers
  • Low heating - even with highest loads, a fan cooling is sufficient and with low loads, passive cooling will do
  • Reliability - IONI bas been ruggedized against: output short circuit, supply voltage error, over temperature and ESD

Perks

2, 3 or 4 Axis IONI Pro Kit

Build a machine of 2, 3 or 4 motor axis with ease. The kit consists 2, 3 or 4 IONI Pro drives and a IONICUBE motherboard (More info) and a SMV2USB adapter (SMV2USB) needed for software based configuration.

to carry up to four IONI drives and provide user friendly terminals and connectors. The four axis design is especially suitable for multiaxis systems such as PC controlled CNC machines. 

Early bird perks are already in stock waiting for shipment.


1 Axis IONI Pro Kit

This kit includes one piece of IONI Pro drive, IONICUBE 1X and SimpleMotion V2 USB adapter. Estimated shipment happens between April-May 2015 (as soon as we get IONICUBE 1X's from fab).

Drive configuration

Drive needs wiring and software configuration to start operating. The wiring guide is work-in-progress but will be online in the Wiki before product deliveries. The configuration involves parameterization and motor tuning through freely downloadable Granity software.


About us & Project status

Project has been planned in conjunction with open community of openservodrive.com and the device design has been made by a Finnish Granite Devices company. Granite Devices has eight year experience of servo motor drives and motor controls of this kind. See our earlier motor controller product portfolio.

The development of IONI began one year ago and it has now passed all the prototyping and hardware design work. The firmware & software side of IONI is also complete, however few of the planned advanced features are still under development. IONI has user upgradeable firmware, so as soon as the new features are finished, they become available for download.

Craftmanship

Yes, you will be receiving a fully finished design with all the rough corners of prototypes made within one year prototyping period smoothed out. IONI has been built on a 6 layer circuit board with double thickness (70 um) copper layers for more efficient cooling of on-board power electronics.

During the prototyping we found IONI to exceed our power capability expectations, so we bumped from PCI-E 4X connector to PCI-E 8X in order to favor higher currents.



Risks & Challenges - please read

As the product is already there (except IONICUBE 1X at time of writing), there is no risk of not getting the item you paid for, nor getting sub-par quality. The largest remaining risk lies within the utilization of IONI. As these are not cars, you can't just jump in and turn the key. To successfully use IONI, user needs to understand the concepts servo motor / stepping motor control and how to wire everything together.

To overcome the installation difficulties, we are maintaining a Wiki dedicated for motor control and user guides with step-by-step instructions. The Wiki is written to cover the basic knowledge and installation in the typical use cases.  The Wiki is constantly expanded to cover the most frequently asked questions we are getting.

story:
Short Summary

I'm Beth, and here is my story!

I'm a 25 year old single mom whose life was almost taken and was changed forever at the hands of another driver. My parents had gotten me a massage for my very first Mother's Day. I had turned my phone off, and was excited to relax for the first time in months after taking care of my prematurely born son. I was going the speed limit on a high way and another driver didn't like that.

This vehicle tailgated me so close that I could see he had gauges in his ear lobes. He then proceeded to swerve around me as I was trying to get into a slower lane of traffic to let him pass. It should have ended right there. But it didn't. 

His rage was so overpowering and he wanted to "teach me a lesson" so badly, that he purposely and forcefully hard-slammed on his brakes. I, thank the Lord, saw his brake lights in time to swerve and miss hitting his vehicle, but was unable to regain control of my vehicle. I ended up crossing two lanes of high way traffic and flying through the air into the median in which my vehicle rolled 4 times (according to witnesses). Long story not-so-short: the driver drove away, however, witnesses got his plate number. A State Trooper tracked this man down and asked him if he saw me rolling. The man replied "Yeah, I saw her, and that's what she gets!". 

This was the weekend of Mother's Day. It was my first Mother's Day. I'm a single mom. I had a very well displayed "Baby On Board" sticker on my now pancaked vehicle. This man said that I got what I deserved because I was going 65 mph in a 65 mph speed limit zone on my way to celebrate my first Mother's Day with a massage my parents bought for me. A complete stranger wanted me dead and my child orphaned because of something that took two seconds of his time on the high way. Two seconds. My life will never be the same because of two seconds.

With all of that being said, I would like to, and for my own emotional well-being I need to, start/help with/coordinate be a part of some kind of anti road rage campaign!!! I know road rage happens on a daily, hourly, minute to minute basis and that this is a HUGE problem that can be worsened or lessened all in two seconds. 

I would be honored if I could help save just one life from being ruined forever, like mine has.


What We Need & What You Get

I am on a CRUSADE and I won't stop until I make a difference and save lives!! I intend to make bumper stickers, t-shirts, educational materials, etc. I will collaborate with State Highway Departments, as well as Police Departments, driving schools to get the word out that this IS a problem and people DO die!

I do have medical bills that I have been getting collection calls for, but I would ONLY use this fund if I get OVER my goal!

The Impact

Together we can save lives!!! I am so thankful that I am alive from this horrific experience, not only so that my son can have a mother, but so that I can stop this from happening again! Let's STOP Aggressive Driving and save lives!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

Money is only money- I'm a single mom, I know that for a fact! Monetary donations are always appreciated, but please, you can do SO much more even by having a conversation! Just think, in two seconds my life (and car) were flipped upside down & all around, you can take two seconds and TALK to your family, friends, and teach your kids about Aggressive Driving.


Be a role model on the roads and within your own vehicle. If you see someone flying up behind you, get out of their way. Let them pass. It's not worth it. Trust me!

BREATHE! Take TWO SECONDS and BREATHE!  If you find yourself in a stressful situation on the road, please just breathe. Road rage happens every day! It makes the vehicles involved weapons that could kill any one on the road at any given time.

Together, let's SAVE LIVES!

story:
Our Story


The Oregon Manifest is an annual competition that encourages builders from around the country to create the 'ultimate modern utility bike'. This year, designers and builders have teamed up, and student teams are competing as well. 



Our team, representing California College of the Arts, is striving to make a bike that can serve the individual in new ways. Using natural composites, traditional framebuilding techniques, and modular designs, we aim to create a bike that assists its rider in a multitude of ways. 


The Impact

Bicycles are viewed as a means of transportation: A cost effective, quick, and healthy way to reach a destination. Our concept for the Oregon Manifest takes this idea and pushes it a step further. The adaptable and transformable storage structures of the bike yield an effective means to take various services on the road. Food, for example can be stored, organized, prepared, and sold all off of the bike.


Natural fiber composites, an alternative to carbon fiber, are a large part of what makes this bike special. Carbon composites are becoming more and more standard in the bicycle world. This technology has enhanced the performance capabilities of cycling, and is becoming more accessible by the day. Seeing the performance benefits of carbon, we are investigating how natural composites can be used to benefit the riding experience without the ecological repercussions. 


After our bike is constructed and designed around our standard of practicality, sustainability, and efficiency, it will be tested at the Oregon Manifest. Our bike must race a long route involving hills, on and off-road terrain, and various loads on the bike to realize and push its limits. With this race in mind,  we have designed, and are constructing, a bike that will meet the demands of anyone who uses it.



What We Need & What You Get


Revolutionizing the utility aspects of cycling isn't cheap. We are looking for all the help we can get to cover costs of tubing, components, natural fiber materials, prototyping, Brass and Silver (for construction) among other cost variables that make this project expensive. 


The team has spent many hours designing, prototyping, and pushing this idea forward, and we need your help to make the best finished product possible. We have the designs, skill, and knowledge to make this bike a reality; your help and support are what's necessary to take this bike off the page and make it real. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Please pass this on to any one you know. Our success could greatly benefit and change the way cycling is viewed, and give many a new resource to support whatever it is they do in life.


Thank you.


For More information about the competition, visit www.oregonmanifest.com

story:
Electrify Life

Zoom Electric Scooters USA – featured on ABC and CNBC – designs and crafts the coolest electric scooters at unbeatable prices. Assembled in California and featuring cutting-edge technology, safety features, and alarm systems, Zoom Electric Moped Scooters will transform your life in the city!

 

FREE SHIPPING

 

 

Optional Zoom Trailer

 

 

We have transformed many lives already! 

Are you ready to join the revolution?

Tesla owner loves his awesome Zoom Electric Scooter

Zoom delivery to local LA customers

 

 

 

 

 

 

RIDE POWERFULLY

Amazing torque and acceleration with Zoom's 1500W motor/30mph speed (varies depending on local regulations).  Advanced regenerative braking from motor provides extra range and safety.

 

RIDE SAFELY

Cross drilled hydraulic disc brakes front and back for impressive stopping power, regenerative braking for added safety, durable tubeless tires for awesome traction and easy repair, loud digital horn, and super bright LED front and back lights for added safety.

 

"Lighting on the scooter is impressive. It has a daytime running lamp, with accent circles around the headlights like many late-model cars. Inside the circles are high beams and low beams, allowing the scooter to operate at night safely."

 

RIDE COMFORTABLY

Wide and amply padded seat for 2 passengers, front and rear suspension, upfront sitting position provides an awesome smooth ride.

"Combined with the heavily-cushioned seat, everything but a big pothole is going to feel like almost nothing. Comfort is definitely the goal with these, and Zoom did an excellent job."

 

RIDE FREELY

72 v /1.5 KWH BATTERY PROVIDES THE LONGEST RANGE IN CLASS AND ELIMINATES RANGE ANXIETY, US BASED PROFESSSIONAL SERVICE AND SUPPORT TEAM, AND BEST-IN-CLASS DURABILITY AND RELIABILITY

"One important thing to point out is that this scooter isn’t built like a toy. It’s got a lot of plastic, but it’s thick, heavy, durable plastic. Nothing on the vehicle feels like it’s going to break or fail, or that I have to be careful with it. This is a real scooter for real trips."

 

ADVANCED METRICS LCD DISPLAY

Easy-to-read speedometer displays speed, battery level, trip miles, temperature, and more.

 

VERSATILE STORAGE SPACE

Spacious locking trunk provides ample space for a half face helmet, groceries, or a briefcase.

 

PROPRIERTARY ZOOM FIGURE "8" LIGHT 

Advanced LED headlights & back lights provide beautiful look & strong lighting for added safety.  The number 8 also carries good fortune and longevity in many cultures.

 

SMART SECURITY SYSTEM

Anti theft system features motion sensitive alarm siren and advanced motor immobilizer.

 

USB PHONE CHARGER, CUP HOLDER, BAG HOOK

Extra convenience and user friendly features greatly improve your riding experience.

 

OPTIONAL LUGGUAGE RACK

Steel extension rack and storage box offers amazing versatility and delivery capabilities

 

 

**Specifications and measurements are based on our best estimates; they can vary slightly.

 

EARN CASH REWARDS BY SHARING

Click on the link below to earn 6% of contributions from your own referral link:

https://zoom-usa-the-coolest-long.kickbooster.me/boost

 

 

ZOOM WARRANTY

This warranty applies only to products, parts, & components (hereafter PRODUCTS) that have been manufactured, assembled, or sold in new condition by ZOOM.

This warranty applies only to replacement/repair of PRODUCTS in case of a manufacturing flaw in materials or workmanship, in accordance with the Scope of Warranty Service, and subject to any and all exclusions, limitations, and procedures explained below.

This warranty is not transferable in any way and may not be exercised by anyone other than the original retail buyer (hereafter BUYER) of the PRODUCTS, only if the BUYER has retained constant ownership of the PRODUCTS since their original purchase of the PRODUCTS and only to PRODUCTS purchased in new condition either.

Battery packs are covered for a period of 1 year on manufacturer defects only. We DO NOT cover wear and tear or USAGE on your battery.

Scooters frames are covered by a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects.

Mechanical components are covered by a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects.

For all PRODUCTS, this warranty expires 1 year from the date the PRODUCTS were delivered to the BUYER unless excluded from warranty or otherwise voided from coverage under warranty.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED.  We stand behind all our products and your satisfaction is our goal!  Our customers love their Zoom Scooters. But If you don't like your scooter for any reason, you can return it within 7 days of receiving it.  You just need to pack it in the original package and pay for the shipping cost.   Very simple! 

Before using this product, please check and follow local regulations for possible requirements for license, registration, and insurance.  “YOUR INSURANCE POLICIES MAY NOT PROVIDE COVERAGE FOR ACCIDENTS INVOLVING THE USE OF THIS SCOOTER. TO DETERMINE IF COVERAGE IS PROVIDED YOU SHOULD CONTACT YOUR INSURANCE COMPANY OR AGENT.”  Thank you and ride safely! By purchasing this product, the buyer agrees that the manufacturer or reseller is not liable for incidental or consequential loss or damage due directly or indirectly to the use of this product.  Some parts are imported.  There may be slight variations on body panels and rims due to frequent updates.

NO REFUNDS WILL BE MADE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS.

 

 

SHIPPING AVAILABLE ONLY TO THE UNITED STATES (HONULULU, HI  INCLUDED; ALASKA EXCLUDED), EXCLUDING ANY RELEVANT TAXES. PLEASE SEE REWARD FOR DETAILS ON THE SHIPPING COST THAT APPLIES TO YOU.

We are currently planning to ship the Zoom in March 2020.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

 

Want to help Zoom grow? Just 15 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs the Zoom around town or out in the country!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product! Together we will make the world greener 1 mile at a time.  We can't do this without you.

By backing now, you will help shape and speed up the future of green mobility!  You’ll also get to own one of the Newest and upgraded Zoom Electric Scooters off  the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.  Together we will make the world greener 1 mile at a time!
story_txt:
Electrify Life
Zoom Electric Scooters USA – featured on ABC and CNBC – designs and crafts the coolest electric scooters at unbeatable prices. Assembled in California and featuring cutting-edge technology, safety features, and alarm systems, Zoom Electric Moped Scooters will transform your life in the city!
 

FREE SHIPPING


 

 

Optional Zoom Trailer
 
 
We have transformed many lives already! 
Are you ready to join the revolution?






Tesla owner loves his awesome Zoom Electric Scooter

Zoom delivery to local LA customers

 






 

 
 


 
 
RIDE POWERFULLY

Amazing torque and acceleration with Zoom's 1500W motor/30mph speed (varies depending on local regulations).  Advanced regenerative braking from motor provides extra range and safety.
 
RIDE SAFELY

Cross drilled hydraulic disc brakes front and back for impressive stopping power, regenerative braking for added safety, durable tubeless tires for awesome traction and easy repair, loud digital horn, and super bright LED front and back lights for added safety.
 
"Lighting on the scooter is impressive. It has a daytime running lamp, with accent circles around the headlights like many late-model cars. Inside the circles are high beams and low beams, allowing the scooter to operate at night safely."
 
RIDE COMFORTABLY
Wide and amply padded seat for 2 passengers, front and rear suspension, upfront sitting position provides an awesome smooth ride.
"Combined with the heavily-cushioned seat, everything but a big pothole is going to feel like almost nothing. Comfort is definitely the goal with these, and Zoom did an excellent job."
 
RIDE FREELY

72 v /1.5 KWH BATTERY PROVIDES THE LONGEST RANGE IN CLASS AND ELIMINATES RANGE ANXIETY, US BASED PROFESSSIONAL SERVICE AND SUPPORT TEAM, AND BEST-IN-CLASS DURABILITY AND RELIABILITY

"One important thing to point out is that this scooter isn’t built like a toy. It’s got a lot of plastic, but it’s thick, heavy, durable plastic. Nothing on the vehicle feels like it’s going to break or fail, or that I have to be careful with it. This is a real scooter for real trips."
 

ADVANCED METRICS LCD DISPLAY
Easy-to-read speedometer displays speed, battery level, trip miles, temperature, and more.
 

VERSATILE STORAGE SPACE
Spacious locking trunk provides ample space for a half face helmet, groceries, or a briefcase.
 


PROPRIERTARY ZOOM FIGURE "8" LIGHT 
Advanced LED headlights & back lights provide beautiful look & strong lighting for added safety.  The number 8 also carries good fortune and longevity in many cultures.
 

SMART SECURITY SYSTEM
Anti theft system features motion sensitive alarm siren and advanced motor immobilizer.
 

USB PHONE CHARGER, CUP HOLDER, BAG HOOK
Extra convenience and user friendly features greatly improve your riding experience.
 

OPTIONAL LUGGUAGE RACK
Steel extension rack and storage box offers amazing versatility and delivery capabilities
 

 

**Specifications and measurements are based on our best estimates; they can vary slightly.
 
EARN CASH REWARDS BY SHARING
Click on the link below to earn 6% of contributions from your own referral link:

https://zoom-usa-the-coolest-long.kickbooster.me/boost
 
 
ZOOM WARRANTY
This warranty applies only to products, parts, & components (hereafter PRODUCTS) that have been manufactured, assembled, or sold in new condition by ZOOM.
This warranty applies only to replacement/repair of PRODUCTS in case of a manufacturing flaw in materials or workmanship, in accordance with the Scope of Warranty Service, and subject to any and all exclusions, limitations, and procedures explained below.
This warranty is not transferable in any way and may not be exercised by anyone other than the original retail buyer (hereafter BUYER) of the PRODUCTS, only if the BUYER has retained constant ownership of the PRODUCTS since their original purchase of the PRODUCTS and only to PRODUCTS purchased in new condition either.
Battery packs are covered for a period of 1 year on manufacturer defects only. We DO NOT cover wear and tear or USAGE on your battery.
Scooters frames are covered by a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects.
Mechanical components are covered by a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects.
For all PRODUCTS, this warranty expires 1 year from the date the PRODUCTS were delivered to the BUYER unless excluded from warranty or otherwise voided from coverage under warranty.

story:
That's it.

All AMXs are delivered to all 1300+ backers.

We endured countless challenges including; the global pandemic, BREXIT, a Suez canal incident, and huge company growth and learning. We even managed to give it some serious upgrades along the way. The result speaks for itself:

 

 
We'd like to take a moment to thank every one of our backers that joined us on this incredible journey.
 
We couldn't have done it without you!
 
 

 

From Analog Motion, who brought you the AM1 in 2018, comes the AMX, designed to eke the most out of city living. It launched on Indiegogo in September, smashed the campaign goal in 16 hours, and went on to 1500% funded with over 600 backers. The team have continued to push the AMX and get it in the hands of as many people as possible.

In the hands of reviewer, Nick from Engadget;

“It was enormous fun to ride I instantly started grinning as, with barely any effort, I soared past lycra-clad cyclists in London's Victoria Park.”

It delighted crowds at CycleShow UK and EUROBIKE, the biggest bike show in the world. The results from test rides were incredible, with riders delighted by the power and responsiveness of the ride, and shocked at just how lightweight and manoeuvrable the AMX is.

Product Designers Nav & Jack created Analog Motion to solve the everyday problem of living in cities; commuting. The goal was to deliver practical solutions to modern transport, allowing people to move through their city faster, easier and more efficiently than ever before. The AMX is the ultimate solution. It's powerful, beautiful and most-importantly; accessible.

It has been designed to deliver a ride that takes all the pain out of commuting, ensuring you arrive at your destination relaxed and with a smile on your face.



The philosophy of the AMX is simple, it delivers a powerful electric assist and premium features whilst the lightweight design and rear hub motor allows for a natural cycling experience. The AMX is the result of a reductive design process that does away with over-engineered and under-utilised specs and instead provides simple, elegant functionality. It has a detachable battery that can be charged at your desk, a lightweight motor for smooth and consistent power, and the weight is almost half that of many electric bikes on the market.

The AMX is our next generation of e-bike. The design has been refined using the experience and customer feedback obtained in successfully delivering over 500 bikes in our initial crowdfunding campaign, and the manufacturing and fulfilment know-how learned during the process. It provides more power, speed and comfort, and includes some industry-leading features at an even more impressive price point.

 


POWERFUL

The 250W rear-wheel drive allows us to keep the traditional frame design of the bike. It gives you the boost that you need simply by pedalling. The motor has zero resistance allowing the bike to ride exactly like a regular bike when powered down ⚡️


CITY-PROOF

180mm disc brakes make sure the AMX stops as well as it goes, come rain or shine. Bigger tyres will make every road surface feel smooth and save you from unnecessary stress! The integrated lights (Add-on) will keep you visible day or night. Add mudguards (Add-on) and your AMX will conquer any urban conditions.


LIGHTWEIGHT

The AMX is light, weighing around 15kg when shared bikes (like Uber JUMP) are in excess of 25kg! This makes the AMX feel fast, agile and still easy to carry up a flight of stairs ☁️


Who needs complicated suspension when you ride mainly on the road? The 2" wide tyres provide 30% more comfort on rough roads than traditional suspension.



Belt drive is perfect for commuting thanks to the low maintenance and lubrication-free benefits. It runs smoother, quieter, and has a much longer life than metal bicycle chains. It's the ultimate upgrade for those who refuse to compromise.

Our Limited Edition frames come in a choice of two unique and exclusive paint colours; Deep Blue and Pearl White. Both come with some exquisite extra details on the frame to ensure that it stands out from the crowd.

 

Get an AMX today!

 

Introducing the AMX MINI

Back in 2016, we set out to create the best looking, lightest, ebike and we did. You wanted more, the AMX gives you more. But some wanted… less?

That’s right. Bikes are not small. The AMX is already a compact 28” wheel ebike but its still 178cm from wheel to wheel. That’s as long as a 2-seater sofa. So what’s smaller than 28"? 20”. The AMX MINI is a new concept in bike design: A small bike for big cities.

 
 

Ultra-compact. 138cm from wheel to wheel. That’s smaller than most folding electric bikes on the market today. Easy to carry into your flat or throw into your boot.

Beautiful. Designing a small ebike is easy. Designing a small ebike that still looks good? Now that’s a challenge. The AMX MINI is inspired by the Mini-Velos ubiquitous in Japan. We’ve added as little as possible to make a bike that does everything.

Ultra-lightweight. Sub-13kg.  This is lighter than most non-electric bikes!

One size. A bike that fits anyone!

27-mile range. Don’t let its size fool you, it's still good for a proper ride.

Powerful. Small wheels and a high torque motor is a potent combo. The AMX MINI accelerates like no other and begs to be thrashed.
 

The Limited Edition (LE) is the AMX without compromise. Gates Carbon Drive ensures a maintenance-free, quieter drivetrain. Fitted with Schwalbe Big Apple tyres to lap-up uneven terrain. For the extra smile-on-face factor, the LE has a 15% power boost in high assist mode. The LE comes with stealth black hardware and can be specified in one of two limited paint colours: Deep Blue or Pearl White. Both boast exquisite graphic detailing on the fork and are limited to this campaign only. When they're gone, they're gone. RRP £1789

 

The MINI is the model for the all-rounder. With bigger 38C tyres, it will easily lap-up uneven terrain. Fitted with disc brakes for maximum braking and a 15% power boost in high-assist mode. The MINI is available in Carbon Black with black hardware. RRP £1599 [SOLD OUT]

Stealth Display

  • The most minimal ebike display possible
  • Stealthy when powered down
  • Speed, Odometer, Assist Level, Top Speed, Average Speed, Battery Meter displayed
  • IPx65 CE ROHS
  • Waterproof, Dustproof, Life-proof
     

250W Hub Motor

  • 250W Hub Motor
  • Lightweight and compact
  • Sealed and maintenance-free
  • Ultra-quiet
     

Advanced ALU frame

  • Aircraft-grade 6061 Aluminium
  • Premium welding process
  • Ultra-smooth aesthetic
  • Lightweight
  • Engineered for durability and strength
     

Integrated Electronics

  • Integrated motor controller
  • Hidden cabling
  • Stealth display
  • Minimal connectors
     

Disc Brakes

  • 180mm Tektro E-brakes
  • Sharp responsive braking
  • Fantastic all-season performance
     

Tyre Options for Everyone

  • Schwalbe 2.0" Big Apple tyres give ultimate comfort and stability over all terrain
  • Kenda 38C Tan-wall tyres give great city performance and provide low rolling resistance
     

USB-C Charging (Add-on option*)

  • Charge your devices on-the-go with your AMX Battery
  • High power USB-C PD (45w) charging
  • Can charge laptops, tablets and smartphones
  • Compact and lightweight
     

Integrated Lighting(Add-on option*)

  • Ultra-bright LED
  • Integrated - no need to power your lights separately
  • Stealth rear light
  • Controlled via the Display
     

36V 44km (27-mile) Extended Range Battery (Add-on option*)

  • High power (36V, 7Ah)
  • 44km (27-mile) range
  • Same dimensions as the 32km (20-mile) battery
     


* Add-on options are available on Backerkit.

If you have any questions or need any support regarding your AMX, please check our helpdocs in the link below:

https://analogmotion.helpdocs.io/category/pjch6z1g5u-amx-user-manual-and-assembly-guide

Last year, we launched the AM1 ebike and delivered it to backers all around the world. Thanks to your support, the team continues to grow. The new core team has been working extra hard to bring you the AMX. 

Follow us on social media

The AMX is the latest electric bike from Analog Motion, the team that brought you the AM1 in 2018. It's been an amazing year. Now, AM1s are being ridden all over the world and our riders ❤️ it. But don’t take our word for it:

"Now the AM1 exists in its final form. They made it. They delivered loads. Others are in a shop right now. Everyone pulled through and promises were kept. There's one right here that came in the post. It's a Kickstarter story that didn't fall apart in acrimony and failure."
Gizmodo

“It may look like a regular bike, but the AM1+ packs some powerful electric features beneath the surface”
Mashable

"I‘m proud to say that the AM1 is really worth the money. It‘s easy to assemble, easy to ride, absolutely solid quality and the motor is the ultra plus. It‘s really fun to get assisted by its power, but not necessary to use the motor because the bike rides like a normal single speed. I would buy this bike over and over again."
AM1 Backer #576

We refused to compromise on the quality of the AM1 and it shows. At Analog Motion HQ we receive realtime notifications each time a new review is written. Nothing brings us more joy than reading them. Below is a small selection of the hundreds of reviews you've written for us and we can't thank you enough.

We've learned so much during our previous crowdfunding. Some things went smoothly, others didn't. Who knew customs clearance could take 4 weeks? Who knew shipping lithium batteries would be so complicated? We embraced the challenge and emerged victorious.

We're a team of designers, engineers and problem solvers and we're always developing new products to bring into the world, with your backing we can make the AMX a reality.

Our prototypes are ready. Our manufacturing partner is ready. We're ready.

 

The AMX encompasses new processes; smooth welds, electronic integration, high power batteries, sliding drop-outs, tapered headsets. If these words mean something to you, you'll know how exciting it is that the AMX boasts all of them. If you don't know what these words mean, fear not; we do and they make the AMX awesome.

After the success of the AM1 we've fostered strong mutual relationships with our supply chain. That means we have more control over the production process, can experiment more with new manufacturing techniques and further increase quality, consistency and long term reliability.

 

We really hope you like the AMX and we're excited to have you join this next adventure!

From all the team

 

 

Disclaimers

 

Payment: Tier prices above reflect the cost for the perk before taxes and duties, as these will need to be calculated based on your location prior to delivery. By dealing with this prior to shipping the AMX can be ‘delivered duty paid’ (DDP) to most countries. This allows it to clear customs smoothly on arrival which prevents hold-ups and admin charges at the border. You will be contacted prior to shipment to arrange the final balance to ensure your delivery goes as smoothly as possible.

 

Assembly: Our target is to provide the majority of backers in mainstream locations with bikes in a largely-assembled manner, with some final assembly required.

Let's be frank; bikes are a great way to get around town, but they are a challenging size and shape to transport internationally. Add to that, battery shipping regulations, oversized carton charges from couriers and duties which vary by country and depending on the level of assembly of the product, you can see how delivering bikes internationally takes planning and careful consideration

As we approach the time to ship AMXs, we will assess the most appropriate method to get bikes to every single one of you. This may involve regional fulfilment centres, third-country assembly, airmail, sea freight… Our decision will be chosen to provide the best solution for you so as to maximise the customer experience and minimise the taxes, duties, and shipping times

 

Battery life: Durations given are based on a 75kg rider using a medium level of assist. Actual battery life will vary based on a number of factors including; rider weight, effort contributed, wind, elevation and external temperature.

Many of our AM1 riders have reported experiencing a much higher range than what was quoted, but we prefer to lean on the side of caution. And regardless, very few of us ever need to go as far as 20 miles on a single charge; when you do, the touring pack or a Spare Battery get you there :)

 

Production: All AMX models in this campaign are production samples made using the manufacturers and supply chain we have in place. There may be some changes, modifications or improvements made to the scaled manufactured version which will be shipping to all backers.

The AMX encompasses new processes; smooth welds, electronic integration, high power batteries, sliding drop-outs, tapered headsets. If these words mean something to you, you'll know how exciting it is that the AMX boasts all of them. If you don't know what these words mean, fear not; we do and they make the AMX awesome.

After the success of the AM1 we've fostered strong mutual relationships with our supply chain. That means we have more control over the production process, can experiment more with new manufacturing techniques and further increase quality, consistency and long term reliability.

 
We really hope you like the AMX and we're excited to have you join this next adventure!From all the team


 
 
Disclaimers
 
Payment: Tier prices above reflect the cost for the perk before taxes and duties, as these will need to be calculated based on your location prior to delivery. By dealing with this prior to shipping the AMX can be ‘delivered duty paid’ (DDP) to most countries. This allows it to clear customs smoothly on arrival which prevents hold-ups and admin charges at the border. You will be contacted prior to shipment to arrange the final balance to ensure your delivery goes as smoothly as possible.
 
Assembly: Our target is to provide the majority of backers in mainstream locations with bikes in a largely-assembled manner, with some final assembly required.
Let's be frank; bikes are a great way to get around town, but they are a challenging size and shape to transport internationally. Add to that, battery shipping regulations, oversized carton charges from couriers and duties which vary by country and depending on the level of assembly of the product, you can see how delivering bikes internationally takes planning and careful consideration
As we approach the time to ship AMXs, we will assess the most appropriate method to get bikes to every single one of you. This may involve regional fulfilment centres, third-country assembly, airmail, sea freight… Our decision will be chosen to provide the best solution for you so as to maximise the customer experience and minimise the taxes, duties, and shipping times
 
Battery life: Durations given are based on a 75kg rider using a medium level of assist. Actual battery life will vary based on a number of factors including; rider weight, effort contributed, wind, elevation and external temperature.Many of our AM1 riders have reported experiencing a much higher range than what was quoted, but we prefer to lean on the side of caution. And regardless, very few of us ever need to go as far as 20 miles on a single charge; when you do, the touring pack or a Spare Battery get you there :)
 
Production: All AMX models in this campaign are production samples made using the manufacturers and supply chain we have in place. There may be some changes, modifications or improvements made to the scaled manufactured version which will be shipping to all backers.

story:
VIEW IN: DEUTSCH  FRANÇAIS  ESPAÑOL  NEDERLANDS  ITALIANO

Today, we are introducing the all-new NGT and M+; two smart electric scooters that bring you the perfect balance of speed and range. Since all of our scooters are connected, you can check things like location, estimated riding range, and even anti-theft alerts straight from your phone.

 

 

Today’s launch is no rehearsal for us; we’ve been designing and building smart electric scooters since 2015. In just three short years, our scooters have clocked more than 1 billion kilometers across the globe.

The NGT is our most powerful scooter. The NGT has a 3kW Bosch motor that cranks out a top speed of 70km/h, and a range of well over 100 km thanks to its 2-removable Panasonic batteries. You can easily drive all week on just a single charge of your two batteries. 

The NPro is the addition you were all asking for. It is an NGT that is capped at 45 km/h. No other differences, exactly the same specs. So in countries like Germany, you only need a car license to drive it, NOT a motorbike license. You asked, we listened.

The M+ is the newest model in our M-Series: winner of 5+ International Design Awards. It’s sexy, practical and built for 2 riders. The M+ effortlessly zips around urban streets, boulevards and alleys at 45 km/h with a real city riding range of well over 100 km.

The NGT and M+ are both equipped with industry-leader BOSCH brushless hub mounted 3kW and 1.2kW motors respectively. The BOSCH 3kW motor easily accelerates up to 70 km/h.

The NGT and M+ are electrified by our Panasonic Lithium-ion removable battery packs. The NGT has two removable batteries (2 x 60v35aH), and the M+ has one removable battery (1x 48v42aH). At under 14/11 kg respectively, you can easily carry the battery into your home and charge it in any standard wall outlet, just like your computer.

The NGT and M+ have an on-board computer that constantly communicates with the cloud so you can view real-time data on your smart phone like GPS, recent rides, and even anti-theft alerts. We also provide regular Over The Air Updates (OTA) that gets you the most updated software for your scooter.  

The NGT comes standard with CBS for safe-braking at high speeds. Both the NGT and M+ come equipped with regenerative EBS braking, which effectively adds around 5% more range on a single charge.

Our campaign is a little different than what you are typically accustomed to on Indiegogo, as we will only be taking a €100 deposit today, and the full and final payment will be made at the store you choose to pick-up your scooter at in January when we make delivery.

During our 30-day campaign here on Indiegogo you can make a €100 deposit for the NGT, NPro, or the M+.  This €100 deposit will get you a discount off the 2019 retail price. By making a deposit today you will save €300 on the M+, and €500 on the NGT and NPro when you pick it up at the store.

*The suggested retail price of €2599 and €4499 is based on a 19% Value Added Tax.

So from now until October 26th we will be taking  your €100 deposit for the scooter of your choice. Within a few days after the campaign on Indiegogo finishes you will receive an email from us to 1) Select the color of scooter you would like and 2) Select the store/dealer you will pick-up and make your final payment for your scooter.

As a token of your support, the first 3000 backers will receive an exclusive gift package worth €300+, containing the following:

1x Helmet case stand // 1x Back Rest //  1x Phone Holder

 1x Scooter Rain Cover // 1x Winter Leg Cover // 3 Years Data Service

CLICK HERE FOR IMAGES OF THE ACCESSORIES

 

Over the past three years we have been covered around the world from Forbes to TechCrunch to Auto Bild and many more. Google and Youtube search NIU to read and watch the reviews...

 

Cities are there to be explored, and we’re providing an awesome mobility solution to #unlockyourcity.  We are all about changing your daily commute, where you can park, where and how you can charge, and even how you re-experience your city for the first time on a silent ride.

NIU technology is making congestion and traffic problems of the past. Start your day with a fun commute that saves money, time and even helps the environment.

Urban parking is always stressful. As cities cut down on parking spaces, the practicality of owning a scooter makes finding a spot unnecessary. With NIU, you can park closer to your destination for little to no cost at all.

Our removable batteries allow you to charge your NIU any time you have access to a standard power outlet. With our all-new fast-charging batteries, you can be fully charged in just 3.5 hours.

Weighing in at less than 14 kg and 11 kg respectively, our NGT and M+ batteries are easy to carry to and from your scooter. You can charge at home, or charge at the office and your boss will be paying for your "electric gas".

When you ride a NIU, you will have a whole new connection with the city you live in; we call it “Niuvana”- it’s the sensation you have when riding electric and you can hear, feel, and see the city around you like you have never before.

 

                           

We’ve been working on NGT and M+ for over two years now. With your support, we will bring them worldwide by January 2019.  Within a few days after the campaign on Indiegogo finishes on October 26th you will receive an email from us to 1) Select the color of scooter you would like and 2) Select the store/dealer you will pick-up and make your final payment for your scooter.

All along the way you will get updates from our team to give you a status of update on the production, shipment, and arrival of your selected scooter.  Once the scooter arrives at your local store/dealer, you will receive an email from us to tell you it is time for pick-up. You will make your final payment, less the €100 deposit you paid here online.

Here is a list of stores that you can currently pick-up at...more coming online soon:

https://www.niu.com/en/niu-store-finder/

 

Since our launch, NIU has gone from an idea, to the #1 Smart Electric Scooter brand in the world. From Shanghai - Paris - Santiago, you can see NIU zipping around globally across cities.

Our success has come from the quality of our products and the commitment of our team. We’re lead by a group of innovators from the tech and design industries, and produce high-performing scooters that make you want to get out and see the world.

1. Will I pay the full price of the scooter on Indiegogo.com?

NO. At Indiegogo.com, you are required to pay a €100 deposit only. The remaining amount will be paid at your local dealer.

2. Will my €100 deposit be credited to the final price I have to pay?

YES. The €100 deposit will be credited toward the final price. So, when you pick up your scooter at the dealer in January you will pay the discounted price less €100.

(e.g. The M+ at €2.299*, you will pay at the store €2.299* - €100 = €2.199*)

3. Will I be able to get my deposit back?

YES. The deposit is refundable until October 26th included.

4. Where and when will I pay the remaining payment for the scooter?

Once the scooter is delivered in January 2019, you can pay the remaining payment at the dealer/store you selected.

5. What VAT will I have to pay?

The listed prices on our website and Indiegogo.com are based on a 19% VAT.

VAT’s vary by country so the final price in your country may be different. Please check with your local tax authorities. 

6. I don’t live in the EU, but I can see that you sell scooters in my country, what will the price be?

Your price will be based upon the direct conversion rate between the Euro and your currency. Please remember that VAT and Sales Tax may vary from EU taxes. Please check with your local tax authorities to confirm the final tax rate applicable for electric scooters. 

7. How will I get the €300 gift package?

The €300 gift package will be delivered with your scooter. The €300 gift package is only available for the first 3000 backers. 

8. When will I choose what color of scooter I want?

Once the pre-sale finishes on 26th October 2018, shortly after you will be sent an email that will allow you to choose your favorite color.

9. What colors are available for the NGT?

Black with red stripes

Black with white stripes

White with red stripes

10. What colors are available for the M+?

Blue

Grey

White

Red

Black with red stripes

11. When will I know where I can pick-up my scooter?

In mid-November you will be sent an email that will allow you to select a store/dealer near your home.

12. When will I be notified of what day I can pick-up my scooter?

Once the scooter has been shipped to your pick-up store, you will receive an email notification that your scooter will be ready for pick-up. We expect all pick-ups to be completed by the end of January 2019.

13. I looked on your website and cannot see a store in my country, will I be able to get a scooter?

It may be possible, but first please email us at hello@niu.com and we can give you the most up to date availability of planned delivery to your area in January 2019.

14. I looked on your website and I cannot see a store near me, will I be able to get a scooter?

It may be possible, but first please email us at hello@niu.com and we can give you the most up to date availability of planned delivery to your area in January 2019.

15. What warranty do you offer?

Our scooter’s battery, motor and charger are all backed by a 2-year warranty.

The FOC Controller, the Smart Controller, the Dashboard, the Indicators,  Front Light and the Rear Light are all backed by a 1-year warranty.

16. What differentiates your eScooters from the others?

NIUs are smart scooters. Each scooter is connected to the NIU cloud, which allows the riders to access their own data through our app and lets NIU provide over the air (OTA) firmware updates for your motor, battery, and user interface.

17. Can a NIU get me all the way to work?

The average journey for the urban commuter is less than 15 km at a speed under 50km/h. Our product is purpose-built for this type of trip and designed to give you a better alternative to cars and public transit.

18. How can I charge the battery?

You can either charge the battery while it is in the scooter, or take it out of the scooter and charge it using the Niu charger that can plug into any standard wall outlet. Charging a NIU scooter is as easy as charging your laptop computer.

19. How long does it take to be fully charged?

The battery fully charges in 3.5 hours.

20. How much weight do the N-GT and M+ support?

The N-GT can hold up to 200 kg, and the M+ can hold up to 150 kg.

21. How close are you to manufacturing?

We’ve been working on both The NGT and M+ for over two years now. With your support, we can bring them worldwide by January 2019.

22. Will there be continued support/updates for the App?

Yes! We will continue our work on the NIU App to bring you more integrations and support. We also provide regular Over The Air Updates (OTA) that gets you the most updated software for your scooter. 

23. Is NIU a company I can trust?

We have a two-year warranty on our products. We have over 500,000 scooters on the roads. We have over 1,000 points of sale globally. Therefore, if you have any issues, there will be either an online or local solution for you.

In just over 3 years, NIU has gone from an idea to a multi-continental organization. NIU now has a global network of retailers and our customers have driven over a billion kilometers on their NIU eScooters. We’ve grown so quickly because we build quality products that serve a real purpose, and are backed by a driven group of leaders from the tech and design industries.

24. Do I need a license to drive your scooter?

It depends on your local laws. Contact your ministry to transportation or any of our dealers that are listed on our website to learn more.

25. Do I need a helmet to drive your scooter?

It depends on your local laws. Contact your ministry of transportation with any inquiries.

26. Where can I test drive a scooter today?

You can request a test-drive of our models at your local NIU dealer. Find your nearest store here: https://www.niu.com/en/niu-store-finder/

We are also attending Intermot (Cologne, Germany), Mondiale and Autonomie (Paris) and EICMA (Milan) throughout October/November. Swing by for a test-drive!

27. Are there any online reviews of your products?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0A_9x57yvLM

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oQHNVsOxcww&amp...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cgC82UWFaEY

28. How much does it cost to charge?

All of our batteries cost less that €0.50 to charge fully.

29. Can I use a type C charger?

NO.

30. Where do I fix my scooter if it breaks?

Find your nearest NIU repair station at: https://www.niu.com/en/niu-store-finder/

31. Can I use another brand of battery?

NO. You will void your warranty if you use a third party battery.

 

Countries & Nations which can participate in Indiegogo Pre-Sale:

Europe/Scandinavia:

Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, England, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Italy, Malta, Netherlands, Romania, Slovakia, Sweden, Spain, Switzerland, Portugal.

Asia/Oceania

Israel (NGT only), Malaysia (M+ only),  South Korea, New Zealand.

Americas:

Chile, Mexico (NUUV), USA (pending)

story:
Please do Not donate any funds.


Cancelling Campaign,

  Only reason campaign still up, is not allowed to cancel it once a donation has been made. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0RNuOMuJ57k


Warning:   ayudos.com   is a scam

paid for campaign all others same day, this company nothing for a week, complamlned said they would get back, 2 weeks later, christmas target missed no campaign NO REFUND

CON MEN OR WORST SERVICE EVER. the campaigns only go for weeks, if your marketer has not acted in first 3 days, shitcan them and use someone else. AYUDOS IS A SCAM

Please do Not donate any funds.Cancelling Campaign, 
  Only reason campaign still up, is not allowed to cancel it once a donation has been made. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0RNuOMuJ57kWarning:   ayudos.com   is a scampaid for campaign all others same day, this company nothing for a week, complamlned said they would get back, 2 weeks later, christmas target missed no campaign NO REFUND CON MEN OR WORST SERVICE EVER. the campaigns only go for weeks, if your marketer has not acted in first 3 days, shitcan them and use someone else. AYUDOS IS A SCAM

story:
Versione Italiana        -       English version

Alla ciclofficina Ciclostile a Trento non si parla d'altro: qual è la migliore cargo-bike del reame? E' facile da capire perché ci si ponga il quesito: sono biciclette belle a modo loro, potrebbero essere il vero sostituto del furgone in città, sarebbero utili a quelli dei gruppi d'acquisto solidale  e tra i "ciclofficinari" è molto in voga il "cargo-biker!". Ma se ne compri una senza ragionarci e senza averle confrontarle tutte... beh non hai l'approccio tipico della ciclofficina. Anche perché non si tratta un acquisto poco impegnativo: una cargo bike economica costa minimo 1500 euro. Un progetto europeo ci aveva anticipato nel confronto (pgg 50 e ss).

Così è cominciata l'avventura: tra una chiacchiera e l'altra, ore di studi e di confronti; poi l'illuminazione! Nessuna di quelle in commercio è davvero adatta al trasporto merce in città.

Ne abbiamo disegnata una, diversa dal solito, col piano di carico posteriore e l'approccio sportivo; abbiamo contattato artigiani e produttori della zona pronti ad aiutarci con un unico obbiettivo: una cargo bike innovativa ed italiana! Il progetto ora c'è, ma abbiamo bisogno del sostegno di tutti per trasformarlo in realtà. Aiutaci a realizzare il nostro progetto, sostienici e aiutaci a collaudarla.

Le cargo bike hanno una lunga storia. Ma è nella città moderna che trovano il loro ambiente naturale. Oggi sono perfetti mezzi per il trasporto merci urbano e per la logistica di ultimo miglio. La miglior soluzione per il decongestionamento del traffico e per il miglioramento della qualità dell’aria e della vita in generale. Non solo. Come dimostra lo studio di Cyclelogistics il trasporto merci su cargo-bike è sicuramente più economico del classico fatto col comune furgoncino diesel.

L'Unione Europea punta a ridurre i trasporti su mezzi motorizzati di oltre il 50% sfruttando proprio le cargo bike (http://cyclelogistics.eu/index.php?id=12) .
Al momento però le cargo bike non sono abbastanza diffuse. 

Lo studio di Cyclologistic è esplicito: ad oggi la cargo perfetta, maneggevole e adatta al carico pesante ancora non è stata disegnata. Abbiamo provato a studiare le caratteristiche delle bici attualmente in commercio per capire se una struttura diversa potesse incrementarne l’efficienza e quindi la diffusione. 

La maggior parte delle bici da carico in commercio derivano da quelle nord-europee, progettate per muoversi con calma su strade pianeggianti e garantire al guidatore di avere sott'occhio il carico anche a discapito della guidabilità del mezzo.
Molte aziende, per mantenere il pianale di carico davanti al guidatore e garantire al contempo la stabilità, propongono un pianale molto basso. La bici però diventa lunga quasi due metri e mezzo! Non certo agile e maneggevole nel traffico!


Altre cargo bike sono le dirette pronipoti delle storiche bici da lavoro a tre ruote degli anni '20. Dotate di un ampio pianale poggiato su due ruote all'anteriore sono imbattibili nella capacità di carico. Ma assolutamente lente e inutilizzabili nel traffico cittadino di oggi!

Diversamente dalla percezione diffusa, il mercato delle cargo bike oggi è principalmente rivolto all’uso familiare e al trasporto dei bambini, per cui l’acquirente medio ha una forte preferenza per la visibilità del carico. 

Volendo invece pensare a un mezzo agevole nel traffico cittadino e nelle zone collinari che sia davvero competitivo rispetto ai furgoncini nella logistica last mile e, quindi, di reale interesse economico, abbiamo provato a immaginare la struttura della cargo bike in modo che il pianale di carico si trovi nella zona posteriore della bicicletta, sufficientemente in basso, che regali al mezzo una certa compattezza. 


La bici con il carro posteriore allungato ed il pianale di carico posteriore sopra la ruota non è una nostra invenzione. Aziende americane e tedesche le commercializzano già da qualche anno. Ma sono progettate molto spesso con geometrie rilassate. A guidarle la percezione è quella di una bici classica, comoda, ma non certo agile e veloce.

Il carico posteriore presenta un ulteriore vantaggio: non essendoci limiti legati alla visibilità e alle dimensioni del telaio, essa non presenta vincoli volumetrici al carico, rivelandosi quindi molto adatta al trasporto di qualsiasi genere di merce. Insomma, una bici manegevole, veloce, economica e in grado di portare in modo sicuro, ecologico e flessibile carichi fino a 150 kg!

La nostra cargo recupera le geometrie ed i comportamenti delle bici sportive. Non solo. Dalle bici sportive vorremmo ereditasse anche le tubazioni. Abbiamo spezzato le linee e rimpicciolito i triangoli per poter usare tubazioni in leghe leggere per bici da corsa.

Risultato in due parole: leggera ed agile. Ma ciò non vuol dire che sarà necessariamente scomoda: ogni esemplare sarà realizzato artigianalmente, perciò potrà essere realizzato su misura.

 Abbiamo sfruttato i nostri amici: pomeriggi a discutere con chi la cargo la utilizza tutti i giorni come bike messenger e con chi trasporta casse di frutta e verdura per i mercatini a km0. Ore e ore di bozzetti su carta prima e sui CAD poi. Ampi di battiti con telaisti. Lunghe in officina a discutere, scegliere, provare.
Ora siamo arrivati ad un progetto abbastanza definito e siamo ad un passo dal realizzarlo! 

Le idee ce le abbiamo, ma abbiamo bisogno del sostegno di tutti per trasformarle in realtà. Il tuo contributo può andare oltre il mero finanziamento:

Per realizzare la miglior cargobike abbiamo in mente un percorso innovativo in più fasi che necessita di un sostegno collettivo dal basso. Per partire ci servono per lo meno 2500 euro. E' questo infatti il costo effettivo che abbiamo preventivato per realizzare il primo prototipo. Se questa soglia non verrà raggiunta le vostre donazioni vi verranno restituite. Ma ciò vorrà dire che il vostro sforzo per sostenerci è stato vano. Non basta quindi un sostegno economico! Oltre a donare spargi la voce! dillo a tutti i tuoi amici! sostieni la mobilità alternativa!

Il telaio sarà realizzato per noi un artigiano della nostra zona e cercheremo di utilizzare componentistica (sella, manubrio,cerchi,...) per lo più di produzione italiana. Una scelta etica ed ecologica con un occhio all'economicità, alla funzionalità senza rinunciare alla qualità!

Una volta realizzato il primo prototipo comincerà la fase dei collaudi diffusi. Chiunque potrà diventare nostro collaudatore! Raccoglieremo le opinioni, le confronteremo e solo allora potremmo rivedere il nostro progetto che, grazie all'aiuto di tanti, sarà migliorato fino a diventare la cargo bike perfetta!

Ma speriamo di andare oltre:

Se raccogliamo almeno 4500 euro realizzeremo anche il secondo prototipo: questo nascerà già modificato secondo le indicazioni raccolte nella prima fase di test.


Se raccogliamo almeno 7000 euro realizzeremo tre prototipi e soprattutto, dopo la fase di test impronteremo in modo strutturale la rete di contatti che ci dovrebbe permettere di commercializzare in breve la nostra cargo bike collaudata ad un costo accessibile e concorrenziale mantenendo la produzione del telaio in Italia e l'assemblaggio di ruote e biciclette fatto direttamente da noi.

Le belle idee nascono solo nei gruppi più belli. Diverse ragazzi, diverse esperienze, diverse formazioni, tante passioni una in comune: la bicicletta! Ci siamo incontrati nella Ciclofficina Ciclostile di Trento e lì ci siamo confrontati tra la riparazione di una bici e un bicchiere in compagnia. Adesso dopo mesi di ragionamenti, bozzetti ed esperimenti casalinghi abbiamo deciso che il progetto è maturo per vedere la luce. Aiutaci anche tu!

Per meaggiori informazioni riguardanti il nostro progetto, metodi di pagamento e prospettive future scrivici a

officinaciclostile@gmail.com 

https://www.facebook.com/ciclostile.officinapopolare
https://www.facebook.com/longtailcargobike  





At Ciclostile Trento Bike kitchen we regularly debate; mirror mirror on the wall, what is the fairest cargo bike in the land of all? Why this is an issue is easy to understand. Cargo bikes are beautiful in their own way, they can substitute for trucks in urban traffic and, nowadays, cargo bikes are fashionable!  However, buying a cargo bike is not an easy purchase, it requires a lot of research into the current market, and a basic cargo bike would cost 1500 euros at least.
There is a European project called the Cyclologistic baseline study that has done an in depth comparison  before us making more or less the same considerations (pages 50-55). Some of its main points we use here to illustrate the value of cargo bikes.

The Trento bike kitchen approach, and the way we began: chatting, studying and comparing; then came the enlightenment! The perfect cargo bike for the urban freight transport is still yet to be designed!

So we have designed one. A long-tail bike with a sportive soul. We asked artisans and producers of small bike components from our region to help us and everyone is ready just to reach one target: building a new cargo bike, innovative and Italian! The project is done! Now we need everyone's help to turn it into reality. Help us to make our project a reality, sustain us and help us to test it!

Cargo bikes have a long history, though, the modern city are their natural environment. Nowadays, they represent the perfect solution for urban mobility and  modern freight transport logistics contributing directly to reduce congestion and pollution in today's cities.
The Cyclologistic baseline study determined that on average 51% of all motorized trips in European cities that involve the transport of goods could be shifted to bicycles or cargo bikes.

The study also shows that most goods' transport within cities is done by commercial lorries and states that it would be more efficient and cheaper if done by cargo bikes.
However, cargo bike usage is currently not widespread enough.

The Cyclologistic baseline study is explicit: “The perfect cargo bike and trike capable of handling heavy loads in continual use is still to be designed” We have  studied characteristics of bikes currently commercialized in order to understand how to improve their efficiency.

Nowadays, most of the cargo bikes hail from a Northern European design, suitable for riding slow along flat land, with front loading to keep an eye on your cargo. In order to have a stable bike and the cargo on the front, many companies produce cargo bikes with  a low loading bed. The downside is the length of the bike: about 2 meters and half, difficult to maneuver in traffic and not very agile!

Other cargo bikes are the direct descendants of the historical trikes of the early '20s. The bed is squared, big and robust supported on the two front wheels. Unbeatable in loading capacity, but slow moving and too large and clumsy for today's traffic congestion.

Despite what is the common perception, the cargo bike market is oriented mainly to family use and the transportation of children and pets. Therefore, average consumer have a strong preference for the visibility of the cargo.

We wanted to create a bike agile in heavy traffic, really competitive compared to small commercial trucks  and, therefore, really economically appealing. Therefore, we have endeavoured to design a cargo bike with the loading bed behind the rider,  low enough to give the bike a compact and agile ability while maintaining a desirable loading capacity.


The bike with a long rear triangle  and the loading bed on the rear wheel is not our invention. Some German and American companies have been producing them since the early '90s; they are called long tail bike.
They are designed with relaxed geometry. Riding one of them you feel as if you are riding a classical cruiser bike comfortable which is easy to ride but not agile and fast.

The rear loading bed has many other advantages; there is no limit linked to visibility or to the frame shape, therefore there is no volumetric constraints. The bike is suitable for any kind of bulk transportation. Handling, agility, safety, economic and sustainable transport which loads up to 150kgs; that is, in short are our cargo bike's highlights.   

Our cargo bikes geometry and behaviour is inspired  from road bikes. We wanted our bike to inherit tubing from road bikes, so we broke the design lines and dwarfed the triangles.

What we expect in two words: light and fast. The bike will be comfortable, the frame handmade, and customized to each body type. 

We opportunise on our active friends: afternoons passed discussing the use of a  cargo bike on a daily basis either as a bike messenger, or while carrying fruit crates to the farmer markets. Hours passed drawing sketches on paper and perfecting with CAD software. Long discussions with framebuilders, many hours spent in our bike kitchen chatting, choosing, trying. 

Now we have got a pretty well-defined project and we are very close to our target.
We have the ideas, but we need everyone's help to bring them into reality! Your contribution can go even further than the pure founding.

To realize the best cargo bike we developed a new way of designing divided in steps that need collective help. To start, we need at least 2500 Euros. This is the effective cost of  producing the first prototype and running the first test.

The frame is going to be handmade for us by an Italian frame builder and we are going to use components (saddle, handlebar, wheels...) mostly made in Italy. An ethical and sustainable choice, that takes into consideration the economical and functional side without sacrificing world-famous Italian quality!  

Once we have the first prototype, the collective tests step will begin. Anyone can become our tester! We will collect all opinions, compare them and only then we will be able to review the project. Just with the help of many of you, the first prototype will be improved since it will become the perfect cargo bike.   
Even the name of the cargo bike model will be chosen collectively. We need your help to choose it.   

But we want to go above and beyond this initial goal.


If we collect 4500 Euros, we will build a second prototype. This will be re-designed according to the first guideline that comes out from the first tests.

If we collect 7000 Euros, we will build three prototypes. Above all, after the tests are done, we will generate a network of of producers that will enable us to produce and commercialize  our tested cargo bike in a short period of time  and sell it for an affordable price, keeping the frame production in Italy and the in-house production line.

Good Ideas can grow only in cooperative groups. Many people, many experiences, many sources, many passions, one love in common: bikes! We met each other in CiclOstile Trento Bike Kitchen fixing bikes,  chatting, having a drink together we start to talk about cargos; after months of chatting, sketches and homemade experiments, we decided that the project is now ready to become a real bike. 
Help us to make it real!
Please refer to the following contacts for more information about this project, payment methods, and future perspectives.
officinaciclostile@gmail.com 
https://www.facebook.com/ciclostile.officinapopolare
https://www.facebook.com/longtailcargobike
