If you like what you see and want to learn more, feel free to reach out via m2sbikes@gmail.com or give us a call at 828-773-0738. Thanks for the support!

story:
So what sets us apart from the rest?

  • Chunky Rough Stuff Wheels for easy cruising on poor tarmac
  • Swap out the Rough Stuff Wheels for Road Wheels
  • Flexible deck for a comfortable ride
  • Swap out the deck easily for new designs
  • Advanced flexible battery case for an evenly weighted and flexible eboard
  • Great performance and specification 
  • Unrivalled ride comfort
  • 12 month warranty as standard

 

 


 

 

Rough Stuff Wheels

  • Greater size, knobbly tread, no punctures for a smooth ride over rough terrain
  • Swap between Rough Stuff Wheels and road wheels
  • 85A hardness - smooth ride and hardwearing
  • 110mm diameter - cruise over lumps and bumps
  • Convex design for less resistance on smooth and more grip on rough terrain 
  • Polyurethane material- no punctures or hassle 

 

Each set of Rough Stuff Wheels comes with 2 x Sprockets/Pulley Wheels to mount on to a standard 35mm bearing. Each Pulley has 40 teeth. 

 

The convex design allows for less rolling resistance on flat, with the Rough Stuff Wheel running in the centre 20mm. When you take to rougher stuff the rest of the wheel comes in to play offering superior grip.

 

Advanced Flexible Battery Case Design

  • Rides just like a normal longboard with a flexible deck. Better weight distribution, more stable, smoother and grounded ride
  • Protected, bash proof, dust proof and water resistant design
  • Removable battery case and easy connectors
  • 'Bolt-on' design to change decks with minimal hassle
  • On-board LED battery level display
  • USB output for charging any tech and the wireless controller
  • Slim design for greater ground clearance and sleek look

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Deck Choice

Bamboo Deck

Symmetrical rounded shape with central cutouts for more torsional flex and a more grounded ride. Made from several bamboo layers this deck is flexible and responsive.

Carbon Composite Deck

This smooth responsive deck is the perfect partner to the Rough Stuff wheel. Made from 7 plys of premium Canadian maple fused with a multi layer carbon fibre matrix providing unrivalled ride and control. Toe heel concave to lock your feet for stability while the flexible cambered deck soaks up bumps at any speed. 

How it works

The subtle positive camber when compressed by the riders weight tensions the mono directional fibres of the carbon matrix producing a smooth and progressive flex that absorbs larger bumps and shocks like the springs of a car. 

X tow configuration of carbon fibre in the nose and tail ensures tight responsive turning and control at speed. 

Then combine these ultra thin layers of carbon fibre with premium Canadian rock maple laminate and its high density absorbs higher frequency harmonic vibration for a less fatiguing ride. Many solid eboard decks, especially with hub motors, are a real bone shaker to ride.

Level riding technology. This deck rides flat whether you’re 60kg or 120kg as Carbon Fibre can only stretch to 110% of its original length.

Carbon Composite Deck vs Full Carbon

Carbon fibre is very very strong under tension. So it allows flex but adds a great amount of strength to a deck when used in conjunction with layers of maple. So our Carbon Flex-E has a layer of Carbon Fibre on its underside with cross strands running underneath this.

A full Carbon deck cannot flex at all as as soon as you add a camber or concave the structure becomes rigid and can only snap, not flex.

Ever seen a picture of a Carbon Fibre bicycle which has snapped? Carbon Fibre cannot resist impact very well at all. Carbon fibre once set in epoxy resin cannot be repaired. Its strength lies in its tensile strength. The Carbon Flex-Eboard adds a carbon layer to save weight and add a whole new dimension of awesomeness.

 

 

 

Wheel Choice

Whether you’re taking to the rough UK roads or a smooth track, choose the best setup for the terrain.

  • Swap between Rough Stuff Wheels and road wheels in just a couple of minutes
  • Ride to your style, terrain and comfort
  • The Flex-Eboard's drive sprocket is compatible with our wheels as well as ABEC 11 flywheels and many others on the eboard market

 

Multi Grip Deck

Traditional or Goofy, your feet will perfectly grip the coarse layers of grip tape.

  • Coarser grip tape than most eboards for a more secure and grippier ride
  • Carbon inspired design with 120-degree angle

 

Powerful Electric Motors 

The 2 x 1200W motors give plenty of power for riders up to 120kg and great hill climbing ability.

  • Fast Acceleration
  • Huge torque
  • 15% hill climb ability

USB Port and Battery Display

Charge your tech on the go 

  • Charges any device via USB cable as well as the wireless remote control
  • On-board battery display in 20% increments. Can be used when Flex-Eboard is off

Protected Lithium Ion (Li+) Battery

Safe and Certified

  • Protected from overcharging and overheating 
  • Slightly more powerful than our other eboards at 26V, 196Wh

Riding Modes

The Flex-Eboard has 3 riding modes:

Fun Mode

Learning to ride for the first time? This mode reduces the top speed to just below half of maximum. Run in to trouble or want to jump off? At 10mph you’ll be perfectly safe. Top Speed in Fun Mode: 10mph (16km/h)

Thrill Mode

When you’re ready to take things to the next level. Greater acceleration and up to the maximum speed for real adrenaline action. Top speed in Thrill Mode: 22mph (35km/h)

Cruise Mode

With a click of the hand controller, stay at any speed with no need to use the controller, simply brake to deactivate. Easy to use and saves energy, increasing range.

 

Hub vs. Belt Drive 

A belt driven eboard has the motor mounted outside the wheel with a belt connecting the motor and wheel with a sprocket.

A hub motor has the motor mounted inside the wheel with no need for a belt. 

Belt Drive

Our belt drive system allows for interchangeable wheels and of course a full polyurethane wheel for a more comfortable ride and greater customisation. 

The 3:1 gear ratio offers so much more torque than a hub motor of the same power. Faster acceleration, better hill climbing ability and power over rough terrain where hub motors are left in the Flex-Eboard's dust.

Hub Drive

With just a few mm of Polyurethane separating the motor and the riding surface, hub motors don't provide a very comfortable ride on anything but the smoothest of roads.

Yep, we admit, hub motors are more discreet and look great.

If you prefer the look of a hub motor then thats fine, but if you prefer more torque, acceleration and complete customisation then belt drive is the way forward.

The first 5 pledges will get the chance to add a vinyl decal to their deck. 

 

What's in the box

In each Flex-Eboard box you will find:

  • A Flex-Eboard with the deck of your choice
  • A set of 4 Rough Stuff Wheels on the Eboard
  • A set of 4 Road Wheels
  • Wireless Remote Control
  • Certified Adaptor and Plug (with UK, European or US plug)
  • USB to micro USB Cable
  • Eboard spanner and Allen Key
  • Carry Bag
  • Full instruction Manual

 

 

Manufacturing

We were lucky enough to run a really successful Kickstarter campaign which allowed us to move ahead and pay for the moulds for the Flex-Eboard and Rough Stuff Wheels. Russel at Sololongboards has also started  work on the Carbon Fibre Decks.

We are looking to increase our order size and allow us to meet minimum order quantities for the Rough Stuff Wheels and allow us to introduce different colours and maybe even different hardnesses of polyurethane. 

Our Story

Why we are different

Slick Revolution have been designing and retailing electric skateboards in the European marketplace for just over 2 years. We are electric longboard geeks. There’s just nothing quite like them and there’s nothing quite like ours. 

Thanks to a successful Kickstarter campaign we have already paid for the moulds of the Rough Stuff wheels and battery case. We are still looking to reach £50k in order that we can meet minimum order  quantities to allow us to offer different coloured wheels. We have a great relationship with our manufacturers in China as well as feet on the ground over there. Our internal PCB’s, wireless control and technical aspects have all been tested extensively, not only by our team but you guys, our awesome customers in our current range of eboards. 

We have feedback from all of our customers which have led us to this design. Skaters, long boarders and eboarder's have all chipped in to create exactly what the eboard market is missing.

The new elements of the new design are aesthetic and practical and so it’s essentially a re-design of a proven model. Many crowdfunding projects (particulary some US eboard ones) do succeed and reach their target but very often do not come to fruition as those running the campaign have very little manufacturing knowledge. So many projects fall down at this last hurdle with no prior knowledge of where to go at this point.

Why the Flex-Eboard is different

Lots of eboard manufacturers are moving towards integrated battery decks which is fine, but that's where the Flex-Eboard is different. An integrated battery means you lose the flexibility of the deck, plus you are stuck with one deck design. 

Plus we have chosen not to move to Hub motors for a few reasons.

  • They have poor torque whereas the Flex-Eboard is geared up in a 3:1 ratio.
  • They have a tiny thickness of PU wheel on the outside of the hub motor. This reduces the ride to a bone shaking experience on anything but a perfect surface.
  • Our customers can upgrade motors in the future when more powerful ones become available. No need for a whole new expensive hub motor. 

Our innovative battery case is flexible and 'bolt-on' style meaning you have a flexible more grounded ride and you aren't tied to a single design. It's really easy to swap the deck in the future and means that customisation is endless.

We've also developed Rough Stuff polyurethane wheels which are far more suitable for UK and European roads. We're not calling them 'Off-Road' wheels as our aim was to give a more comfortable ride on Multi-Terrain. Which for most people is poor quality tarmac and light gravel paths. We also wanted to offer the choice, so designed our wheels to fit a standard 35mm bearing and 6 prong sprocket so it can fit ABEC 11 Flywheels and many other brands too. 

To date we have sold over 500 electric longboards and have our electronics perfected. So no teething problems or connection issues to worry about with our new design. We have it tested, re-tested and tested it again. Not on a bench in a workshop but by all of our current customers riding all over the world.

Why we need your help 

In all manufacturing, there are discounts for larger quantities. With guaranteed orders at these quantities, we’ll be able to keep the price low and create supply chains to allow us to get the Flex-Eboard to customers around the world. We have finalised the Flex-Eboard design, formed partnerships and have a solid production plan in place. To ramp up production we need your help to pay for expensive moulds in order to produce on a mass scale. Then we can increase production and bring the costs down. 

Thank you for all your support. We’re looking forward to seeing Flex-Eboard being ridden all around the world.

 

SAFETY

The Flex-Eboard is an electric skateboard. You should learn at slow speeds in Fun mode before moving to Thrill Mode. Always wear a helmet and personal protective gear in case anything happens. Ride within your limits and read our full instruction manual before using the Flex-Eboard. 

LEGALITY

Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric skateboards, vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.

FAQ's

Q: I am not living in the UK, can I buy a Flex-Eboard?

A: We ship to the UK, EU Countries and the US. Check each pledge for the total shipping costs. 

Q: Can I use normal road style wheels on the Flex-Eboard?

A: Yep, it's compatible with both flat road and our Rough Stuff Wheels. The sprockets mounts on to 35mm bearings and can fit on ABEC 11 Flywheels.

Q: Can I mount the Rough Stuff Wheels on another eboard or board?

A: Absolutely. Each set of Rough Stuff wheels comes with a 2 drive sprockets to mount on a standard 35mm bearing, as well as 2 belt drive covers.

Q: Does my Flex-Eboard come with a warranty?

A: Each Flex-Eboard comes with a 12 month warranty against manufacturers defects. For full warranty information check out our Warranty section at www.slickrevolution.co.uk

Q: Is the Flex-Eboard waterproof?

A: It's water resistant which means that you can ride on wet ground, however if water is splashing up then thats too wet. 5 minutes of drizzle to get home will be ok too. It is electrical at the end of the day so just be careful near water. 

Q: What could I do if my Flex-E runs out of battery?

A: Just like a normal longboard or skateboard you can ride without power. There is some slight resistance from the motors but it isn't too much at all.

Q: Can I bring the Flex-Eboard on aeroplanes or check-in?

A: Since the recent issues with Hoverboards and Samsung Galaxy Note 7's most airlines are very cautious and as a general rule most will not allow batteries above 100Wh. The Flex-Eboard's batteries are 194Wh. 

Q: What is the return policy ?

A: Don't worry! We have 14-Day Satisfaction Guaranteed.  We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchases. Orders are fully refundable at any time prior to shipping. If you’re not happy with the product within 14 days, simply return it back to us for a full refund. * Items returned for refund must be returned unused within 14 days from delivery. 

Under no circumstances will we issue refunds after 14 days of delivery.

*Customers are responsible for shipping costs for all return claims and are subject to restocking fee of 20% if the eboard has been ridden or are not in store bought condition with packaging in new, sellable form.

Q: What does the 12 month Warranty cover?

A: Our twelve month warranty covers all manufacturers defects. If you have a problem with your Flex-eboard due to a manufacturers defect we will arrange pickup for free and repair the eboard as soon as we can within the UK, then send it back out to you. For other countries we will send out spare parts based on a diagnosis of the issue. We also offer a repair service for eboards which are damaged or broken due to user negligence or accidents.

Q: What is the maximum user weight of the Flex-Eboard?

A: 120kg or 265lbs is our recommended maximum user weight. 

Q:  I'm closer to the top end of the weight limit, will I get the same performance?

A: Our performance spec's are based on an 80kg rider on smooth tarmac. If you weight heavier than this you won't achieve the same ranges or quite touch the top speed however with the torque of the 2 x 1200W motors riders up to 120kg won't be far off. 

Q: Where are the Flex-Eboards shipping from?

A: The Flex-Eboard is manufactured in China after which they will be shipped to the UK. After further quality control checks by our team they will then be shipped to you, our awesome backers! Once they arrive in the UK shipping to the US and Europe will take around 2 weeks. 

Q: Once I have backed the Flex-Eboard, what happens then?

A: We will keep you updated about production, manufacturing, shipping and all the important things that you want to know, right here on this page.

Q: Ive pledged on Indiegogo, now what happens?

A: We will be in touch to arrange shipping once the Flex-Eboard and Rough Stuff Wheels are ready.

Q: What if theres a delay in production?

A: We have built buffer periods into our predicted shipping time to allow for a delay at any stage from manufacture of the moulds to shipping. If however there is a delay we will notify you immediately and keep you well up to date on any change in the timescale.

-------------

Risks and challenges

Slick Revolution is prepared to begin production of the Flex-Eboard at the conclusion of this campaign, however, with the release of any product, there may be unforeseen obstacles that could prevent us from getting certain elements of the product just right. As we strive to provide you with the ultimate user experience and would not feel comfortable releasing any product until it is perfect, there is always the possibility of delays.

We promise to do our best to keep you as up to date as possible on any and all Flex-Eboard related developments and are working to reduce as many issues as possible before the Flex-Eboard and Rough Stuff Wheels official release.

You should learn at slow speeds in Fun mode before moving to Thrill Mode. Always wear a helmet and personal protective gear in case anything happens. Ride within your limits and read our full instruction manual before using the Flex-Eboard. LEGALITYLaws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric skateboards, vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product before you ride it.FAQ'sQ: I am not living in the UK, can I buy a Flex-Eboard?A: We ship to the UK, EU Countries and the US. Check each pledge for the total shipping costs. Q: Can I use normal road style wheels on the Flex-Eboard?A: Yep, it's compatible with both flat road and our Rough Stuff Wheels. The sprockets mounts on to 35mm bearings and can fit on ABEC 11 Flywheels.Q: Can I mount the Rough Stuff Wheels on another eboard or board?A: Absolutely. Each set of Rough Stuff wheels comes with a 2 drive sprockets to mount on a standard 35mm bearing, as well as 2 belt drive covers.Q: Does my Flex-Eboard come with a warranty?A: Each Flex-Eboard comes with a 12 month warranty against manufacturers defects. For full warranty information check out our Warranty section at www.slickrevolution.co.ukQ: Is the Flex-Eboard waterproof?A: It's water resistant which means that you can ride on wet ground, however if water is splashing up then thats too wet. 5 minutes of drizzle to get home will be ok too. It is electrical at the end of the day so just be careful near water. Q: What could I do if my Flex-E runs out of battery?A: Just like a normal longboard or skateboard you can ride without power. There is some slight resistance from the motors but it isn't too much at all.Q: Can I bring the Flex-Eboard on aeroplanes or check-in?A: Since the recent issues with Hoverboards and Samsung Galaxy Note 7's most airlines are very cautious and as a general rule most will not allow batteries above 100Wh. The Flex-Eboard's batteries are 194Wh. Q: What is the return policy ?A: Don't worry! We have 14-Day Satisfaction Guaranteed.  We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchases. Orders are fully refundable at any time prior to shipping. If you’re not happy with the product within 14 days, simply return it back to us for a full refund. * Items returned for refund must be returned unused within 14 days from delivery. Under no circumstances will we issue refunds after 14 days of delivery.*Customers are responsible for shipping costs for all return claims and are subject to restocking fee of 20% if the eboard has been ridden or are not in store bought condition with packaging in new, sellable form.Q: What does the 12 month Warranty cover?A: Our twelve month warranty covers all manufacturers defects. If you have a problem with your Flex-eboard due to a manufacturers defect we will arrange pickup for free and repair the eboard as soon as we can within the UK, then send it back out to you. For other countries we will send out spare parts based on a diagnosis of the issue. We also offer a repair service for eboards which are damaged or broken due to user negligence or accidents.Q: What is the maximum user weight of the Flex-Eboard?A: 120kg or 265lbs is our recommended maximum user weight. Q:  I'm closer to the top end of the weight limit, will I get the same performance?A: Our performance spec's are based on an 80kg rider on smooth tarmac. If you weight heavier than this you won't achieve the same ranges or quite touch the top speed however with the torque of the 2 x 1200W motors riders up to 120kg won't be far off. Q: Where are the Flex-Eboards shipping from?A: The Flex-Eboard is manufactured in China after which they will be shipped to the UK. After further quality control checks by our team they will then be shipped to you, our awesome backers! Once they arrive in the UK shipping to the US and Europe will take around 2 weeks. Q: Once I have backed the Flex-Eboard, what happens then?A: We will keep you updated about production, manufacturing, shipping and all the important things that you want to know, right here on this page.Q: Ive pledged on Indiegogo, now what happens?A: We will be in touch to arrange shipping once the Flex-Eboard and Rough Stuff Wheels are ready.Q: What if theres a delay in production?A: We have built buffer periods into our predicted shipping time to allow for a delay at any stage from manufacture of the moulds to shipping. If however there is a delay we will notify you immediately and keep you well up to date on any change in the timescale.-------------Risks and challengesSlick Revolution is prepared to begin production of the Flex-Eboard at the conclusion of this campaign, however, with the release of any product, there may be unforeseen obstacles that could prevent us from getting certain elements of the product just right. As we strive to provide you with the ultimate user experience and would not feel comfortable releasing any product until it is perfect, there is always the possibility of delays.We promise to do our best to keep you as up to date as possible on any and all Flex-Eboard related developments and are working to reduce as many issues as possible before the Flex-Eboard and Rough Stuff Wheels official release.

story:
Short Summary

We need to raise $3000 to pay off an auto loan for a vehicle that we haven't had possession of for 14 months due to a three vehicle accident.  These beautiful children are being driven in a vehicle which places them in danger each time they put on their seat belts.

OUR STORY

My children and I were in a three vehicle accident in late 2011, and didn't have insurance because we were struggling to keep up with our bills.  Since the accident, we have been driving our children in a 2004 Pontiac Sunfire that is not safe for my daughters because of the lack of space and safety features for a small car (my oldest daughter isn't in a booster seat - which is illegal).  We are not even sure that this current vehicle will pass the Virginia safety inspection.  Unfortunately, we still have to make the monthly payments and keep full collision insurance  (over $600/mo.) on a minivan that is sitting in a junkyard.

We have been struggling with so many others since the economy collapsed in late 2008. My wife and I were both laid off within six weeks of each other and had to move from Michigan to Virginia for our family's survival. We both are considered underemployed, but we keep our heads high because we work hard and view the last few years as "bumps in the road". 

What We Need 

1. We need to raise $3000 to pay off the current loan. No amount is too small.

2. Paying off this loan will allow us to use our tax refund as a down payment on a safer vehicle.

What you get in return

1.  We have a few perks to offer, these perks were originally given to me as gifts.  The estimated arrival time is just that; I will send you the perk you chose in a very timely manner.

2. You will know that you are helping three girls get into a vehicle that won't endanger their lives every time they travel.

3. Your generosity will allow my family to increase our giving to others in need. We always help those in need in any way that we can (food, money, free babysitting for mothers who work at night).  I recently gave gift cards that I received from work to someone who has no heat and water, even though we really could have used them for gas/groceries.

4. Most importantly, you will have our gratitude for your generosity.

Other Ways You Can Help

1. PLEASE share on our story via email, facebook, linked-in, or any other social media.

2. Share our story by word of mouth.

3. Prayer.  If you are not spiritual, good thoughts are more than welcome.  We firmly believe in the goodness of human nature.

4. Help another person in any way that you can - even a smile may help.

story:
Automatically unlocks doors as you approach the vehicle & locks them when you go...

 

Freedom Setup

Enjoy your Freedom...

 

Freedom Compatibility 

The following vehicles will be compatible with our first production batch of Freedom.  More compatible vehicles to come in the near future.

 

Freedom For All 

  • Active lifestyle
  • Anyone that finds keys - a thing of the past
  • Households with single or multiple cars
  • Business vehicle fleet management

Freedom Advantage

  • No need to carry car key fobs
  • Freedom utilizes 128-bit encryption vs. key fob's 40-bit system (which can be copied by thieves using interceptors)
  • Original car key fobs are expensive to replace when lost (average $400)
  • Original car key fobs are easily damaged, and not water resistant

 

Close to Freedom

We are in prototype and refinement stage, with validation shortly after.  Achieving the target goal of $25,000 will allow our first production batch to be available by December 2017 - just in time for Christmas.

Our Beepable App for iOS and Android is currently under development to provide seamless connection between you and your vehicle, allowing for greater convenience and peace of mind.

 

Specification:

  • MCU : ARM Cortex-M4 32-bit RISC
  • Wireless : Bluetooth 4.2 Compliant
  • Security : Wireless encryption: 128-bit AES
  • Connector : OBD-II (J1962 standard)
  • Dimensions : 23 mm (H) x 40 mm (W) x 54 mm (L)

 

Risks and Challenges

Our main challenge is speed to market with more year, make and model of the vehicles.  We need a big growth in our resources.  That is why we are here at Indiegogo to get help from everyone.  Everyone's questions and inputs will be a vital to our continued product improvements.  

 

About Us

20 years in the hardware and software development.  In 2007 we started Autus, developing OBD2 solutions for many applications for the government research, diagnostics, safety, insurance industry monitoring, fleet vehicle management and rental car industry solutions.  As of 2016, we moved to southern California and formed BEEPABLE inc.

Gene, has 30 years experience in electrical and system engineering (with Masters degree from Michigan State University).  Jeong Hee, handles all sales & marketing and finance for Beepable Inc.

story:
Lawn mower attachment allows trimming weeds, blowing leaves while driving mower! No More Bugs, Sweat, or Lifting Heavy Lawn Tools. This means baby-boomers, women, techies and those with back issues don’t have to lift heavy lawn tools.

The YardArm ™ slides smoothly onto a bar attached to the back of your riding mower, and the trimmer or leaf blower easily snaps on when needed. YardArm is operated with a joy stick housed in a sliding unit that connects to the Arm. The Arm locks in place or “floats” by moving the joy stick.

There is no product on the market like the YardArm. The balance and roller concept is unique, and eventually the product is likely to be sold with all riding lawn mowers regardless of brand.  Commercial markets would include cemeteries, golf courses, utility companies and country clubs.

Attractive features are • Light weight (YardArm itself is 16 lbs.) • Fits all mower systems  with smooth even Trim •  Age and gender friendly • Reduces sweat, bugs, and fatigue

Needs to be designed to ensure the following qualities:

· Easier attachment to mower, golf cart, zero turn, ATV 

·Reduce size and weight to build a more streamlined tool

·Improve balance bar for a smoother operation

·Throttle trigger needs to be adjusted to apply appropriate speed

· Begin manufacturing units upon completion of the above

Funds are to design better attachments for lawnmower, golf cart, zero turn, ATV and inventory units.

The YardArm

story:
My name is Jorg Schuster and I have created RootsRoller, a minimalist heritage toy that sparks imagination and keeps tradition alive.

Short Summary

This project was born out of time spent with my own children. It gradually evolved with continuous play-time observation. My decades long product development experience allowed me to create a design that includes, being natural, modern, intuitive and also locally manufacturable. This leads to the other part of my vision which is the uncompromised dedication to local infrastructure and support. Made here, by local businesses.

My family and friends were the driving force behind the start of this company. Demand for my RootsRoller cars was evident and so, here we are with the first production run nearing and setting the foundation to a wonderful product reminding us to "stay roots".

 

 Reasons You Should Consider a RootsRoller car

  • long lasting, extra durable construction
  • aluminum axles, solid maple wood
  • food safe oil finish
  • minimalist design object for the modern household
  • Made in USA

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $9000.00 to begin production of the first item in our collection. This amount was determined to make it profitable for all involved. Less is of course still possible.

To this point we have constructed various prototypes. Each one was hand-finished. We have established manufacturing relationships and also secured good faith capacity pending completion of this campaign.

The prototype phase is done with and we are literally ready to roll.

If we do not raise comlete funds, no worries, we will still be able to complete every perk.


Additional perks

We have created gift perks that allow you to create a more complete package. A Trucker Hat with our badge, Made in USA.

 

And, a kids backpack, Made in USA, perfect for a back to school gift. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you everyone for your time. No problem if you are not able to participate at this time. Maybe you know someone who would be interested and you can help spread the word. We are stoked to have the chance to share the RootsRoller vision. 
 
 

Quote

“They roll these little cars with their hands and use their voices to produce engine sounds”. Its wonderful to watch and that's what I want to share. This project is about bringing back a bit of tradition and promoting creativity. By supporting our project, you help strengthen a challenged economy and signaling to others the importance of participation.”   -Jorg Schuster,  RootsRoller  Made in USA  Design Toy-

story:
You'll learn a lot from the video. Please take 2 minutes to watch & learn all about Surf Air Express before scrolling on.

Eliminating the hassles of commercial air travel for frequent business commuters was a rewarding undertaking, and after 5 years of flying we're excited to announce the next step forward.

Surf Air Express is the next generation of Surf Air, continuing our mission to make better, more seamless air travel affordable to more fliers.

For the first time ever, we're opening the Surf Air network beyond our membership base. Surf Air flights, which are operated by FAA-certified third party air carriers, will soon be available across online travel booking websites for anyone to enjoy the same great time-savings and hassle-free experience.

The Surf Air Express Membership sweetens the experience even more! With extra perks and benefits for those that opt in during this Indiegogo campaign and beyond, it's the best way to get the most from the Surf Air Express. Becoming a Surf Air Express Member guarantees you lower fares than non-members.

 

Special Indiegogo Perks

For our Indiegogo backers, we're offering the ability to enjoy discounts on our Surf Air Express Membership and flight packages to help us get our newest innovation off the ground!

 

 

A New Brand & Membership

Surf Air Express eliminates the monthly subscription fee of our flagship All-You-Can-Fly Membership and unlocks all routes for purchase on a per seat basis. This next evolution of Surf Air will solve the problem of hectic air travel for more busy fliers and weekend escapists.

For an annual membership fee of $2,500 (discounted or waived as part of the Indiegogo perks), you'll lock in preferentially-priced flat rate flights for $445 one-way every time you fly. Without the Express Membership, flight prices are variable, subject to demand, and only accessible via online booking websites.

We can't wait to welcome you on board.

 

 

As Southwest, United, Delta and the rest of the major airlines slashed and cut their way to terrible service, we built a completely new flying experience based around the core belief that time is our most precious commodity. We added some inspiration from the world's best hospitality brands, invented new ways to care for our members, and created a travel experience never seen before.

Instead of lugging your baggage through a mile of ropes and walkways, Surf Air members instead pull up directly to a lounge, are greeted by a Flight Concierge, and only need to arrive just 15 minutes before departure. It's that simple.

By eliminating the lines, waits, and crowds, and replacing it all with comfortable member lounges, a community of likeminded members, friendly pilots that know you by name, and the convenience of smaller regional airports, the time-savings and stress-free experience speak for themselves.

 

What you get with Surf Air Membership

 

What you get with commercial airlines

 

Surf Air Express Route Network

The Surf Air flight schedule is designed to maximize your flight options and increase flexibility for when and where you travel. Surf Air has an existing route network in California and Texas and will be opening all cities and the majority of flight times to the Surf Air Express Route Network. With the help of this Indiegogo campaign, Surf Air will be expanding into new cities throughout 2019.

Based on route demand, new flights will be added throughout the month and special event flights will be introduced for large events, festivals, sports games, and more.

 

 
 

 

With the launch of the Surf Air Express, we’ll be investing further into our most popular destinations like Las Vegas, Lake Tahoe, and Austin.

Moreover, we'll be launching new marquee routes like Scottsdale, Mammoth, and New Orleans! The greater the funding we can achieve on Indiegogo, the quicker we’ll be able to launch.

Is your city not currently part of the Express Network? We’d love to know where to fly next. Help us understand where we should send our planes by visiting this link and voting on our next location.

 

 

 

Why are we launching on Indiegogo?

We’ve turned to the Indiegogo community to help get the Surf Air Express off the ground because of this platform’s unique ability to spot the next big thing. Inventing a new category of air travel isn’t easy, so we need your support expanding access to Surf Air across our existing network. What better place to get in front of the backers that drive industries forward than Indiegogo?

Surf Air has grown primarily on the goodwill and positive reviews from our existing members. We’re hoping this word-of-mouth growth extends into the Indiegogo community. We ask that if you know anyone, a friend, colleague, family member, that could benefit from the life-changing benefits of a Surf Air Express Membership, that you simply send along the good word and share this campaign with them.

 

 

Why you should contribute to the campaign

Your travel doesn’t have to be such a terrible experience. A Surf Air Express Membership opens you up to a community of likeminded travelers all sharing a common appreciation for injecting enjoyment back into air travel. Experience the difference Surf Air makes on your next trip. Skip the lines and get to the fun faster. Welcome to the next generation.

 

Plus, a bonus reason to contribute!

We know time is precious, and we want to give some back. We’re thrilled to be donating 1% of our first ever Indiegogo campaign to our friends at charity: water to bring clean water (and more time) to families around the world. Learn more about their incredible mission at charitywater.org.

 

 

How to become a Surf Air Express Member

1. Purchase a discounted membership or flight package from the Indiegogo Perk options.

2. A Surf Air membership representative will reach out upon completion of the Surf Air Express Indiegogo campaign.

3. Surf Air Express is available to fly immediately after the conclusion of this campaign in time for the holidays.

Or chat live with Surf Air Membership Advisors here.

 

 

 

© 2018 Surf Air Inc. 

The Surf Air name and logo are registered trademarks of Surf Air Inc.

We’re hoping this word-of-mouth growth extends into the Indiegogo community. We ask that if you know anyone, a friend, colleague, family member, that could benefit from the life-changing benefits of a Surf Air Express Membership, that you simply send along the good word and share this campaign with them.  Why you should contribute to the campaignYour travel doesn’t have to be such a terrible experience. A Surf Air Express Membership opens you up to a community of likeminded travelers all sharing a common appreciation for injecting enjoyment back into air travel. Experience the difference Surf Air makes on your next trip. Skip the lines and get to the fun faster. Welcome to the next generation. Plus, a bonus reason to contribute!We know time is precious, and we want to give some back. We’re thrilled to be donating 1% of our first ever Indiegogo campaign to our friends at charity: water to bring clean water (and more time) to families around the world. Learn more about their incredible mission at charitywater.org.  How to become a Surf Air Express Member1. Purchase a discounted membership or flight package from the Indiegogo Perk options.2. A Surf Air membership representative will reach out upon completion of the Surf Air Express Indiegogo campaign.3. Surf Air Express is available to fly immediately after the conclusion of this campaign in time for the holidays.Or chat live with Surf Air Membership Advisors here.   © 2018 Surf Air Inc. The Surf Air name and logo are registered trademarks of Surf Air Inc.

story:
Veterans supporting veterans! Our members support our troops stateside, the sandbox, and wherever else as necessary. Our Club members have and are serving in Iraq, Afghanistan and other locations worldwide as either members of the military, civil service or civilian contractors.  If you support the United States, her soldiers, and the power of healing after war time then support our project!  The interaction alone offers a mix of unconditional trust, bonding, love, healing and affection, helping the active duty or veteran rider affected by war to heal on the open road.

Veterans helping veterans to heal! Please show your support and enlist others in our mission to honor and empower veterans helping wounded warriors to heal through motorcycle riding.  Motorcycles provide a unique program of open air freedom on the road, calming scenery, passion for traveling and brotherhood.  Our service to the nation is rooted in loyalty, selfless service, integrity and honor, the same values found in our motorcycle brotherhood.

Many veterans confront obstacles as they transition into civilian life, and today's veterans and wounded veterans are meeting multiple obstacles including, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) and physical injuries.  Your efforts will raise funds to help our military veteran motorcycle club aid and assist wounded veterans to heal.  Saluting Veteran motorcycle riders and the bold statement each veteran makes to the world, our MC helps veterans move onward. Please help us make a difference in the lives of military veteran motorcyclists.

What We Need:

1) We need a four thousand (4,000) square foot concrete parking lot to park motorcycles before and after therapeutic riding.  4,000 sqft = 74 cubic yards at 6 inches depth * $75 per yard = $5,550

2) We need an eight foot security fence to limit access during closed hours.  41 (8 foot sections) * $60 each = $2,460

3) We need electrical services installed by a licensed electrician. Three cost estimates at $1,700 for parts, supplies and labor.

4) We need a camera security system for 24 hour surveillance of the premises.  Cost at Best Buy and Tiger Direct $290

*If you don’t reach your entire goal, funds will fund a smaller parking lot.

The Impact:  Your contribution will empower veterans to help heal wounded veterans affected by war to bond and heal by guiding them down the road to success while leaving wounds in the rear view mirrors of their iron horses.

Other Ways You Can Help:  Please spread the word on facebook, email and shout out to your friends about helping veterans help veterans heal. You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Welcome to our found raising homepage

We are Gianfranco and Raphael which are doing the Mongol Rally 2015, a long trip in a Subaru Justy from Switzerland, via London to Mongolia.

We have already managed to achieve 750£ of donations with the first campaign, as we want to support our charity organisations a much as we can, we decided to start a second campaign.

Follow us on our Blog  Mongol Rally 2015- Team Khan Fly or on our  Facebook  page Team Khan Fly.

How to donate: Perks

In order to make the donations more funny and to add challenges to our trip, we set up a few perks (challenges) we will perform for your donation.

Please select the perks on the right side and make us suffer :-)

All the money will be donated to Bayasgalant, a Swiss organisation which helps children in Mongolia and Cool Earth which saves the rain forest.  

!! THANKS A LOT FOR YOUR DONATION !!

story:
UPDATE: We made the goal! Thank you so much to everyone who has contributed, both with moral and financial support. The accident was not only a physical strain on Tyler, but emotionally taxing as well, and he expressed to me that the response to this campaign was deeply moving and made him feel loved at a time when he really needed it. Again, thanks to all, and more updates to come!


On June 24, Tyler Ingolia, an exceptionally talented artist and San Francisco local, fell victim to a hit and run accident while on his bicycle, being left unconscious on the road. While slowly recovering from his injuries, the accident totaled his bicycle -- his sole means of transportation -- and we, his friends, are now looking to raise funds to replace it.


Mike's Bikes in SF has very kindly offered us a 10% discount, and our goal is to raise $570 for the Electra RatRod 3i.


To keep everyone in the loop here concerning the breakdown of finances, IndieGogo takes a 9% commission, and there are additional deductions from third parties (such as PayPal). But with the 10% discount from Mike's Bikes, it almost balances out perfectly.

story:
We hereby present Bogbi – a cargo bike designed from scratch to meet the needs of modern people in their everyday life. This handmade cargo bike is compact, maneuverable, resistant and has an embracing frame to protect your valuable cargo: kids, pets, groceries or other things.

Bogbi also stands for more than bicycles, its about contributing to the development of greener cities and having a positive impact giving an opportunity for youth at risk in Colombia.

 
 

•

Shipping Info

The perks under "OSLO Only" will allow you to pick up the Bogbi at NO cost in our offices in Oslo, Norway or Bogotá Colombia

The perks under "Terrific deal, Super deal or Reseller pack" will allow you to get the Bogbi delivered to your door in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, European Union, UK, Switzerland, USA & Canada. It will have a cost starting at 200€ depending on destination.

We are working hard to guarantee you the best prices and deals!

story:
AVIONICS V1 is the most uncompromising e-bike EVER!

The quintessence of the retro-future machine. The first glance brings to mind the past days of the 30s and 40s. In those times things were designed to be beautiful, functional and everlasting. This idea inspired us through all stages of design.
You'll feel motorcycle sensibilities without a license or registration.




 

First was the idea to create an electric bike that would be characterized by unique and beautiful form.

 

Our inspiration dates back to the most amazing times of motorization full bloom. We combine it with aviation stylistics and engineering. 
 

The AVIONICS V1 spring looks like an aerofoil and hangs on the front of the frame head. It is made of manually polished stainless steel completed with a wooden saddle. 

 

AVIONICS V1 is a raw, spartan piece of equipment.

Its main task is to bring joy!

 

AVIONICS V1 has a rich soul. It is not just another piece of steel coming from the assembly line. It is created in small workshops by passionate beauty lovers, who see their work as a sort of mission, not just a duty. Their respect for nature, art, and technology is obvious in every element of their work.

Avionics V1 is the future without noise and exhaust. Freedom of movement in harmony with nature.


The heart of AVIONICS V1 is electronics. Our e-bike deserves the best, that’s why we equipped it with sine-wave controller. This solution is used in electric motorcycles and means advanced on-board computer. It is a fully customizable, high-end, FOC controller offering full torque from zero RPM, regenerative braking, and noiseless operation.

The battery must be strong and reliable. No matter what the e-bike looks like – its battery makes it useful. Our electrical engineers took on the challenge of battery design and at the same time, the rest of our team took care of the frame and wooden elements production. Everything had to match. There was no space for mistakes. There was no compromise – design and functionality had to come together. 

 

As a standard, each AVIONICS V1 will receive a 8A charger. It will allow a full battery charge in three hours.

 

Have enough power to climb any hill. 

 

Chrome plated headlight
Powered by Cree®XLamp XM-L LED bulbs. Max Light Output 1000lm

 

Bright, powerful glow
18 COB LEDS, Light Output 15lm

 

203mm Disc Brakes
The biggest 203mm front and back disc brake rotors for optimal braking power at 58 KM/H.

 

 

 

 

 

Q: What are the reasons to choose AVIONICS V1?
 AVIONICS V1 impresses with design and performance. Combination of Spartan presence and striking power guarantees a smooth, exciting ride. Wherever AVIONICS V1 appears it meets huge interest and enthusiastic admiration. You can call it extraordinary experience with no exaggeration. AVIONICS V1 is made to give you the feeling of adventure every time you ride it. 

Q: How AVIONICS V1 works? 
Set the lamp switch to position 1 – you should notice the diode lights up – this means you have position light on. Touch immobilizer (placed on the top of the main chest) with your key. Now your AVIONICS V1 is ready to go with „Street” mode which means maximum 25 km/h.
If you wish to activate „Force” mode you just need to choose position 2. “Force” mode is already configured to maximum performance. 
Since AVIONICS V1 has enormous performance and torque moment you don’t need to use pedals at all. 

Q: How far can I go with single charge?
The full charge of the battery let you ride for the next 120 km in „Street” mode on a flat terrain.
If you set your mode to „Force” the range depends on controller configuration, type of terrain and drive style. Approximately you can reach 60 km.

Q: How to use the battery?
Every single AVIONICS V1 after it is mounted has to go through the road tests and calibration. After you buy it, we configure it according to the regulations of your country. Likewise the charger is adapted to the electric system of particular countries.
AVIONICS V1 is ready to go just after you receive it, but we recommend full charge before.
Notice that only proper use will provide long life to your battery.
The battery is made of premium class high amperage industrial grade li-ion cells.
If you use it properly you lose only 10 to 20% of battery capacity after crossing 1000 full charges. Don’t you worry because it means you will not feel any change in battery capacity for the next 3 years.

Q: How AVIONICS V1 is secured?
Anti-theft security:
AVIONICS V1 is equipped with two kinds of anti-theft securities:
1. Immobilizer: the reader is on the main chest.
2. Rear wheel electric blockade.
AVIONICS V1 can be started only with your key. You need one second to do it. Just touch the reader with your key and the system turns blockades off. Your AVIONICS V1 is ready to go.The Engine and electronics securities:
AVIONICS V1 has double anti-overheating security, and anti-overloading blockade for the engine, controller and the other electronics.

Q: Is AVIONICS V1 waterproof and resistant to dust?
Yes it is! The engine, electronics and the battery are safely closed in watertight casing.
There is no natural threat against AVIONICS V1. You don’t have to pay attention to the rain, snow and dust….But remember that AVIONICS V1  has an advanced electronics inside, so it needs some care too. Don’t push it too hard!

Q: What is the shipping form?
AVIONICS V1 is shipped in original packing that meets all the transportation requirements, including adequate documentation. It is configured according to the regulations of particular countries. AVIONICS V1 is ready to go just after you unpack it. The only thing you need is your key to start it.

Q: When will I get my AVIONICS V1?
AVIONICS V1 is handmade in short lots. The production starts with the last day of our campaign. The first shipping of 60 e-bikes is planned on the late spring of 2018. Afterwards we will be sending 10 bikes every month respecting the orders sequence.

Q: Can AVIONICS V1 perform in business or marketing?
Yes of course it can. Please contact us for more information.

Q: Where can I get accessories and spare parts from?
All the steel, wood and leather elements as well as electronics and battery of AVIONICS V1 you can get directly from us. We will send you every element you need.
 
Q: What does the 1 year warranty cover?
AVIONICS gives a 1 year warranty to all mechanical elements, electronics and battery. In case of any damage, please report it to us or to the closest dealer of AVIONICS V1. 
If a shipment is required, you must pay for the shipment of the broken part to our closest dealer or service center. We will repair it and ship it immediately back to you.
The warranty does not include: damages coming from incorrect use, mechanical damages that are a result of a road accident, mechanical damages of paint, elements that get used as effect of regular e-bike operation: tires, chain, racks, brake pads, and so on.

Q: Do I have to wear a helmet when I ride?
We would really recommend wearing a helmet, even if your state or country laws does not require it. Like we always insist, safety comes first!

story:
Fully Funded! If you missed out on the crowdfunding campaign, you can still pre-order your LEIF here.

Every snowboarder knows the pain of taking that last run -- having to wait until the next vacation or season to ride again. At LEIF, we dreamed of a future where snowboarding was not confined to the snow and mountains, but accessible to everyone, anywhere.

Now, you can practice your switch riding, carving and sliding - all year long!

LEIFTech in the News

LEIFTech live video feature on CNBC - crowdfunding contest winner with 87% of the vote!

"LEIF's skateboard is insanely fun and surprisingly easy. Even though I've never snowboarded before, I think I can get the hang of this and carve through the streets" The Verge

"Its unique hardware appears to create a ride that's about as fast and flowy as you can have while standing up on hot asphalt." Gizmag

"So, whether you're a snowboarder, skater, surfer or a Segway user who's looking for a bit more style, the LEIF should probably be on your radar." Engadget

Press contact: Aaron@LEIFTech.com


The LEIF is your snowboard away from the mountain.

Riding the LEIF captures the exhilaration, mechanics and feel of snowboarding. The same snowboarding body movements produce the same result and ride on pavement.

Carving on the LEIF allows the you to lean hard into turns and cut across the pavement. Sliding on the LEIF feels as though the board is cutting through the pavement like a freshly-groomed mountain slope.


Slide to a stop just like a snowboard.

Control braking using the same intuitive process found in snowboarding - no mechanical brake system required. Safe, intuitive and confident stopping power.

Ride Sideways at 20mph.

The incredible freedom of movement of a snowboard is what you get while riding the LEIF on your city streets.

Ergonomic wireless remote control.

The LEIF is controlled by a wireless remote that won't fall out of your hand. The simplicity of the thumb slider will let you know exactly how much power is being sent to the LEIF at any given time - keeping you cruising at your speed.

No hiking or lift ticket required.

With the LEIF, you have the snowboard, the mountain and the chairlift. Ride with a group of friends, or set out on your own quest with everything you need to get where you're going - and get back home.

From city streets, to bike lanes to country roads - now you can ride all year long.

The LEIF is easy to learn.

Snowboarders will find the LEIF familiar and easy to pick up. Here's a video of one Instagram fan's experience on his first moments on the LEIF: 

Turn your streets into your mountain.

We have developed a fully functioning prototype, allowing you to ride your streets like a snowboard. Control your speed up to 20 mph, with the power to blast through slides, climb hills, carve big turns and stop on a dime.

Our innovative power system is designed to deliver power in any direction, giving you the freedom to ride forward, backwards, sideways, and even uphill.

Explore the LEIF in 3D

First Production Models to Ship May 2015

All of the mechanical engineering has been designed and the ride is simply amazing. This campaign will help fund investments necessary to develop injection molds, convert current 3D printed parts to 6061 aluminum, and take a final look at the aesthetic design.

Environmental conservation - one LEIF at a time.

LEIF technology is also green technology, using a renewable energy source at the core of the power system. These high-end batteries will take you 16,000 miles (2,000 cycles) before needing to be replaced!

Technical Specifications


Battery: 18 x 3.6V lithium phosphate cells 

Motor: 2 x 2000W electric brushless motors

Top Speed: 20 mph

Max Incline at Top Speed: 15% grade

Weight: 15 lbs (6.8 kg)

Range: up to 8 miles (varies with terrain and riding style)

Recharging time: 60 minutes

Join us as a LEIF Visionary.

Your support will help us make significant investments in manufacturing to bring this amazing product to life.

You will also be supporting a brand that is centered around a passion for snowboarding. We want snowboarders as visionaries, customers, and employees.

Riding the LEIF is all about leaving everyday life and bringing the mountain experience to your own environment.

So what are you waiting for? Support the LEIF project today and help bring year-round snowboarding to reality.

Rewards: LEIF Production Model

The final LEIF production model will be the lightest, most efficient - and most fun way to snowboard around your streets. Special pricing is only available to our IndieGoGo visionaries as a thank-you for joining this movement.


Rewards: T-Shirts & Hoodies

LEIFTech T-Shirts and Hoodies are high-quality cotton made of environmentally-friendly recycled material. These high-quality pieces cost us a bit more, but we want to deliver items that our supporters will actually wear and love.

FAQ


Q: What is the difference between the LEIF and other electric skateboards?

A: The LEIF rides just like a snowboard - which means it is able to ride sideways, forwards, backwards or any direction the rider directs the board. Since the board has two motors, it is now possible to ride like a snowboard across flat ground or even uphill.

Q: How does the LEIF ride like a snowboard?

A: The LEIF allows the rider to slide and carve with the same mechanics and feel found in snowboarding. Snowboarders find the LEIF familiar, since the same body movements produce the same style of ride.

Carving on the LEIF allows the rider to lean hard into turns and cut across the pavement. Sliding on the LEIF feels as though the board is cutting through the pavement like a freshly-groomed ski slope.

Q: How fast does the LEIF go?

A: The LEIF can reach speeds up to 20mph using a wireless remote. There is no minimum speed to ride the LEIF, so the rider can move at their own pace.

Q: How does the rider stop?

A: The LEIF is able to stop just like a snowboard - by sliding and using the friction of the outside wheels just like the edge of a snowboard.

Q: How far does the LEIF go on one charge?

A: The final prototype will have a riding range of no less than 8 miles, allowing the majority of commuters to snowboard all the way their destination before re-charging - which only takes one hour.

Q: How can I get my own LEIF?

A: Special pricing will be available on the LEIF IndieGoGo page until December 27th. After that, reserve orders will be taken and fulfilled at retail pricing (about $1,500) after the Kickstarter product run has been delivered. 

Inspiration

Just like all great innovations, there were others before us that paved the way and inspired our creation. Here are just a few:

Steen Strand of Freebord is the godfather of alternative ways to snowboard, and was a huge inspiration in developing this product. My Metroboard showed me how fun and exhilarating electric skateboards can be, and that this is an excellent option for commuting. The Boosted Board showed everyone that electric skateboards can be beautifully designed despite all of the bulky components that go inside.

The result of our intensive development process, driven by our experiences, inspiration and personal knowledge, led to the development of new and original designs that made this product possible - such as the invention of the world's first tandem-rotating motorized caster wheel, motor assemblies, battery configurations and more.

We are excited for the future, and we can't wait to see the LEIF project develop alongside other visionaries that are inspired in the same ways!
story_txt:
Fully Funded! If you missed out on the crowdfunding campaign, you can still pre-order your LEIF here.
Every snowboarder knows the pain of taking that last run -- having to wait until the next vacation or season to ride again. At LEIF, we dreamed of a future where snowboarding was not confined to the snow and mountains, but accessible to everyone, anywhere.

Now, you can practice your switch riding, carving and sliding - all year long!

LEIFTech in the News





LEIFTech live video feature on CNBC - crowdfunding contest winner with 87% of the vote!



"LEIF's skateboard is insanely fun and surprisingly easy. Even though I've never snowboarded before, I think I can get the hang of this and carve through the streets" The Verge
"Its unique hardware appears to create a ride that's about as fast and flowy as you can have while standing up on hot asphalt." Gizmag
"So, whether you're a snowboarder, skater, surfer or a Segway user who's looking for a bit more style, the LEIF should probably be on your radar." Engadget
Press contact: Aaron@LEIFTech.com


The LEIF is your snowboard away from the mountain.
Riding the LEIF captures the exhilaration, mechanics and feel of snowboarding. The same snowboarding body movements produce the same result and ride on pavement.
Carving on the LEIF allows the you to lean hard into turns and cut across the pavement. Sliding on the LEIF feels as though the board is cutting through the pavement like a freshly-groomed mountain slope.



Slide to a stop just like a snowboard.
Control braking using the same intuitive process found in snowboarding - no mechanical brake system required. Safe, intuitive and confident stopping power.

Ride Sideways at 20mph.

The incredible freedom of movement of a snowboard is what you get while riding the LEIF on your city streets.



Ergonomic wireless remote control.

The LEIF is controlled by a wireless remote that won't fall out of your hand. The simplicity of the thumb slider will let you know exactly how much power is being sent to the LEIF at any given time - keeping you cruising at your speed.




No hiking or lift ticket required.
With the LEIF, you have the snowboard, the mountain and the chairlift. Ride with a group of friends, or set out on your own quest with everything you need to get where you're going - and get back home.
From city streets, to bike lanes to country roads - now you can ride all year long.



The LEIF is easy to learn.
Snowboarders will find the LEIF familiar and easy to pick up. Here's a video of one Instagram fan's experience on his first moments on the LEIF: 

Turn your streets into your mountain.
We have developed a fully functioning prototype, allowing you to ride your streets like a snowboard. Control your speed up to 20 mph, with the power to blast through slides, climb hills, carve big turns and stop on a dime.
Our innovative power system is designed to deliver power in any direction, giving you the freedom to ride forward, backwards, sideways, and even uphill.



Explore the LEIF in 3D

First Production Models to Ship May 2015All of the mechanical engineering has been designed and the ride is simply amazing. This campaign will help fund investments necessary to develop injection molds, convert current 3D printed parts to 6061 aluminum, and take a final look at the aesthetic design.
Environmental conservation - one LEIF at a time.
LEIF technology is also green technology, using a renewable energy source at the core of the power system. These high-end batteries will take you 16,000 miles (2,000 cycles) before needing to be replaced!
Technical SpecificationsBattery: 18 x 3.6V lithium phosphate cells Motor: 2 x 2000W electric brushless motorsTop Speed: 20 mphMax Incline at Top Speed: 15% gradeWeight: 15 lbs (6.8 kg)Range: up to 8 miles (varies with terrain and riding style)Recharging time: 60 minutes
Join us as a LEIF Visionary.Your support will help us make significant investments in manufacturing to bring this amazing product to life.You will also be supporting a brand that is centered around a passion for snowboarding. We want snowboarders as visionaries, customers, and employees.Riding the LEIF is all about leaving everyday life and bringing the mountain experience to your own environment.So what are you waiting for? Support the LEIF project today and help bring year-round snowboarding to reality.
Rewards: LEIF Production ModelThe final LEIF production model will be the lightest, most efficient - and most fun way to snowboard around your streets. Special pricing is only available to our IndieGoGo visionaries as a thank-you for joining this movement.Rewards: T-Shirts & HoodiesLEIFTech T-Shirts and Hoodies are high-quality cotton made of environmentally-friendly recycled material. story:
Check us out at www.shockebikes.com




Contact us

If you have any questions you can either reach us through Indiegogo by directly messaging us, or by emailing us at info@shockebikes.com!


Featured in: 

     


Simply put, Ampere and Surge are our ways to cater to the diversity of cyclists out there. Ampere is a Dutch style step-through, propelled by a 350W rear hub motor; Surge is a 700c performance hybrid, propelled by a 350W mid-drive motor. 

    

 

Both electric bicycles come with a variety of motor assistance modes, and a battery that provides a superior range for your everyday activities. Hop on and bring out your inner explorer!


What's right for me?


We designed our electric bicycles to look, well, more like regular bicycles, discarding all superfluous components. The result? Electric bicycles that even the purists rave about.

   


It's all in the battery!

We designed our electric bicycles centered around the heart of the vehicle, the battery. Our bicycles boast an industry leading in-frame integrated battery design that makes charging and replacing simple and practical.


    

  

Adjust to your liking.

Ampere and Surge come equipped with adjustable stems, so that you can adjust them to suit your needs, whether you're a speedster or a casual rider.
                             

Get out there!

Go further than you ever have, and faster, too. With a 70 km range (45 miles), Ampere and Surge are equipped with pedal assist to help you get from point A to Z. The 350W motor carries both Surge and Ampere at 32 km/h (20 mph), powered by a 36V high energy-density lithium-ion battery. Long distances and challenging landscapes never seemed like a piece of cake!

     


Be in total control.

Ampere and Surge are equipped with a carefully designed thumb throttle and a 7-speed gear changer at your fingertips so that you can unleash and regulate power on demand. This is complemented with premium disc brakes on the front and rear wheels for Ampere and premium electric bike designed v-brakes on the front and rear wheels for Surge.

 

    


Smart, too. 

Surge and Ampere come equipped with a LCD backlit display that indicates speed, distance traveled, motor assistance level, battery voltage, and much more. Challenge yourself every time you ride and beat your old record like a boss.

 

Light it up!

To ensure safety during night rides, Ampere and Surge come equipped with wireless turn signal lights and laser illuminated lanes. The wireless controller is at your fingertips so that you can keep your hands on the bar instead of in the air. Ride with confidence knowing that you will be seen in the darkest conditions!

    

 




Dimensions



Specifications


Colors

We will offer Ampere and Surge in additional colours! In addition to black, we will offer Ampere and Surge in white and red. Channel your personality with these sleek Shocke Bikes colours!


To pre-order Ampere and/or Surge, click the button below and pick a reward that contains the bikes. It's as simple as that. If you want more stuff that isn't in your reward, then follow the instructions in our Add-On Menu (scroll 2 sections down). Once you have pledged, sit back and relax.


Once you pledge, you're all set. Throughout our campaign we'll be updating you with all the news regarding production.




Want to add some additional items to your reward like another battery or charger? Don't worry, adding items to your reward is easy:

1. Choose a reward level.

You must choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. 

2. If you want to add something, check out the Add-On menu.

If you want something additional to your reward, check out the Add-On menu above. If it's in the Add-On menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified above. You can only add things to your reward that are in the Add-On menu.

3. You're set!

Sit back, relax, and enjoy the ride.



Stretch Goals!

Bicycle Repair Kit @ $45000 

                           


Powerful Front LED Light @ $55000

                            


Rear Pannier @ $75000

How does referral work?

1. Log into your Indiegogo account or click here to signup for an Indiegogo account if you have not yet already created an account. 

2. Navigate to the Ampere and Surge campaign page and click the "link" icon on the left side of the campaign and then paste this link into an email to send to all your friends. Or click the Facebook, Twitter, or Google Plus icons to share your unique link on your social media accounts. 


3. View your total referral contribution amount by logging into your profile in the upper right and then click "Referrals".

Prizes!

Timeline


Risks and challenges

We have begun small batch manufacturing by leveraging our assets. We need your help to streamline our production and assembly process in order to increase production capacity; and this costs money. There are certainly challenges we may face during the streamlining phase of our project, after its been successfully funded. Fear not however, because our team has made several contingency plans for every roadblock on the way. 

We have thought of every potential obstacle we may face so that you don’t have to. We are ready to face challenges that are thrown at us and we will give our 100% to follow through even when faced with the toughest of these challenges. Even if for some reason we cannot deliver, we promise to be completely transparent and keep our backers informed and up-to-date on our progress. The range of professional competencies and experience our team has under its belt will undoubtedly Shocke you into a believer!

What makes us different is that we have completed all our supplier sourcing and product testing in advance. We have completed the final prototype for both Surge and Ampere; there will be no need for changes for any aspect of our bikes. You can be assured that there will be no hiccups or events that will delay shipment.

The team at Shocke Bikes have the experience and know-how in order to fulfill our set timeline. We were able to deliver on our previous campaign on time and without any issues. All of our previous backers were ecstatic about their bicycles. and we are sure you will love your Surge and/or Ampere.


Thank you!

Over the past year, we have worked very hard to bring our concept of Surge and Ampere into a prototype. Please spread the word, join the revolution, and help make Surge and Ampere a reality for cyclists everywhere.

It is only through your support that we can reach our fundraising goal of $40,000 and build a large production run of bicycles. 

Thank you so very much!

Hasan & the Shocke Bikes team


Shocke Bikes was founded in 2014 with the goal of bringing affordable high quality electric bicycles to North America. We want cycling to be a fun activity to a wide range of people, regardless of age, ability and gender.

   


Last year, through the support of hundreds of amazing people, we brought you Spark,the most versatile electric bicycle, to the market. We are proud to mention that we delivered the bicycle on time with all that we promised, and more. 

Since then we have made amazing connections with hundreds of people, and also learned a lot from our mistakes. Not only have we applied these lessons to Spark, but also to Ampere and Surge, bringing you two all-new urban electric bicycles like no other.


Testimonials



Contact us

If you have any questions you can either reach us through Indiegogo by directly messaging us, or by emailing us at info@shockebikes.com!


FAQs

Will I get charged right away if I pledge now?

Yes. Contributors are charged at the time of the transaction.

Can I order multiples of Surge/Ampere or combinations of both?

Yes, to claim multiple perks, please make a separate transaction for each perk. Feel free to leave a comment about any perks you'd like to see on the page!

Which is the right bicycle for me? Surge or Ampere?

We created an info-graph in the campaign to help you decide.

My pledge level includes numerous items. When will they all be delivered?

Excluding the accessories, all first batch productions will be shipped in March/April 2016. Second production cycle will be shipped June/July 2016. Accessories will be sent with the second batch of production.

How do I know if I am in the first production cycle or second production cycle?

There will be a description on the reward letting you know whether you are in the first production cycle or second production cycle. We will also send you a message letting you know. It's first come first serve, so do not delay pledging!

How will you know where to send my stuff?

Your shipping information and address will be collected during the check-out process. If you need to upgrade your shipping address, please email support@indiegogo.com.

When will the product be on the market after the campaign is over?

Once we have shipped to all of our backers we will release the product to the public. We will accept pre-orders from public but our Indiegogo backers will receive the bikes first at the best price.

How easy is it to operate an electric bike?

If you know how to ride a bicycle, you will know how to ride an electric bike. It's that simple!

Buying and Shipping

What are the shipping costs?

For all orders within the US and Canada, shipping is $169 per bicycle. Ordering more than one bicycle may reduce shipping costs per bicycle. 

When will my bike(s) arrive?

Excluding the accessories, all first batch productions will be shipped in March/April 2016. Second production cycle will be shipped June/July 2016.

Technical

Is there a warranty?

Shocke Bikes provides a 1 year warranty on Surge and Ampere that covers electrical and frame.

What is the recommended rider's height for Ampere?

Ampere is recommended for riders who are between 5'4" - 6'2".

What is the recommended rider's height for Surge?

Surge is recommended for riders who are between 5'6" - 6'4".

What is the rider weight limit?

Maximum recommended weight is 120kg (265lbs).

How much does Ampere and Surge weigh?

Approximately 21.5 kg (47.5 lbs) including the battery for both Surge and Ampere.

What about leaving Surge/Ampere out in the rain?

The motor and battery are adequately sealed from the rain, and are thus protected.

Do I need a license?

No. Surge and Ampere's motors are programmed to go no more than 32 km/hr (20 mph) on throttle mode alone (no pedaling), and therefore do not require a license to operate in Canada/ USA. Local bylaw may vary, so please check the bylaw before operation.

Do I have to pedal?

No. Surge and Ampere can operate by simply applying the thumb throttle without pedaling. However, in order to get exercise and extend the range of the battery, we highly recommend that you pedal as well.

Can I ride Surge/Ampere as a regular bicycle, without the electric power?

Yes, and it is very easy to switch back and forth. For example, you may use the power only when you are going up hills and turn it off for level ground and downhill riding to save battery power.

Is the battery replaceable?

Most definitely. The battery is very easy to take out and swap with a new one.

Does Surge and Ampere come assembled?

You will receive your new Surge and Ampere 80% assembled. All you will need to do is twist and tighten the handlebars, tighten the front wheel, plug in the seat and pedals, and tighten them. The shipping container would be much larger (think of the handlebars and pedals in place) with 100% assembly, so shipping the eBike only 80% assembled allows us to cut costs and pass the savings to you. We will provide an installation and operation manual.

How many charges can I get out of a battery?

Shocke Bikes uses Samsung lithium-ion battery technology. Each battery will provide approximately 1000 “full” charges. The battery has no memory effect, so if you recharge the battery when it is only 50% depleted, that counts as only half a charge. The amount of charges will also be impacted by factors such as temperature.

What is the range I can get from a single charge?

You can expect about 45 miles (70 km) on a single charge for Surge or Ampere, and often times you might go even further. If you only use the throttle, you can expect Surge and Ampere to have a 22 miles (35 km) range. Range will also be impacted by other factors, such as battery capacity, hills, wind resistance and your size.

Contact us
If you have any questions you can either reach us through Indiegogo by directly messaging us, or by emailing us at info@shockebikes.com!
