Surge is recommended for riders who are between 5'6" - 6'4".
What is the rider weight limit?
Maximum recommended weight is 120kg (265lbs).
How much does Ampere and Surge weigh?
Approximately 21.5 kg (47.5 lbs) including the battery for both Surge and Ampere.
What about leaving Surge/Ampere out in the rain?
The motor and battery are adequately sealed from the rain, and are thus protected.
Do I need a license?
No. Surge and Ampere's motors are programmed to go no more than 32 km/hr (20 mph) on throttle mode alone (no pedaling), and therefore do not require a license to operate in Canada/ USA. Local bylaw may vary, so please check the bylaw before operation.
Do I have to pedal?


No.
Surge and Ampere can operate by simply applying the thumb throttle without
pedaling. However, in order to get exercise and extend the range of the
battery, we highly recommend that you pedal as well.
Can
I ride Surge/Ampere as a regular bicycle, without the electric power? 
Yes, and it is very easy to switch back and forth. For example, you may
use the power only when you are going up hills and turn it off for level ground
and downhill riding to save battery power.


Is
the battery replaceable?
Most
definitely. The battery is very easy to take out and swap with a new one.
Does Surge and Ampere come assembled?
You
will receive your new Surge and Ampere 80% assembled. All you will need to do
is twist and tighten the handlebars, tighten the front wheel, plug in the seat
and pedals, and tighten them. The shipping container would be much larger (think of
the handlebars and pedals in place) with 100% assembly, so shipping the eBike
only 80% assembled allows us to cut costs and pass the savings to you. We will provide an installation and operation manual.


How
many charges can I get out of a battery?
Shocke
Bikes uses Samsung lithium-ion battery technology. Each battery will provide
approximately 1000 “full” charges. The battery has no memory effect, so if you
recharge the battery when it is only 50% depleted, that counts as only half a
charge. The amount of charges will also be impacted by factors such as
temperature.
What
is the range I can get from a single charge?
You
can expect about 45 miles (70 km) on a single charge for Surge or Ampere, and
often times you might go even further. If you only use the throttle, you can
expect Surge and Ampere to have a 22 miles (35 km) range. Range will also be impacted by
other factors, such as battery capacity, hills, wind resistance and your size.

story:
INTRODUCING REVOLIGHTS ECLIPSE+

LIGHTING THE WAY TO A SMARTER BICYCLE

Hello Indiegogo! It’s us, Revolights - great to meet you! We have some big things to share with you and we want to invite you to join us in making the roads safer for riders and drivers alike.

We're here on Indiegogo to bring to life a connected edition of our brand new Revolights Eclipse, called Eclipse+. With the Eclipse+ we've been able to make our lighting system smarter than ever before. Eclipse+ offers the same great functionality as Eclipse, but also adds Bluetooth connectivity to enable awesome new features through the new Revolights App.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

 

IN THE PRESS

"This new smart bike lighting system changes commuting forever"

HIGHSNOBIETY

"Eclipse might even be more advanced than a car"

MAXIM

"Revolights keep you visible, safe, and more connected than almost anything on the road"

UNCRATE

PRODUCT FEATURES

                                                                                                 

                                                        

MEET ECLIPSE, THE NEXT GENERATION OF REVOLIGHTS

Incorporating user feedback, Eclipse is the continuation of our quest to create higher safety standards for night time bike riding and making Revolights the most visible and functional bicycle lighting system on the market.                                                 

EASIER TO INSTALL, EASIER TO USE

We've made the installation of Revolights much easier with Eclipse. By eliminating cables and introducing a new rechargeable snap-in battery, the lights now have a streamlined, low-profile design.

 

Eclipse now integrates the rechargeable battery directly in the rings themselves, thereby making the on/off switch more accessible and removing any need for cables and parts on the spokes or in the hub.                                                                                                                         

 

It only takes a few minutes to install the lights. We are confident that anyone with any level of bicycle knowledge can get Revolights installed onto a bike. We also provide support through a number of avenues: with a detailed instruction book, instruction videos, our hotline, live chat and email.                

 

SETTING A NEW STANDARD

Traditional bike lights focus heavily on forward path illumination, use only a small blinking red light for rear visibility, and provide little to no side visibility. This leaves cyclists vulnerable and drivers straining to see them.

Our approach to bicycle lighting is different. Eclipse is the only 360º bicycle lighting solution that provides a legal headlight, functional brake light, and unmatched side visibility.                                                                                                                                                     

  

MEET ECLIPSE+ AND THE REVOLIGHTS APP

Eclipse+ is our long awaited connected version of the Revolights product line. Now with the added technology in Eclipse+, an entirely new dimension of functionality is possible. Eclipse+ will be a different model than Eclipse and will include bluetooth connectivity, new functions, and integrations with the Revolights App.                                                                                                                
The Revolights App is currently still in development, but we’ve planned out a set of key features aimed at enhancing your commute, which you'll be able to access through the Revolights App on smart phones as well as a number of wearables with Eclipse+. The app will be compatible with Apple and Android devices and we will ideally add support for other platforms as well going forward.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
While more features are in planning, the combination of Revolights App and Eclipse+ will give you access to a new dimension of functionality, such as:                                                                                                                                
• Turn Signals • Weather Alerts
• Ride Tracking • Achievement Tracking
• Remote On/Off • Auto On/Off
• Time of Day Sensor • Battery Status
                                                                                                                           
RIDE TRACKING
With the App, we will have a tailored set of ride tracking features. You’ll be able to track your distance, miles per hour, compete in challenges, and set goals.
 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
COMMUTER TOOLS
We’ve also included new tools on the Revolights App to help make sure your commute goes smoothly. For instance, the Revolights App includes an intelligent weather forecast that helps to remind you to bring a coat in case it rains later or let you know that it’ll be sunny for the entire ride.
 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
SMARTER LIGHTS
The Revolights App now enables a whole new set of features that add even more functionality to the lights. With the Revolights App, you’ll be able to check your battery life and remotely turn on/off the lights. By sensing the time of day, your lights can also automatically turn on when you need light, like when you are about to ride at night or when the sun is setting.                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
TURN SIGNALS
Since our first version we’ve received countless requests for turn signals and now with Eclipse+, we’re thrilled to be offering this functionality. You’ll be able to indicate which way you’re turning through our handlebar mounted control pad, through the app, or through gesture recognition with a supported smart watch. On activation, the rear light will indicate the direction on the respective side through blinking full circle.
    
                                                                                                                                                                                          
FEATURE COMPARISON
 
  ECLIPSE ECLIPSE+
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

HOW IT WORKS

The patented Revolights design consists of four narrow rings of LEDs, two white and two red, which mount directly to the front and rear wheels of your bicycle with the help of four spoke clips per wheel. The lights are powered by a USB-rechargeable battery that snaps directly into the rings. 

                                 .

Each wheel consists of 24 equally spaced bright LEDs, with 8 on at any given moment.  A fork-mounted magnet and an integrated accelerometer provide speed and orientation data to the rings, allowing the LEDs to illuminate only when oriented at the front or rear of the bicycle.                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                      By constantly tracking your wheel speed, Revolights is able to detect when you hit the brakes and alert traffic with a first of it’s kind brake light. Once a change in speed is sensed the red will flash at a rapid rate informing tailing traffic that you are decreasing speed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Unlike traditional spotlight style headlights, Revolights patented design creates a spread of light, lighting up the ground as well as elevated objects like street signs. The forward projecting headlight also meets all requirements to be recognized as a legal headlight in the U.S.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

 

REVOLIGHTS & PURE FIX CYCLES

Since 2010 Pure Fix Cycles has been building stylish bicycles for everyone, from those who are just starting out, getting back into biking after a few years away, or just wanting to get a feel for riding fixed!

To celebrate the launch of Eclipse, we’ve partnered with Pure Fix Cycles to bring you special edition bicycles with Revolights already installed exclusively for Indiegogo. Whether you’re an everyday commuter or a more casual rider, we have you covered with the Revolights Coolidge and the Revolights Arroyo bicycles.

The premium series Revolights Coolidge comes street-ready with wrapped drop bars and Eclipse+ already installed and the Revolights Arroyo is a 3-speed step through made for relaxed and comfortable cruising and comes with Eclipse+ pre-installed.

 

REVOLIGHTS COOLIDGE

           

 

           

                                                                             

 

REVOLIGHTS ARROYO

                                                        

             

 

           

                                                                                                                                                               

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

CAMPAIGN

What is the difference between Eclipse and Eclipse+?

FEATURES

How long is the battery life?

4 hours and they are recharged via USB.

How bright is the headlight?

There are a total of 24 LEDs on each wheel, 8 of which of are lit up at any given moment. Each LED is rated at over 35 lumens, but since our LEDs are continually rotating and lumens are a unit of flux (light/area) the most accurate description would be: Revolights brightness = 8 LEDs x 35 lumens each.

What is the weight of Revolights?

The complete weight is 11 oz per wheel.

How are Revolights installed?

Revolights have four ball-and-socket brackets that snap onto your spokes for easy attachment.

How are Revolights theft resistant?

Preventing thievery was an important consideration during the design phase. Because Revolights consist of a solid-ring body welded together during fabrication, the wheel must be removed from the bike in order to remove the Revolights. When you lock up your bike and wheels, you’re also locking up your Revolights.

COMPATIBILITY

What size wheels do Revolights fit?

700c wheels with a tire width of 38mm or less, spoke counts that are multiples of four, and have a front fork/rear chainstay opening is 40mm or more. Revolights for 700c/27inch wheels will also fit a 29" tire, however generally the tires are quite wide (the max we support is 38mm). So depending on tires size you have they may block the ability for the lights to act as a headlight and taillight, but you will still have side visibility.

Will Revolights fit with 700c wheels that have a tire width that is wider than 38mm?

Revolights will still fit a tire width of 38mm or more but the tire will block the ability for the lights to act as a headlight and taillight, but you will still have side visibility.

Will Revolights work with fenders?

Revolights will work with fenders. However, if you have a rear fender the rear projection of light will be partially blocked from directly behind depending on how long the fenders are but the sides will still be completely visible.

Are Revolights compatible with disc brakes?

Revolights are compatible with disc brakes.

Can Revolights handle wet and snow conditions?

We went to great lengths to design Revolights to stand up to wet conditions. The electronics are fully sealed effectively isolating them from the environment. That said, exposure to salt or alkaline dust on the roads creates issues for most electronics, Revolights included. Lithium batteries can also slow their discharge rate during long-term exposure to extreme cold.

 

If you have any other questions, please email us at indiegogo@revolights.com

                                                                                                                                                                      By constantly tracking your wheel speed, Revolights is able to detect when you hit the brakes and alert traffic with a first of it’s kind brake light. Once a change in speed is sensed the red will flash at a rapid rate informing tailing traffic that you are decreasing speed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Unlike traditional spotlight style headlights, Revolights patented design creates a spread of light, lighting up the ground as well as elevated objects like street signs. The forward projecting headlight also meets all requirements to be recognized as a legal headlight in the U.S.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
 

REVOLIGHTS & PURE FIX CYCLES

Since 2010 Pure Fix Cycles has been building stylish bicycles for everyone, from those who are just starting out, getting back into biking after a few years away, or just wanting to get a feel for riding fixed!To celebrate the launch of Eclipse, we’ve partnered with Pure Fix Cycles to bring you special edition bicycles with Revolights already installed exclusively for Indiegogo. Whether you’re an everyday commuter or a more casual rider, we have you covered with the Revolights Coolidge and the Revolights Arroyo bicycles.
The premium series Revolights Coolidge comes street-ready with wrapped drop bars and Eclipse+ already installed and the Revolights Arroyo is a 3-speed step through made for relaxed and comfortable cruising and comes with Eclipse+ pre-installed. 
REVOLIGHTS COOLIDGE
           

                                                                                         
 

REVOLIGHTS ARROYO                                                                      
 
           

                                                                                                                                                               

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

CAMPAIGN
 What is the difference between Eclipse and Eclipse+?
FEATURES
How long is the battery life? 4 hours and they are recharged via USB.How bright is the headlight? There are a total of 24 LEDs on each wheel, 8 of which of are lit up at any given moment. Each LED is rated at over 35 lumens, but since our LEDs are continually rotating and lumens are a unit of flux (light/area) the most accurate description would be: Revolights brightness = 8 LEDs x 35 lumens each.What is the weight of Revolights? The complete weight is 11 oz per wheel.How are Revolights installed? Revolights have four ball-and-socket brackets that snap onto your spokes for easy attachment.How are Revolights theft resistant? Preventing thievery was an important consideration during the design phase. Because Revolights consist of a solid-ring body welded together during fabrication, the wheel must be removed from the bike in order to remove the Revolights. When you lock up your bike and wheels, you’re also locking up your Revolights.
COMPATIBILITY
What size wheels do Revolights fit? 700c wheels with a tire width of 38mm or less, spoke counts that are multiples of four, and have a front fork/rear chainstay opening is 40mm or more. Revolights for 700c/27inch wheels will also fit a 29" tire, however generally the tires are quite wide (the max we support is 38mm). So depending on tires size you have they may block the ability for the lights to act as a headlight and taillight, but you will still have side visibility.Will Revolights fit with 700c wheels that have a tire width that is wider than 38mm? Revolights will still fit a tire width of 38mm or more but the tire will block the ability for the lights to act as a headlight and taillight, but you will still have side visibility.Will Revolights work with fenders? Revolights will work with fenders. However, if you have a rear fender the rear projection of light will be partially blocked from directly behind depending on how long the fenders are but the sides will still be completely visible.Are Revolights compatible with disc brakes? Revolights are compatible with disc brakes.Can Revolights handle wet and snow conditions? We went to great lengths to design Revolights to stand up to wet conditions. The electronics are fully sealed effectively isolating them from the environment. That said, exposure to salt or alkaline dust on the roads creates issues for most electronics, Revolights included. Lithium batteries can also slow their discharge rate during long-term exposure to extreme cold. 
If you have any other questions, please email us at indiegogo@revolights.com

story:
I LOCK IT is a fully automatic smart bike lock that is fixed to your bike frame. It locks and unlocks your bike automatically using Bluetooth low energy technology. 

So no more pulling out your keys and struggling with your bike lock, you can just leave your bike and be sure it's safe.

I LOCK IT lets you enjoy life without the need to think about keys or bike locks. Just get on your bike and ride. And if you want to stop somewhere you can just leave your bike and be sure it's safe. Making sure your bike is safe has never been easier.


I LOCK IT offers many different features to help protect your bike: 



When you get off your bike I LOCK IT measures the distance to your smartphone. As soon as you walk away from your bike I LOCK IT will move a 64 mm² thick stainless steel bolt through the rear wheel. This immobilizes your bike and prevents theft.

With I LOCK IT you don't have to pull out your keys or press any buttons. You can just walk away and be sure your bike is safe. 

While automatic locking is a great feature you can also lock your bike by using your smartphone or by pressing the button on I LOCK IT. This gives you the flexibility to choose how you want to lock your bike.

 

Once in general proximity to your bike I LOCK IT automatically connects to your smartphone. And once you get closer to your bike it will automatically unlock for you.

No need to search for your keys. Just get on your bike and ride.

And if you just pass by your bike I LOCK IT will automatically unlock and lock again. So your bike will even be safe if you don't use it.



We build I LOCK IT with strong and durable materials to prevent your bike from being stolen. And to give you an extra layer of security we also added an alarm feature. The alarm works just like your car alarm and is automatically activated when I LOCK IT is locked.

If the alarm is active and someone tries to lift up your bike or tries to cut the locking bolt I LOCK IT will recognize this and set off a 110 dB loud alarm. This will scare the thief away and raise the attention of anyone in the area.

Additional to the acoustic alarm I LOCK IT will send a notification to your smartphone* if the alarm gets activated. So if you are in a shop or cafe nearby you can still react and protect your bike.

*Using Bluetooth technology notifications are possible in a range of up to 100 m/ 330 feet. 

I LOCK IT uses smartphones to authenticate the user, so no need to think about keys.

Using Bluetooth low energy technology the I LOCK IT app is compatible with iOS (5+) and Android (4.4+) devices. And once the app is running you never have to pull your smartphone out of your pocket again.

 

You don't have a smartphone or you simply don't want to take it with you riding? We've got you covered.

The optional I LOCK IT key fob works independent of a smartphone and also offers you automatic locking and unlocking. Additionally, you can lock and unlock I LOCK IT by pressing the key fob button.

With an integrated acoustic alarm, the key fob also offers theft notifications.

 

Forgot your phone or your battery died? Just enter your customized 8-digit code and I LOCK IT will unlock for you. The code can be easily customized in the I LOCK IT smartphone app.

And to lock your bike after you are done riding you just have to press the button on I LOCK IT.



 

 You want to let your friends or family use your bike, but you're not around to give them the key? 

With the I LOCK IT App you can easily share your bike with just a couple of clicks. Sharing your bike has never been easier.

 

I LOCK IT with its integrated alarm offers high security for your bike. But sometimes you might want to leave your bike for a longer time and secure it with a fixed object.  

That's why we created a special cable which can be easily plugged into I LOCK IT. Plugging the cable in is easy, fast and no extra lock is required.

Now bike thieves would have to break the lock and the cable. All while the loud alarm attracts everybody's attention. 

The plug-in cable has a diameter of 10 mm / 0.4" and a length of 90 cm / 35".

Update: New plug-in chain is now also available. The chain has a length of 80 cm / 31" and weighs 700 g / 1,5 lbs.

 



Are you always forgetting where you left your bike? From now on the I LOCK IT App will make sure you don't have to search anymore. 

Every time you are done using your bike the I LOCK IT App will save the last position you left your bike at. So next time you want to go for a ride, just check your app and know where your bike is.

Note: I LOCK IT doesn't have an integrated GPS so tracking your bike in case it got stolen is currently not possible.

The basic configuration of I LOCK IT is set to fit most users needs.  But if you prefer your own settings the I LOCK IT App lets you customize many of the functions to fit your needs.


The following functions can be enabled and disabled:
  • Auto-unlocking
  • Auto-locking 
  • Alarm & theft notifications
  • Tracking
  • Click Code unlocking
When the auto-unlocking or auto-locking functions are active you can also change the proximity for locking and unlocking.

 

 

  

 

I LOCK IT is compatible with most bikes. To see if I LOCK IT fits your bike just follow these two easy steps:


1. Measure the distance from your rear bike rim to the top of the tire (or the fender). If the distance is less than 106 mm / 4.1 inches check step 2.

2. Measure how thick the tire is. If it's less than 64 mm / 2.5 inches I LOCK IT will fit your bike.
 
Your bike doesn't fit those measurements? Please send us a message to info@ilockit.bike and tell us your bike model. This way we can double check if there is another possibility to fit I LOCK IT to your bike.

I LOCK IT can be installed with a few quick steps. Just watch the videos below to see how it's done.

  • For bikes with mounting holes:
 
  • For bikes without mounting holes:
 The adapters used in the video for bikes without mounting holes are called "trelock zr 20". They are widely available online. Other adapters for wheel locks will most likely work as well.

 

 


 

The name of the company behind I LOCK IT is haveltec. Haveltec is a young startup which develops products that make life easier and more comfortable. To achieve this we use the latest technology in a way that it allows a simple and outstanding user experience. This way you can interact naturally with these products while the technology does all the complicated work in the background. The haveltec team already has several years of experience in designing and developing products and now brings this knowledge together to bring I LOCK IT into the market.
 https://www.facebook.com/ILOCKIT.bike


 


 

 

I LOCK IT ist ein vollautomatisches, smartes Fahrradschloss welches fest mit deinem Fahrradrahmen verbunden ist. Es verriegelt und entriegelt dein Fahrrad automatisch durch die Verwendung von Bluetooth Low Energy Technologie.

Mit I LOCK IT musst du keinen Schlüssel in der Hosentasche suchen und dich nicht mehr über dein sperriges Fahrradschloss ärgern. Stattdessen kannst du einfach dein Fahrrad abstellen und du weißt, dass es gesichert ist.

I LOCK IT lässt dich das Leben genießen, ohne über Fahrradschlösser und Schlüssel nachdenken zu müssen. Du kannst einfach aufsteigen und losfahren. Und wenn du irgendwo anhältst kannst du einfach dein Fahrrad abstellen, ohne dich um irgendwas kümmern zu müssen. Dein Fahrrad zu sichern war noch nie so einfach.


I LOCK IT bietet dir viele verschiedene Funktionen welche dabei helfen dein Fahrrad zu schützen:

Sobald du von deinem Fahrrad absteigst beginnt I LOCK IT damit die Distanz zu deinem Smartphone zu ermitteln. Bewegst du dich nun von deinem Fahrrad weg verriegelt I LOCK IT dein Hinterrad mit einem 64 mm² starken Schließbolzen aus rostfreiem Edelstahl. Dies verhindert, dass jemand mit deinem Fahrrad wegfahren kann.

MIT I LOCK IT musst du weder deinen Schlüssel suchen, noch irgendwelche Knöpfe betätigen. Du kannst dich einfach von deinem Fahrrad weg bewegen und dir sicher sein, dass es abgeschlossen ist.

Um dir mehr Flexibilität zu bieten kannst du I LOCK IT auch durch dein Smartphone oder den I LOCK IT Taster verriegeln. Dies ermöglicht dir eine Benutzung nach deinen Vorstellungen.

Sobald du in der Umgebung deines Fahrrads bist stellt I LOCK IT automatisch eine Verbindung zu deinem Smartphone her. Und sobald du dich nun auf dein Fahrrad zubewegst wird dein Fahrrad automatisch entriegelt.

Keine Suche nach dem Schlüssel mehr. Einfach aufsteigen und losfahren.

Und falls du mal an deinem Fahrrad vorbei gehst, ohne es zu benutzen dann schließt I LOCK IT automatisch auf und wieder zu. Dein Fahrrad ist also immer sicher, auch wenn du es nicht benutzt.

I LOCK IT wird aus langlebigen und widerstandsfähigen Materialien gefertigt, um dein Fahrrad vor Dieben zu schützen. Für einen zusätzlichen Schutz haben wir zudem eine Alarmanlage integriert. Der Alarm funktioniert wie deine Alarmanlage im Auto und ist automatisch aktiv, sobald I LOCK IT dein Fahrrad abgeschlossen hat.

Ist der Alarm aktiv und jemand versucht dein Fahrrad weg zu tragen oder den Schließbolzen zu durchtrennen löst I LOCK IT einen 110 dB lauten Alarm aus. Dies schreckt den Dieb ab und alarmiert jeden der sich in der Nähe befindet.

Zusätzlich zum akustischen Alarm sendet I LOCK IT dir eine Benachrichtigung auf dein Smartphone* sobald der Alarm aktiviert wird. Wenn du also im Supermarkt oder im Café nebenan bist kannst du zusätzlich reagieren und nach deinem Fahrrad sehen.

*Durch die Benutzung von Bluetooth Technologie sind Benachrichtigungen in einem Umkreis von max. 100 m möglich.

I LOCK IT benutzt dein Smartphone, um dich zu authentifizieren, du musst also nicht an deinen Schlüssel denken.

Durch die Benutzung von Bluetooth Low Energy ist die I LOCK IT App mit iOS (5+) und Android (4.4+) Geräten kompatibel. Sobald die App einmal aktiv ist musst du dein Smartphone nicht mehr aus deiner Tasche holen.

Du besitzt kein Smartphone oder willst es einfach nicht zum Fahrradfahren mitnehmen? Wir haben eine Lösung für dich.

Der optionale I LOCK IT Handsender funktioniert unabhängig von einem Smartphone und ermöglicht dir ebenfalls das automatische Verriegeln und Entriegeln deines Fahrrades.

Du hast dein Smartphone vergessen oder der Akku ist leer? Gib einfach deinen 8-stelligen Code ein und I LOCK IT schließt für dich auf. Der Code kann ganz einfach in der I LOCK IT Smartphone App konfiguriert werden. Und wenn du deine Fahrt beendet hast kannst du ganz einfach den Taster nochmals betätigen und I LOCK IT schließt wieder ab.

Du hast dein Smartphone vergessen oder der Akku ist leer? Gib einfach deinen 8-stelligen Code ein und I LOCK IT schließt für dich auf. Der Code kann ganz einfach in der I LOCK IT Smartphone App konfiguriert werden. Und wenn du deine Fahrt beendet hast kannst du ganz einfach den Taster nochmals betätigen und I LOCK IT schließt wieder ab.

Du willst Freunden oder deiner Familie dein Fahrrad ausleihen, bist aber nicht da um den Schlüssel zu übergeben? Mit der I LOCK IT App kannst du dein Fahrrad ganz einfach durch ein paar Klicks freigeben. Dein Fahrrad zu teilen war noch nie so einfach.

I LOCK IT bietet durch das widerstandsfähige Gehäuse und dem integrierten Alarmsystem bereits eine hohe Sicherheit für dein Fahrrad. Manchmal willst du jedoch dein Fahrrad für eine längere Zeit abstellen und es mit einem festen Gegenstand verbinden.

Für diesen Fall haben wir ein spezielles Einsteckkabel entwickelt. Dieses kann ganz einfach um einen festen Gegenstand wie einen Fahrradständer gelegt und anschließend in I LOCK IT eingesteckt werden. Dies geht schnell, einfach und ganz ohne Schlüssel. Ein zweites Fahrradschloss ist also nicht notwendig. 

Will ein Fahrraddieb nun dein Fahrrad stehlen muss er den Schließbügel und das Kabel zerstören und dies während der laute Alarmton jeden in der Umgebung darauf aufmerksam macht. 

Das Einsteckkabel hat einen Durchmesser von 10 mm und eine Länge von 90 cm.

Update: Eine Einsteckkette ist nun ebenfalls erhältlich. Die Kette hat eine Länge von 80 cm und wiegt 700 g.

 

Du vergisst immer wo du dein Fahrrad abgestellt hast? Die I LOCK IT App sagt dir in Zukunft wo dein Fahrrad steht, damit du nicht mehr danach suchen musst. Sobald dein Fahrrad abgestellt ist und I LOCK IT verriegelt merkt sich dein Smartphone die aktuelle Position deines Fahrrades. Das nächste Mal, wenn du damit fahren willst, kannst du also einfach in der App nachsehen wo du es abgestellt hast.

Hinweis: I LOCK IT verfügt über kein integriertes GPS. Ein Tracking des Fahrrades im Diebstahlfall ist daher aktuell nicht möglich.

I LOCK IT ist automatisch so konfiguriert, dass es die meisten Besitzer glücklich macht. Wenn du dir dennoch eine individuelle Konfiguration der Funktionen wünschst dann ist dies über die I LOCK IT App ganz einfach möglich. Die folgenden Funktionen können ein- und ausgeschaltet werden: 

•  Automatisches Abschließen 
•  Automatisches Aufschließen 
•  Akustischer Alarm & Diebstahlbenachrichtigung
•  Tracking
•  Klick-Code Aufschließen 

Wenn das automatisches Aufschließen oder Abschließen aktiv ist kann zudem der Abstand hierfür konfiguriert werden.


  

 

I LOCK IT passt an die meisten Fahrräder. Um zu sehen ob es auch an deins passt kannst du ganz einfach die folgenden zwei Schritte durchführen:

1. Messe die Distanz zwischen der Unterkannte deiner Hinterradfelge und der Oberkante deines Rades (oder Schutzblechs). Ist die Distanz geringer als 106 mm dann überprüfe bitte den zweiten Schritt.

2. Messe wie dick dein Reifen ist. Ist diese Distanz geringer als 64 mm dann passt I LOCK IT an dein Fahrrad.

I LOCK IT scheint nicht an dein Fahrrad zu passen? Schick uns bitte eine Nachricht an info@ilockit.bike, nenne uns dein Fahrrad Model und wir prüfen, ob I LOCK IT eventuell anders installiert werden kann.


I LOCK IT kann mit ein paar einfachen Schritten am Fahrrad installiert werden. Schau dir einfach die Videos an, um zu sehen wie es funktioniert.

• Für Fahrräder mit Befestigungslöcher für Rahmenschlösser

  • Für Fahrräder ohne Befestigungslöcher

Die im Video für Fahrräder ohne Befestigungslöcher benutzten Adapter haben die Bezeichnung „trelock zr 20“. Diese sind in vielen Onlineshops erhältlich. Andere Adapter für Rahmenschlösser können ebenfalls mit I LOCK IT kompatibel sein.


 


Die Firma hinter I LOCK IT heißt haveltec. Haveltec ist ein junges Startup Unternehmen welches Produkte entwickelt, die das Leben einfacher und komfortabler machen. Um dies zu ermöglichen benutzen wir die neuste Technologie und verbinden sie mit einer außergewöhnlichen Benutzerfreundlichkeit. Dies ermöglicht die natürliche Benutzung von Gegenständen während die Technologie die komplexen Dinge im Hintergrund erledigt. Das haveltec Team besitzt bereits mehrere Jahre Erfahrung in der Konstruktion und Entwicklung von Produkten und nutzt diese Erfahrung nun um I LOCK IT in den Markt zu bringen.

https://www.facebook.com/ILOCKIT.bike

Sobald du von deinem Fahrrad absteigst beginnt I LOCK IT damit die Distanz zu deinem Smartphone zu ermitteln. Bewegst du dich nun von deinem Fahrrad weg verriegelt I LOCK IT dein Hinterrad mit einem 64 mm² starken Schließbolzen aus rostfreiem Edelstahl. Dies verhindert, dass jemand mit deinem Fahrrad wegfahren kann.
MIT I LOCK IT musst du weder deinen Schlüssel suchen, noch irgendwelche Knöpfe betätigen. Du kannst dich einfach von deinem Fahrrad weg bewegen und dir sicher sein, dass es abgeschlossen ist.
Um dir mehr Flexibilität zu bieten kannst du I LOCK IT auch durch dein Smartphone oder den I LOCK IT Taster verriegeln. Dies ermöglicht dir eine Benutzung nach deinen Vorstellungen.

 


  

Sobald du in der Umgebung deines Fahrrads bist stellt I LOCK IT automatisch eine Verbindung zu deinem Smartphone her. Und sobald du dich nun auf dein Fahrrad zubewegst wird dein Fahrrad automatisch entriegelt.
Keine Suche nach dem Schlüssel mehr. Einfach aufsteigen und losfahren.
Und falls du mal an deinem Fahrrad vorbei gehst, ohne es zu benutzen dann schließt I LOCK IT automatisch auf und wieder zu. Dein Fahrrad ist also immer sicher, auch wenn du es nicht benutzt.

  


I LOCK IT wird aus langlebigen und widerstandsfähigen Materialien gefertigt, um dein Fahrrad vor Dieben zu schützen. Für einen zusätzlichen Schutz haben wir zudem eine Alarmanlage integriert. Der Alarm funktioniert wie deine Alarmanlage im Auto und ist automatisch aktiv, sobald I LOCK IT dein Fahrrad abgeschlossen hat.
Ist der Alarm aktiv und jemand versucht dein Fahrrad weg zu tragen oder den Schließbolzen zu durchtrennen löst I LOCK IT einen 110 dB lauten Alarm aus. Dies schreckt den Dieb ab und alarmiert jeden der sich in der Nähe befindet.

  

Zusätzlich zum akustischen Alarm sendet I LOCK IT dir eine Benachrichtigung auf dein Smartphone* sobald der Alarm aktiviert wird. Wenn du also im Supermarkt oder im Café nebenan bist kannst du zusätzlich reagieren und nach deinem Fahrrad sehen.
*Durch die Benutzung von Bluetooth Technologie sind Benachrichtigungen in einem Umkreis von max. 100 m möglich.

  

I LOCK IT benutzt dein Smartphone, um dich zu authentifizieren, du musst also nicht an deinen Schlüssel denken.
Durch die Benutzung von Bluetooth Low Energy ist die I LOCK IT App mit iOS (5+) und Android (4.4+) Geräten kompatibel. Sobald die App einmal aktiv ist musst du dein Smartphone nicht mehr aus deiner Tasche holen.

 


  

Du besitzt kein Smartphone oder willst es einfach nicht zum Fahrradfahren mitnehmen? Wir haben eine Lösung für dich.
Der optionale I LOCK IT Handsender funktioniert unabhängig von einem Smartphone und ermöglicht dir ebenfalls das automatische Verriegeln und Entriegeln deines Fahrrades.

  

Du hast dein Smartphone vergessen oder der Akku ist leer? Gib einfach deinen 8-stelligen Code ein und I LOCK IT schließt für dich auf. Der Code kann ganz einfach in der I LOCK IT Smartphone App konfiguriert werden. Und wenn du deine Fahrt beendet hast kannst du ganz einfach den Taster nochmals betätigen und I LOCK IT schließt wieder ab.

  

Du hast dein Smartphone vergessen oder der Akku ist leer? Gib einfach deinen 8-stelligen Code ein und I LOCK IT schließt für dich auf. Der Code kann ganz einfach in der I LOCK IT Smartphone App konfiguriert werden. Und wenn du deine Fahrt beendet hast kannst du ganz einfach den Taster nochmals betätigen und I LOCK IT schließt wieder ab.

  


Du willst Freunden oder deiner Familie dein Fahrrad ausleihen, bist aber nicht da um den Schlüssel zu übergeben? Mit der I LOCK IT App kannst du dein Fahrrad ganz einfach durch ein paar Klicks freigeben. Dein Fahrrad zu teilen war noch nie so einfach.

 


  

I LOCK IT bietet durch das widerstandsfähige Gehäuse und dem integrierten Alarmsystem bereits eine hohe Sicherheit für dein Fahrrad. Manchmal willst du jedoch dein Fahrrad für eine längere Zeit abstellen und es mit einem festen Gegenstand verbinden.
Für diesen Fall haben wir ein spezielles Einsteckkabel entwickelt. Dieses kann ganz einfach um einen festen Gegenstand wie einen Fahrradständer gelegt und anschließend in I LOCK IT eingesteckt werden. Dies geht schnell, einfach und ganz ohne Schlüssel. Ein zweites Fahrradschloss ist also nicht notwendig. 
Will ein Fahrraddieb nun dein Fahrrad stehlen muss er den Schließbügel und das Kabel zerstören und dies während der laute Alarmton jeden in der Umgebung darauf aufmerksam macht. 
Das Einsteckkabel hat einen Durchmesser von 10 mm und eine Länge von 90 cm.
Update: Eine Einsteckkette ist nun ebenfalls erhältlich. Die Kette hat eine Länge von 80 cm und wiegt 700 g.

  

 



Du vergisst immer wo du dein Fahrrad abgestellt hast? Die I LOCK IT App sagt dir in Zukunft wo dein Fahrrad steht, damit du nicht mehr danach suchen musst. Sobald dein Fahrrad abgestellt ist und I LOCK IT verriegelt merkt sich dein Smartphone die aktuelle Position deines Fahrrades. Das nächste Mal, wenn du damit fahren willst, kannst du also einfach in der App nachsehen wo du es abgestellt hast.
Hinweis: I LOCK IT verfügt über kein integriertes GPS. Ein Tracking des Fahrrades im Diebstahlfall ist daher aktuell nicht möglich.

  

I LOCK IT ist automatisch so konfiguriert, dass es die meisten Besitzer glücklich macht. Wenn du dir dennoch eine individuelle Konfiguration der Funktionen wünschst dann ist dies über die I LOCK IT App ganz einfach möglich. Die folgenden Funktionen können ein- und ausgeschaltet werden: 
•  Automatisches Abschließen •  Automatisches Aufschließen •  Akustischer Alarm & Diebstahlbenachrichtigung •  Tracking •  Klick-Code Aufschließen 
Wenn das automatisches Aufschließen oder Abschließen aktiv ist kann zudem der Abstand hierfür konfiguriert werden.


 


  

  

 



Update: neue Dimensionen für überarbeitete I LOCK IT Version wie im Update vorgestellt.

 

  

I LOCK IT passt an die meisten Fahrräder. Um zu sehen ob es auch an deins passt kannst du ganz einfach die folgenden zwei Schritte durchführen:
1.	Messe die Distanz zwischen der Unterkannte deiner Hinterradfelge und der Oberkante deines Rades (oder Schutzblechs). Ist die Distanz geringer als 106 mm dann überprüfe bitte den zweiten Schritt.




2.	Messe wie dick dein Reifen ist. Ist diese Distanz geringer als 64 mm dann passt I LOCK IT an dein Fahrrad.




I LOCK IT scheint nicht an dein Fahrrad zu passen? Schick uns bitte eine Nachricht an info@ilockit.bike, nenne uns dein Fahrrad Model und wir prüfen, ob I LOCK IT eventuell anders installiert werden kann.


  

I LOCK IT kann mit ein paar einfachen Schritten am Fahrrad installiert werden. Schau dir einfach die Videos an, um zu sehen wie es funktioniert.
•	Für Fahrräder mit Befestigungslöcher für Rahmenschlösser



Für Fahrräder ohne Befestigungslöcher



Die im Video für Fahrräder ohne Befestigungslöcher benutzten Adapter haben die Bezeichnung „trelock zr 20“. Diese sind in vielen Onlineshops erhältlich. Andere Adapter für Rahmenschlösser können ebenfalls mit I LOCK IT kompatibel sein.


 


  

 


Die Firma hinter I LOCK IT heißt haveltec. Haveltec ist ein junges Startup Unternehmen welches Produkte entwickelt, die das Leben einfacher und komfortabler machen. Um dies zu ermöglichen benutzen wir die neuste Technologie und verbinden sie mit einer außergewöhnlichen Benutzerfreundlichkeit. Dies ermöglicht die natürliche Benutzung von Gegenständen während die Technologie die komplexen Dinge im Hintergrund erledigt. Das haveltec Team besitzt bereits mehrere Jahre Erfahrung in der Konstruktion und Entwicklung von Produkten und nutzt diese Erfahrung nun um I LOCK IT in den Markt zu bringen.
https://www.facebook.com/ILOCKIT.bike

story:
ELECTRIC BIKE
NO LICENSE REQUIRED

CLASS 2/OPTIONAL CLASS 3/OPTIONAL OFF-ROAD

 

 

 

 

SCORPION IN NEW YORK CITY



 

Outrageous torque and acceleration with Scorpion’s 750W Motor/28mph speed or HyperScorpion’s 1000W Motor/30++ mph off-road speed.

52V/1kWh battery eliminates range anxiety, U.S. based service and support team, and best-in-class reliability and durability.

 

Front and rear suspension, versatile step-through frame and wider seat provides an outrageously smooth ride.

 

Wide tires for enhanced stability, hydraulic disc brakes for responsive stopping power and a bright LED moto headlamp for exceptional visibility.

 

 

Customized display controls assist level, as well as displays battery voltage, speed, trip miles, temperature, and more.

 

Added security and peace-of-mind with a removable, lock-protected battery. 

 

Super bright and exceptionally safe moto style headlight offers great visibility and illumination for night time rides.

 

Superior built suspension improves riding efficiency and comfort in even the most unforgiving terrains.

 

Amplify your pedaling power with Scorpion's Cadence Pedal Assist Technology. The HyperScorpion features Cadence & Torque Pedal Assist Technology.

 

Get a soft, smooth ride with less bounce—ideal for all types of terrain and riding conditions.

 

Sit in style and comfort, even on the longest rides.

 

Strap on traveling supplies, run errands, or store extra gear.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WE'VE STARTED PRODUCTION
Behind the Scenes

 
 
 
 
 
 

EARN CASH REWARDS FOR SHARING

Click on the image to earn 3% of contributions from your own referral link:

 

 

 

 



Juiced Bikes is a California-based company offering innovative and top-performing electric mobility products at an accessible, practical price. By using a direct-to-consumer distribution model, Juiced eliminates redundancy in an otherwise outdated supply chain to create a more affordable purchasing path for its customers. 

The company was founded in 2009 by Tora Harris who graduated from Princeton University with a degree in Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering. Harris is a record-breaking high jump champion, five-time American Champion, and a 2004 Olympian. His passionate commitment to academic pursuits and athletic competition is now devoted to developing high performance personal mobility products that take customers on a life-changing ride. 

Originally established as an importer of Lithium-Ion batteries, Juiced Bikes quickly progressed to developing electric bikes with the inventive and functional ODK Utility e-bike launching in 2010. Juiced products are designed, engineered, and supported by a team in San Diego, California and produced to exacting quality specifications. We take enormous pride in setting performance standards for range, quality, durability, affordability, and service support for the global electric bike industry. With a fierce commitment to utilizing advanced technologies to optimally distribute and support our products, Juiced ensures an efficient, reliable and trusted connection with our customers.

TORA HARRIS
FOUNDER & CEO 

Tora Harris is the founder of Juiced Bikes, an industry leader in electric bicycle design, manufacturing, sales, and distribution. Tora has led Juiced since its beginnings in 2009 as a Li-Ion battery pack manufacturer, releasing his first in-house designed bike in 2011.  His vehicle designs have set high standards for the e-bike industry, many of which have yet to be met by competitors:

    2014    ODK U500 Cargo Bike - 48V 32Ah (1.5kWh) battery  pack

    2015    CrossCurrent - First high-performance e-bike under $1500

    2017    HyperFat HF1000 - First production e-bike with a 1000W MAC motor    

    2019     CrossCurrent S2 - First and only company to use  52V battery platform across the entire e-bike portfolio

Under Tora’s leadership, Juiced Bikes transitioned to a direct-to-consumer distribution model in January 2017, dramatically reducing consumer pricing for high-performance e-bikes, while improving the efficiency of the product development process from ideation to launch. Fiercely committed to providing riders with the highest quality e-bikes at an affordable price, Tora strategically utilized a crowdfunding campaign in the Summer of 2018 to release the company’s line of super-premium Scrambler electric bikes. The success of the campaign, speed of order fulfillment, top-rated customer satisfaction, and the high degree of transparency delivered to backers throughout production are all impressive examples of the company’s dedication to exceeding the expectations of their loyal customers and supporters.  

A fluent Mandarin speaker, Tora spends a great deal of time in China working directly with his design, engineering, and manufacturing teams. He is uniquely positioned to access relevant technology as soon as it’s available, and with capabilities to develop new innovations that don’t yet exist. 

Tora was a 4-time All American high jumper at Princeton, winning the high jump at NCAA Outdoor Championship in 2002.  He graduated in 2002 with a BSE in Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, and embarked upon a successful professional athletic career after graduation. Tora won 4 US National Championships in high jump and competed on the US Olympic team in 2004 in Athens, Greece.  Tora retired from international athletics in 2012 to exclusively focus on leading the rapid growth of the Juiced Bikes organization. The rest, as they say, is history.


Juiced Bikes Management Team

Tora Harris - Founder & CEO

Aindrais O’Callaghan - Executive Vice President

Kerri Kauffman - Director of Marketing

Kenny Fang - Global Supply Chain Manager

Rasan Aycox - Customer Support Manager

 

 

 

 

 

Industry-leading e-bike components combined with a super versatile step-through frame and a classic moped-inspired design.  Keep heads turning everywhere you ride.

 

 

 

This warranty applies only to products, parts, & components (hereafter PRODUCTS) that have been manufactured, assembled, or sold in new condition by Juiced Bikes/Juiced Riders, Inc (hereafter, JUICED).

This warranty applies only to replacement/repair of PRODUCTS in case of a manufacturing flaw in materials or workmanship, in accordance with the Scope of Warranty Service, and subject to any and all exclusions, limitations, and procedures explained below.

This warranty is not transferable in any way and may not be exercised by anyone other than the original retail buyer (hereafter BUYER) of the PRODUCTS, only if the BUYER has retained constant ownership of the PRODUCTS since their original purchase of the PRODUCTS and only to PRODUCTS purchased in new condition either.

 

Battery packs are covered for a period of 1 year on manufacturer defects only. We DO NOT cover wear and tear or USAGE on your battery.

Bicycle frames are covered by a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects.

Mechanical components are covered by a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects.

For all PRODUCTS, this warranty expires 1 year from the date the PRODUCTS were delivered to the BUYER unless excluded from warranty or otherwise voided from coverage under warranty.

NO REFUNDS WILL BE MADE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS.

 

 

SHIPPING AVAILABLE ONLY TO THE 48 CONTIGUOUS UNITED STATES, EXCLUDING ANY RELEVANT TAXES. PLEASE SEE REWARD FOR DETAILS ON THE SHIPPING COST THAT APPLIES TO YOU.

 

We are currently planning to ship the Scorpion in March 2020.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

Want to help Juiced Bikes grow? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs the Scorpion around town or out in the country!

 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product! We can't do this without you.

 

 

                  

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

story:
Who is Terra Motors?

-2010 founded

-No1 market share of the electric two＆three wheelers in Japan since 2011

-Our culture is 'Silicon valley approach ' (Innovation, Speed decision-making, Financing, Risk-taking)× 'Japanese approach '(Quality control, Development, After service, Technology)

-Our shareholder is prominent such as former Sony CEO, former Google Japan CEO, former Apple Japan CEO, Mizuho Bank (Japanese top bank) and so on.


-Award result 


-TV media coverage omnibus 2012 below.


Problem 

①Fossil fuels dependency 

The limits of growth is actually happing. Around 2020, more than 8 billion in the world can not live since the food and the human resource is gone. Especially, the oil will be gone in 40 years. In the long term, human being will move to the sustainable 

civilization. Energy is civilization base and driving power.

In the energy sector, Asia will be a big consumer of the oil. Also major consumption o f the oil is used in the transportation sector. Thus, it will be valuable to make the transportation alternative way.

②Poverty 

In Asia,there are 1.7 billion people who are living on less than 2 USD a day. In many cases, the kind of people work at the local public transportation driver. Specifically, roughly 10 % of the Philippines people is working at this industry. Our electric mobility can double their income.

③Air pollution

This is the situation in Vietnam. 16000 people die because of the air pollutions in Vietnam 2007 (AIT). Also,5000 people die because of the air pollutions in the Philippines in 2010  ADB). According to the date, Asia will be more CO2 emissions place due to the economic&population growth. We need to stop this with our innovative product.

Our challenge for problem

We have been already developing the electric three wheelers in the Philippines.

We have done the feasible study around Asia with this mobility so we modify the design to meet the requirement. The final design will be like below.

We would like to develop this and expand this mobility around Asia.

Your supports help us

We appreciate your  support. We will use your perk for the mass production type of the development cost. We can develop the model and expand this around Asia  if you support us.


Terra Motors Company Ltd.,

Director of Business Development 

Teppei Seki

Mobile:＋919999059083

Mail:seki@terramotors.co.jp

story:
The Citylite Story

There are very few people who realise how many things have to be taken into consideration before launching a new product like Citylite and if they did most people would never even start, even though they had a great idea. Luckily there are people who not only have great ideas but also have the energy, courage and belief to carry it through. One of these people is Lars Beck, the man behind Citylite.

Compact bicycle lights without brackets

It’s actually 20 years ago since Lars Beck first got the idea for a compact set of bicycle lights that could snap directly onto the bicycle without requiring a bracket. He approached some of the leading companies within the bicycle industry and ended up selling the design to one of the major players in the bicycle market. Unfortunately the company put the product in the draw. So what do you do if you believe that you have a brilliant idea that you want to see on the market. You take a deep breath and push on. That’s what Lars Beck did anyway and eventually managed to get the product into production and launch it in several countries in Europe. But his troubles were far from over and a competition clause put the adventure on hold. Lars fought hard for several years to keep hold of his patents and that is why Lars now again is on his way out into the world with his bicycle lights – a simple idea that makes life easier and safer for all cyclists and this is at a time when the bicycle is more popular than ever, both at home and around the world.

A brilliant idea and a lump of plasticine

One could write many words about all those years of hard work on Citylite. But if one should mention the key elements in the journey that Lars has travelled, then it started with a lump of plasticine which he rode around with on his handlebar. He knew he had got a brilliant idea, but how could he take it further?

Ups and downs

The little lump of plasticine was the beginning of an adventure that really has had its ups and downs. Lars wanted to study product design but this meant that he first had to learn to draw. He spent several years improving this talent and eventually applied to the Danish Design School, but didnt pass the entry exam. Instead he applied to several design courses abroad and in the end chose to study Product Design & Manufacture at a university in England. This has obviously given him key knowhow within the field of product development and manufacturing.

The right contacts

A brilliant idea is one thing, financing and production is something else. But when you have a passion for something there’s always a solution. Lars began looking for investors for his project and through a number of coincidences brought him to Deloitte and Touche Corporate Finance in Southampton, England. They were so convinced of his idea that they assisted him in writing a business plan and soon Lars was negotiating with some of the largest companies in the bicycle business. The future was looking bright, literally! But then, as it happens all too often with good ideas, it was bought and filed away on strategic grounds. However, that wasn’t much help to Lars, he wanted to see his idea on the market.

Patents and provisions

A brilliant idea can quickly get buried in legalities and economics. In principle, Lars owned the rights to his own product but the company that had bought the rights but never actually produced it objected. Lars spent the next five years fighting to keep his patents in place while taking on a number of different jobs that had nothing to do with design. He always kept a prototype of Citylite in his pocket so that he could remind himself why he was there at times of despair.

Back on his bike and on the road again

A couple of years ago Lars succeeded in finally getting his project back on track with a new and ultimate version called Citylite. Finally the world’s most compact set of bicycle lights will soon be lighting the way for cyclists in cities all over the world. 

It has been a dream for many years but having overcome a number of challenges along the way it began to be a reality again from 2010 and in this connection Lars would like to say thank you to those people who have shown their belief in him and have been willing to support and assist him in realizing his dream come true without any promise of an immediate return. Their support and effort has made all the difference.


The Unending War of Vehicles VS. Bicyclists

Throughout most of the world, cops on the scene of accidents immediately and invariably, assume the cyclist is at fault! Bicycle riders have reason to fear for their lives. In America, The New York Times, in a study of accidents involving a bicycle and a vehicle, asked “Is it O.K. to Kill Cyclists?” Google “cyclist + accident” and you will find that cops on the scene of accidents immediately and invariably, assume the cyclist is at fault! 

Bicycle riders have reason to fear for their lives. 

The Need For Bicycle Lighting So You Can See - And Be Seen! 

For whatever reason, this proven antipathy against bicycle riders by drivers become even more perilous in the dark streets of metropolitan areas, especially noted and reported in New York City since the implementation of their CityBike program. No doubt some of the conflict is caused by bicyclists disregarding traffic laws, but there is a distinct, almost criminal disregard by government to greatly improve bicycle safety by making it mandatory for bicyclists to have a proper lighting system when riding at night.

Citylite: The Ingenious Set of Bicycle Lights That Bath The Cyclist In Dark City Streets! 


World-Class design and industry experts say... 

"Functionality, usability and design are combined in this
compact bicycle light in a highly intelligent way"

“The award “Red Dot” for high design quality, expressing innovation in
form and function in an exemplary manner, is presented to Citylite”
- Red dot jury statements 2012

".....Citylite addresses an important safety topic
and offers bicyclists a novel solution....."
- iF Jury Statement 2013

“...After removal from the bike the lights interlock to form a small, compact package,
whereby the clip holders of the two elements intertwine delightfully with the body
of the lights like ying and yang... Ingenious and simple”
- German Design Award jury statement 2014


Inspiration

Influencer Referral Program. No purchase necessary.

The backer that makes the most referrals to pledge will win the opportunity to design their own handmade bicycle from the exclusive Danish bicycle maker ”Cykelmageren” in Copenhagen worth USD2500 incl. a limited edition Black Citylite with my signature on it. Once the campaign has ended we will contact the winner direct. Please see www.cykelmageren.dk for bicycle details.


Instant installation

Each lamp glides swiftly and easily onto the handlebar and saddle stem.
No brackets! No rubber pads ! No problem!    


Interlocking Design

No more stolen bike lights or carrying around two bulky lights in your pocket. The unique design enables you to simply glide the two lights together into a single neat compact unit that fits conveniently in your pocket after use!


Citylite gives you the highest level of safety

The superior optical and lens design gives a clear focused beam of light that spreads out 220°, making you more visible in traffic on your way through the city – also from the side. Other coin battery lights simply don't give you this same level of safety.


Custom designed facet optics and lenses
for ultimate light spread


High Powered beam of light


220 degree side light


Consistent light intensity

Be seen in traffic for longer. With Citylite you no longer have to ride around with lights that only work well during your first couple of rides. Citylite is equipped with two coin cell batteries connected in parallel. This technical detail simply doubles the life span of the batteries making Citylite more economical as well as safer.


Key features

  • One single neat compact unit
  • Interlocking design – for ultimate storage
  • Swift and easy mounting – no brackets needed
  • 220° side light – be seen in traffic also from the side
  • Parallel connected batteries for 200% battery boost – longer lasting intensity
  • 2 high powered low energy LED’s
  • Constant and flashing setting
  • Mode Select Memory for ease of use / automatically turns on your favorite setting
  • Patented Dura-Loc Technology
  • Water Resistant Electronics


A closer look at the perks




The Citylite Team

Citylite is a truly international team of individuals. Founded in Denmark, our team includes experts in different fields incl. low-energy circuitry, light and optics, tool making, ultra-sonic welding, located in the Germany, Holland, Ireland, United Kingdom and the United States.

Over the years, our team has worked for world-class companies, including HP, Duracell, Samsung, Sony, Procter & Gamble to name just a few. A testimony to the team’s knowhow and abilities. Our team has more than 30 years of experience with consumer product design.

Each team member has a real passion for Citylite and we obviously all enjoy riding our bikes.


Project Status

To produce Citylite I have set up production in Denmark so that I can have full control with the manufacturing process and the quality. Therefore I can proudly say that Citylite is Danish design, engineered, manufactured and assembled in Denmark.

I have successfully completed my pilot run and proved the manufacturing process and I can therefore confidently say that it can be done, that I can do it and that your funds will not be wasted.

Because new product development and mass manufacture is a risky business during the early stages, spending your money before having proved that it can actually be made into a real product, would not be fair. Therefore I have already developed and covered the costs of the initial soft tooling required to prove the design and the ability to manufacture and assemble the product successfully. I developed the initial injection molds in aluminum because this material is considerably cheaper than fully hardened steel that is needed for mass manufacture. The downside is that the aluminum molds can only make a limited number of lights before losing their tolerances.

What you see in the pictures are actual injection molded samples, not prototypes made from 3D printing – this is the real thing!

I am now ready to confidently deliver Citylites to you and as soon as I meet the Indiegogo funding goal I will start production of the exclusive limited editions for all of you.


Funding Budget

I have been working on this Ying & Yang design concept for many years now, but to make Citylite available for everyone around the world at a reasonable price, I need to go into mass production. Citylite is now finally ready and I am therefore seeking to crowd source demand upfront through Indiegogo.

Your contribution will help fund:

  • Full hardened steel production tooling for mass manufacture
  • Development of a USB chargeable version
  • Large component orders
  • Global approvals
  • Research into different surfaces and materials
  • Ultrasonic welding horn in Titanium
  • Development of Organic pulsing pattern for the flashing modes


And the winner is... Citylite

During the last 14 months Citylite has been recognized and validated by design and industry experts around the world - Proof of concept and a testimony to its functionality, performance and high design quality.

All together Citylite has won 7 international design and innovation competitions during the last 24 months and has in this connection been evaluated by more than 250 independent jury members from 58 different countries made up of internationally renowned designers, entrepreneurs and academics.

iF Product Design Gold Award 2013 – also known as the Design Oscar - Best of the Best


"With this product, there are many things that come together here that work really well. It addresses an important safety topic and offers bicyclists a novel solution. It is so intelligent that the light comes on automatically and it remembers the users preferred switch mode i.e. on a constant or flashing setting. It knows you are using it so it does what you expect it to do. It immediately explains its function. So many things in design are used beautifully in a single product that I think functionality design-wise absolutely surprised the jury"
- iF Design Award Jury Statement 2013


FAQ

How long does Citylite burn wihin the minimum intensity requirements of the Danish traffic regulations?
Minimum 40 hours in constant mode and minimum 80 hours in flashing mode.

How bright does it shine?
300% brighter than required by the Danish traffic regulations.

How do I change batteries?

Simply pull out lens, no tools required

How much does Citylite weigh?
46 grams in assembled state

What are the dimensions?
65,3x26x34mm in assembled state


CON AMORE

"As much as this project is about exotic object design, it is as much or maybe even more about having dreams and pursuing those through creativity and perseverance. One thing is for sure, to realize our dreams we must do our ultimate best and be prepared to die for what we do."
- Lars Beck personal statement 2013

_______________________________________________________________________

Press Kitt please follow link: 

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/wvs6r50qt9woqq7/69O1Uohs2Q?n=112037662
